Ace_Physic.name: Poppin' Stick
Ace_Physic.desc: Getting hit by this weapon causes an immediate buzzing in the brain and crackling in the ears, followed by seeing stars and a huge bump on the back of the head.
Ace_Physic.lottery_desc: Getting hit by this weapon causes an immediate buzzing in the brain and crackling in the ears, followed by seeing stars and a huge bump on the back of the head.

element.name: Armor Dissolve
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack inflicts Armor Dissolve on the target for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their flame and physical damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). This effect will replace the grievous status on the target, and targets with this effect cannot become grievous. Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Chocolate Craze
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Sugar Eruption
attacks.desc:
While the Wanderer is airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks in the air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Giant Candy Combo
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Giant Candy Combo.
Continuously swing the bat and strike the ground vigorously, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. After which, unleash a final swing, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and launch them.

attacks.name: Buh-Bye!
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger a charged attack.
Lift up the bat and begin charging on the spot, consuming stamina. The longer the charge time, the greater the damage and hit effect. After charging, swing the bat ahead, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon hit and launching them.

attacks.name: Caramel Chip Tornado
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Caramel Chip Tornado.
Fall down from mid-air. During the course of landing, each hit on an enemy deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Fruit Burst
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Poppin' Stick Frenzy
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Amethyst Candy Assault
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold to enter the charging state. Damage received while charging is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Releasing will trigger different short-term effects. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects). Based on the charging time, trigger up to two skill phases:
Phase 1 will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
Phase 2 will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and increase final damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. At the same time, inflict Disorient on targets hit, causing them to receive damage equal to <shuzhi>450%</> of ATK for <shuzhi>16</> seconds.
During this period, when normal attacks or dodge attacks from <shuzhi>Poppin' Stick</> hit Disoriented targets, there is a <shuzhi>30%</> chance to deal heavy attack damage equal to <shuzhi>900%</> of ATK, triggering up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>6</> seconds for each Disoriented target.

attacks.name: In the Name of Wednesday!
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and swing the bat ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Increase the chance of triggering <shuzhi>heavy attack</> to <shuzhi>100%</> and reduce the trigger interval to <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Tap or release during a skill's charging phase to trigger the second phase of <shuzhi>Amethyst Candy Assault</>.
The Wanderer will gain <shuzhi>15%</> ignore of the target's physical resistance (each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed <shuzhi>50%</>).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
<shuzhi>Disoriented</> targets will deal <shuzhi>25%</> less damage, and triggering heavy attack will greatly reduce the enemy's aggro toward the Wanderer.
The final damage boost from <shuzhi>Amethyst Candy Assault</> is increased to <shuzhi>35%</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost. The weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Poppin' Stick Carnival: Detatchment</>: After using the <shuzhi>skill</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>19.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>70%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>264%</> of crit to the target hit every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Poppin' Stick Carnival damage cannot be stacked. Poppin' Stick Carnival damage counts as skill damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> volt or frost weapon is equipped, Poppin' Stick Carnival damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Poppin' Stick Carnival damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Candy Swirl
fashions.desc: Sweetly and freely bash those school bullies until they're covered in lumps!
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Candy Swirl.

fashions.name: Fruity Gummies
fashions.desc: If you think it's just an inflatable baton and underestimate it, you're in for a big surprise!
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Fruity Gummies.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK, while the four-set bonus provides an all-elemental damage boost and a final damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Antoria_thunder.name: Requiem
Antoria_thunder.desc: This marks the start of the end, and the end of the beginning.
Antoria_thunder.lottery_desc: This marks the start of the end, and the end of the beginning.

element.name: Force Impact
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack applies Force Impact on the enemy for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their frost and volt damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). Force Impact replaces the target's grievous status, and targets with Force Impact cannot become grievous. Frost attacks will freeze targets with Force Impact for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and volt attacks will remove the buffs on targets with Force Impact. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: General Attack - A
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> damage, knocking targets back.
 Second strike: Deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{3}</> damage, knocking targets back.
 Third strike: Deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{5}</> damage, knocking targets up.
 Fourth strike: Deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{7}</> damage, drawing in targets.
 Fifth strike: Deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{9}</> damage, knocking targets up.
 During <shuzhi>Skill - Alpha Attack</>, the scouting ability of the first, third, and fifth normal attacks is enhanced.

attacks.name: General Attack - B
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> damage, knocking targets back.
 Second strike: Deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{3}</> damage, knocking targets back.
 Third strike: Deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{5}</> damage, knocking targets up.
 Fourth strike: Deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{7}</> damage, drawing in targets.
 Fifth strike: Deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{9}</> damage, knocking targets up.

attacks.name: Special Attack - Thunderbringer
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, for the first to fourth normal attacks, hold the normal attack button to trigger the Special Attack  Thunderbringer.
Deals<shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies.

attacks.name: Alpha Attack - B
attacks.desc:
While airborne and enhanced, use a normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> damage, knocking targets up.
 Second strike: Deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{3}</> damage, knocking targets back.
 Third strike: Deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{5}</> damage, knocking targets back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to<shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{7}</>, knocking targets back.
 Fifth strike: Deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{9}</> damage, knocking targets back.

attacks.name: Special Attack - Rainstorm
attacks.desc:
Can be activated by consuming <red>Alpha Energy</> during <shuzhi>Skill - Alpha Attack</>. While airborne or using the first to fifth normal attacks in air, hold the normal attack button to trigger Special Attack - Rainstorm, consuming 1 <red>Alpha Energy</>. 
 Deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies (counts as skill damage).

attacks.name: General Attack - Lightning Strike
attacks.desc:
While airborne, hold the normal attack button, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetback to trigger General Attack  Lightning Strike.
 During the fall, each hit on the target deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage.
 When possessing <red>Alpha Energy</> upon landing, consumes 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> to deal <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> damage (counts as skill damage) and restore <shuzhi>1 Dodge attempt. During Skill - Alpha Attack</>, the skill's scouting ability is enhanced.

attacks.name: Guerilla Attack - Cirrus
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
 When possessing <red>Alpha Energy</>, consumes 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> to deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage (counts as skill damage) and restore <shuzhi>1</> Dodge attempt. During <shuzhi>Skill - Alpha Attack</>, the skill's scouting ability is enhanced.

attacks.name: Guerilla Attack - Typhoon
attacks.desc:
Using a normal attack shortly after dodging triggers a post-dodge attack, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to enemies in front (counts as skill damage). Restores 1 dodge attempt.
 When possessing <red>Alpha Energy</>, consumes 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> to deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage (counts as skill damage) and restore <shuzhi>1</> Dodge attempt.

attacks.name: Highspeed Cruise Mode - Cloud
attacks.desc: Hold the dodge button within the perfect dodge window (use the movement button before dodging) to activate Highspeed Cruise Mode - Cloud (not applicable in Apex League), continuously consuming Endurance. While in <shuzhi>Highspeed Cruise Mode - Cloud</>, holding the jump button enables rapid ascent at an increased Endurance cost, and the Wanderer is unaffected by any Speed bonuses.

attacks.name: Extreme Attack Switch - Thunderclap
attacks.desc:
Activating <shuzhi>Alpha Attack </> deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies, granting temporary Invincibility, <shuzhi>4%</> Volt Damage bonus, <shuzhi>10%</> Final Damage bonus, and Hyperbody for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. 
If <shuzhi>Requiem</> is equipped in the main slot, enabling <shuzhi>Alpha Charge </> grants 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> every <shuzhi>8</> seconds, up to <shuzhi>4</> Energy. However, <shuzhi>Alpha Charge </> and <red>Alpha Energy</> will be removed when <shuzhi>Alpha Attack </> is deactivated or when <shuzhi>Requiem</> is switched to the off-hand slot. Additionally, during <shuzhi>Alpha Attack </>, upon first acquisition of <red>Alpha Energy</>, grants a casting attempt for <shuzhi>Extreme Attack - Windward</> (can only be cast during Alpha Attack). Switching weapons prevents acquiring and using <shuzhi>Extreme Attack - Windward</>. 
<shuzhi>If Requiem</> is equipped in the off-hand slot during <shuzhi> Alpha Attack</>, <shuzhi>S.A.S Support Strike</> automatically attacks nearby enemies every <shuzhi>5</> seconds, dealing <shuzhi>2,100%</> of ATK Volt Damage (counts as skill damage). Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds (not affected by cooldown reduction, resetting, or changes).

attacks.name: Extreme Attack - Windward
attacks.desc:
Can be activated during <shuzhi>Skill - Alpha Attack</>. Deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies.
 When possessing <red>Alpha Energy</>, consumes 1 Alpha Energy to deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage (counts as skill damage).

attacks.name: Ultra Attack - Cataclysm
attacks.desc: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing<shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: During <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</> mode, the <red>Alpha Energy</> acquisition interval is reduced to <shuzhi>4</> seconds, and the <shuzhi>S.A.S Support Strike</> trigger interval is reduced to <shuzhi>3</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of the targets Volt Resistance (effect applies in off-hand slot). Total resistance ignored by each element cannot exceed <shuzhi>50%</>. When consuming <red> Alpha Energy </>, increases movement speed by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds (Unstackable).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Consumes <red>Alpha Energy</> to restore <shuzhi>15%</> of the casters Max HP. Activating <shuzhi>Skill - S.A.S Support Strike</> restores an additional <shuzhi>10%</> of the casters Max HP. Enhanced skills consuming <red>Alpha Energy</> apply an additional <shuzhi>3</>-second <shuzhi>65%</> Delay effect to the target (Unstackable; does not apply in team status).

Increases Volt Damage bonus from <shuzhi>Skill - Extreme Attack Switch - Thunderclap</> to <shuzhi>28%</>, and when casting <shuzhi>Skill - S.A.S Support Strike </> on multiple targets, deals an additional <shuzhi>15%</> damage.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Volt and Frost</>: When this weapon deals damage, the damage calculation uses the highest base Volt/Frost ATK, the highest Volt/Frost ATK percentage, and the highest Volt/Frost damage boost. The weapon is considered both Volt and Frost.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increases Volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and Volt Resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activated by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more Volt weapons. This effect applies in the off-hand slot. (Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects. Volt Resonance takes priority.)

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increases Frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and Frost Resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activated by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more Frost weapons. This effect applies in the off-hand slot. (Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects. Frost Resonance takes priority.)

<shuzhi>Nimbus: Unload</>: After using <shuzhi>Extreme Attack Switch - Thunderclap</>, deals damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of Volt ATK + <shuzhi>19.5%</> of the casters Max HP + <shuzhi>70%</> of the sum of all elemental resistances + <shuzhi>264%</>of Crit to the target every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Unload damages do not stack; and Nimbus damage is counted as skill damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> Flame/Physical weapon is equipped, Nimbus damage is boosted by a factor of <shuzhi>1.3</>. Nimbus damage is unaffected by other damage bonuses, except for rare stats from Titan equipment, and will not trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.desc: The rebellious wings are forged, solely to seize freedoms flight.

spear_ice.name: Frosted Spear
spear_ice.desc: A common weapon among residents of Warren Snowfield. Infused with frost to reflect the local flavor. It's very popular, because it's cheap yet highly effective.
spear_ice.lottery_desc: A common weapon among residents of Warren Snowfield. Infused with frost to reflect the local flavor. It's very popular, because it's cheap yet highly effective.

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Thrust
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a significant distance.

attacks.name: Jumping Strike
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

attacks.name: Crashing Drive
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

attacks.name: Spear Flurry
attacks.desc:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to a single target.

attacks.name: Sneak Attack
attacks.desc: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Flying Kick
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, knock the enemies back significantly, and <shuzhi>stun</> enemies for <shuzhi>1</> second or <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to Wanderers.

attacks.name: Lunging Smash
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Slam the long spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Moonchaser
attacks.desc: <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

attacks.name: Spear Dance
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and grab the target and shake them multiple times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target.

digger_physic.name: Combat Blade
digger_physic.desc: A basic weapon developed by Banges Tech. Forged in a special alloy, it is light, agile, and easy to handle.
digger_physic.lottery_desc: A basic weapon developed by Banges Tech. Forged in a special alloy, it is light, agile, and easy to handle.

element.name: Grievous
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for <shuzhi>7</> seconds, increasing their damage received by <shuzhi>20%</> and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. When in <yellow_lbl_14_1>team play</>, physical damage dealt to grievous targets is increased by an additional <shuzhi>20%</>.

attacks.name: Twin Blades
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, brandish the pair of dual blades to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

attacks.name: Sky Flurry
attacks.desc:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

attacks.name: Rapid Lunge
attacks.desc:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Spiral Drive
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit.

attacks.name: Sneak Attack
attacks.desc: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Flying Blades
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Keep tapping to throw up to <shuzhi>6</> more Flying Blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Returning Blades
attacks.desc: Fire <shuzhi>6</> Returning Blades in all directions, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

attacks.name: Orbiting Blades
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleashes orbiting blades that deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, with <shuzhi>2</> more flying blades spinning around the Wanderer to deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to targets coming into contact.

sword_thunder.name: EM Blade
sword_thunder.desc: The earliest electromagnetic Omnium project. The blade is easy to handle, and is very popular among Wanderers that are not great fighters.
sword_thunder.lottery_desc: The earliest electromagnetic Omnium project. The blade is easy to handle, and is very popular among Wanderers that are not great fighters.

element.name: Volt
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly paralyze</> targets for <shuzhi>1</> second and electrify them for <shuzhi>6</> seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. Electrified targets can't receive any buffs for the next <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

attacks.name: Quick Slash
attacks.desc:

attacks.name: Jumping Strike

attacks.name: Cyclone
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to a single target.

attacks.name: Diving Edge
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.

The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

SwordX_physic.name: Scarlet Gale
SwordX_physic.desc: Twin weapons crafted for agile and mobile combat, exceptional in both quality and weight. "Bullets pierce shadows, blades carve the night"a reflection of the wielder's burning resolve.

element.name: Armor Dissolve

Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

Fire a shot at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target upon hit.

attacks.name: Windcutting Thunder
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead. advancements.desc: <shuzhi>Blade of Unity</> is triggered at <shuzhi>5</>, <shuzhi>10</>, and <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When <shuzhi>Blade of Unity</> hits a target, apply Suppress effect for <shuzhi>4</> seconds, decreasing the target's movement speed by <shuzhi>20%</> and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>480%</> of ATK every second.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When <shuzhi>Blade of Unity</> is triggered, recover <shuzhi>25%</> of HP. If current HP is less than <shuzhi>50%</> of max HP, increase recovery to <shuzhi>50%</> (unaffected by healing bonus effects and unavailable in Apex League).
Increase physical damage boost from <shuzhi>Radiant Halo</> to <shuzhi>40%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Scarlet Blade: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Scarlet Gale</> is equipped, any weapon's discharge skill will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>73.2%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>1%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>36.6%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>134.3%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in combat, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is 1 frost/volt weapon of any kind equipped, Scarlet Blade damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Scarlet Blade damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

When Scarlet Gale is equipped in the main slot and the Wanderer takes lethal damage, performs Swift Lightning, during which the Wanderer is immune to damage. The minimum trigger interval is <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK, while the four-set bonus provides an all-elemental damage boost and a final damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.

Chainsaw_physic.name: Mini Hurricane
Chainsaw_physic.desc: Far too dangerous to be a child's plaything. There is no way a kid could have gotten their hands on it through honest means. Who knows what kind of tech was used to refit it... Maybe it was simply picked up somewhere off the beaten path.
Chainsaw_physic.lottery_desc: Far too dangerous to be a child's plaything. There is no way a kid could have gotten their hands on it through honest means. Who knows what kind of tech was used to refit it... Maybe it was simply picked up somewhere off the beaten path.

element.name: Grievous
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for <shuzhi>7</> seconds, increasing their damage received by <shuzhi>20%</> and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. When in <yellow_lbl_14_1>team play</>, physical damage dealt to grievous targets is increased by an additional <shuzhi>20%</>.

attacks.name: Speedy Blow
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and continuously knocking the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Whirling Blow
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Frantic Digging
attacks.desc:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack for the first to third normal attack to trigger Frantic Digging.
Continuously attack forward in place while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and causes the target to become <shuzhi>grievous</>, lasting <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

attacks.name: Boiling Octopus Balls
attacks.desc:
During Frantic Digging, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Boiling Octopus Balls.
Continuously attack forward while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Once normal attack is released, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and cause them to become <shuzhi>grievous</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
Use the directional controls to move during Boiling Octopus Balls.

attacks.name: Go on, Pip!
attacks.desc:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack or hold during the fourth normal attack to trigger Go on, Pip!
Continuously move forward while attacking and consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, knocking the target back and causing them to become <shuzhi>grievous</>, lasting for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
Use the directional controls to move during Go on, Pip!

attacks.name: Waterspout Spike
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Waterspout Spike.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground, and launching them.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Tentacle Counter
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Tentacle Counter, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Delay targets by <shuzhi>60%</>, and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>18%</> of ATK per second, lasting <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>10</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

attacks.name: Pursuing Tentacle
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Pursuing Tentacle, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Exploration Team Strike
attacks.desc:
Enter a charging state and become temporarily invincible (unavailable in Apex League). Draw in nearby targets, dealing damage to them equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time an attack lands. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds (cooldown starts upon entering charging state).
Upon releasing, detonate all <shuzhi>Treasure Tracers</> on nearby targets and cause <shuzhi>Octowhip</> to enter a Rampage state, increasing the speed of coordinated attacks by <shuzhi>100%</>, lasting for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

Different release timings can be chosen depending on the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> above the Wanderer.
<shuzhi>Total Berserk</>: When the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> equals <shuzhi>2</>, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
<shuzhi>Partial Berserk</>: When the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> is <shuzhi>1</> or <shuzhi>3</>, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

<shuzhi>Prowling Clones</>: Gain <shuzhi>15</> <shuzhi>Octowhips</> when in combat, which attack locked-on targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and consuming <shuzhi>1</> Octowhip each time an attack lands. A maximum of <shuzhi>30</> Octowhips can be stored at a time.
<shuzhi>Pip Octowhip</> Place <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Treasure Tracer</> on targets each time they are hit by an Octowhip which lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds, for a maximum of <shuzhi>3</> stacks.
Detonate <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Treasure Tracer</> stack whenever physical damage aside from <shuzhi>Octowhip</> is dealt to a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.1</> seconds.
Gain <shuzhi>1</> Octowhip whenever a discharge skill from any weapon hits a target. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.1</> seconds.

attacks.name: Pip Ultimate
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and briefly submerge the Wanderer, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> upon emerging. Upon landing, deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>, and gain the maximum number of <shuzhi>Pip Octowhip</>. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc:
Increase the shatter of Frantic Digging, Boiling Octopus Balls, and Go on, Pip! by <shuzhi>80%</>.
Gain a <shuzhi>50%</> increase to Shield when these skills are used when the Wanderer's Shield is below <shuzhi>50%</>. Lasts <shuzhi>8</> seconds. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

<shuzhi>Pip Octowhip</> limit is increased to <shuzhi>45</>.
After using Pip Ultimate, increase physical damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Detonating <shuzhi>Treasure Tracers</> refreshes the <shuzhi>grievous</> status of targets.
Increase physical damage by <shuzhi>10%</> when damage is dealt to targets with less than <shuzhi>80%</> HP. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase damage dealt by detonating <shuzhi>Treasure Tracers</> to <shuzhi>90%</> of ATK.

passives: <shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>60%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>100%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Universal Resonance</>: Increase final damage by <shuzhi>60%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> weapons of the same element, not including physical. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

recommended_matrices.reason: Two-set bonuses and four-set bonuses grant a universal off-hand slot damage boost and endurance consumption reduction, which is useful for Mini Hurricane's charged attacks.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
Deal additional damage to grievous targets, which is useful for Mini Hurricane's grievous infliction mechanism.

advancements.desc: Taunt nearby targets after switching to this weapon, preventing <shuzhi>1</> instance of damage in the next <shuzhi>8</> seconds and granting hyperbody for the next <shuzhi>8</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

Discharge skills deal an additional <shuzhi>10%</> damage to targets and increase frost damage by an additional <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Using a Skill grants allies healing orbs and damage orbs equal to the number of Omnium Cubes.

passives: <shuzhi>Flame Reaction</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>20%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>40%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. The domain lasts for <shuzhi>3.5</> seconds and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to a target every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

advancements.desc: Trigger an electrical explosion on the target after landing a critical hit, dealing additional damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK to the target and nearby enemies. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.2</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

ShieldAxe_Fire.lottery_desc: A shield axe that belongs to the V2 weapon series, a collection of weapons forged with special techniques.

attacks.name: Normal Attack
attacks.desc:

First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

attacks.name: Anticipation
attacks.desc:

While in shield form, releasing the normal attack button after taking damage or after holding the button for <shuzhi>3</> seconds unleashes fire crash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflicting a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> effect on the target.

attacks.name: Valor
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger aerial branch attacks.

Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

attacks.name: Erupt
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flaming shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking back targets. In addition, trigger an explosion that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>stun</> targets for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
Axe Form: Swing an axe to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Fission
attacks.desc:

Leave a large flame zone for <shuzhi>5</> seconds that burns the target, dealing continuous damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for <shuzhi>5</> seconds upon being hit.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Shield Conversion and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.

attacks.name: Seething Rage
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or when <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a flame shockwave, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP. Taunt enemies for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, during which gain <shuzhi>15%</> damage reduction. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted, which last within the area for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Upon pickup, objects provide <shuzhi>10</> seconds of <shuzhi>5%</> damage reduction (stackable) and immediately restore 1 dodge attempt.

advancements.desc: Gain a stack of Strong Shield upon using discharge: Seething Rage. Using a dodge skill or branch skill while in shield form grants a stack of Strong Shield, which grants <shuzhi>10%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>15</> seconds and stacks up to <shuzhi>3</> times. Switching to axe form converts all Strong Shield stacks to Sharp Axe stacks, each of which increases damage by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Switching to a different weapon cancels this effect.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
While in shield form, branch/dodge attacks deal additional damage to targets equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of the user's current HP.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

After switching to a shield axe, immediately grant <shuzhi>30%</> damage reduction that diminishes by <shuzhi>10%</> every <shuzhi>3</> seconds, down to a minimum of <shuzhi>10%</>. Switching weapons cancels this effect. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Enhance conversion skills.
Shield Conversion Enhancement: Increases skill damage dealt by <shuzhi>60%</> and expands the radius of the flame zone by <shuzhi>30%</>.
Axe Conversion Enhancement: Does not share cooldown with Shield Conversion. For the next <shuzhi>5</> seconds after using this skill, turns all damage received into HP (up to a maximum of <shuzhi>15%</> of the user's Max HP).

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases the effectiveness of dodge. The four-set bonus increases incoming damage reduction and team survivability.
The two-set bonus increases the damage of Molten Shield V2 and benefits shatter proficiency. The four-set bonus increases recovery.
The three-set bonus increases damage output and benefits the attack range of Molten Shield V2.

attacks.desc:

Whenever Thunder Burst's shockwave lands a hit, nearby targets are taunted for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.
Every time Thunder Burst produces a shield, nearby teammates will additionally receive a shield up to <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.

After triggering Lightning Flash, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

attacks.name: Azure Moon
attacks.desc:
An azure dragon soars through the sky. During this time, grant hyperbody to the Wanderer and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. The azure dragon will circle for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. During this time, continuously consume Qinglong's Might and summon up to <shuzhi>8</> lightning strikes. Every lightning strike deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets, and when the azure dragon disappears, deal damage again equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds and this cooldown cannot be lowered below <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Azure Moon can accumulate up to <shuzhi>2</> stacks of skill uses.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> When <shuzhi>3</> volt weapons are equipped, after Azure Moon lands a hit, deal skill damage equal to <shuzhi>250%</> of ATK to the target every <shuzhi>2</> seconds for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

attacks.name: Soaring Dragon
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and gather chi. Then smash the ground, causing an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them. During the period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive:</> When Phantasia is triggered, if Azure Dragon is currently equipped or if switching to Azure Dragon from another weapon, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>5,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets. This damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats. This can only be triggered up to 1 time per Phantasia trigger.

advancements.desc:
Each time after <shuzhi>Thunder Burst</> charges, <shuzhi>2</> Azuras will appear. Each Azura will restore <shuzhi>20%</> Max HP to other summons.
Increase <shuzhi>Thunder Burst</>'s charged attack and shockwave damage by <shuzhi>30%</>.
After using <shuzhi>Azure Moon</>, immediately gain <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Qinglong's Might. Using other volt weapons' skills will grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Qinglong's Might instead.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When <shuzhi>Azure Dragon</> is equipped, reduce all volt weapon base skill cooldowns by <shuzhi>20%</>. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
Additionally, increase the Wanderer's volt damage by <shuzhi>15%</>. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When the Wanderer receives lethal damage, prevent lethal damage 1 time and gain damage immunity for a short duration. This effect can only trigger 1 time every <shuzhi>60</> seconds and works in the off-hand slot.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Using <shuzhi>Soaring Dragon</> draws in nearby targets, ignoring hyperbody (ineffective against bosses).
In team play, <shuzhi>Thunder Burst</> will produce <shuzhi>1</> volt timestamp every <shuzhi>6</> seconds while charging, which will link up in the order they are produced to form a power grid. The power grid can block enemies' movements and their projectile damage. Each volt timestamp lasts for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
After using <shuzhi>Azure Moon</>, increase the Wanderer's volt damage by <shuzhi>10%</> and final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Thunderboom: On-Field</>: When landing any hit with <shuzhi>Azure Dragon</>, it deals damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>131.3%</> of volt ATK plus <shuzhi>1.9%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>68.8%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>250%</> of crit. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. The Thunderboom damage is counted as normal attack damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> flame/frost/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Thunderboom damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</> times. Additionally, Thunderboom damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.
