attacks.desc:
While on the ground, after triggering Darkshadow Burst, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Eruption and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
Damage varies based on the duration normal attack is held, up to a maximum of 1.5 times damage.

attacks.name: Void Abyss Current
attacks.desc: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to create an abyss current at the current location. Tap the mark on the map to transmit to that location, or to change the settings for that abyss current. Up to <shuzhi>2</> abyss currents may be created.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Vortex Field
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Vortex Field.
Create Dark Matter at the target location, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. When nearby targets come close to the Dark Matter, a Vortex Field will form and draw them in.
When the Wanderer passes by the Vortex Field, gain Dimensional Guard for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, blocking damage from the locked-on target <shuzhi>1</> time (no more than <shuzhi>300%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP). Dimensional Guard can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

attacks.name: Butterfly Dance
attacks.desc:
While in <shuzhi>team play</>, after dodging with Purple Bamboo, summon <shuzhi>1</> butterfly that follows the Wanderer for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
After activating Attack Resonance or Balance Resonance, the butterfly flies around the locked-on target and creates a composition with its trails, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets that pass through it.
After activating Fortitude Resonance, place a <shuzhi>65%</> delay on targets that pass through the composition for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and grant a shield equal to <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP to the Wanderer and teammates for <shuzhi>15</> seconds when they pass through the composition. This effect can occur up to <shuzhi>1</> time per second, stacking up to <shuzhi>2</> times.
After activating Benediction Resonance, consume the butterfly to immediately help up a knocked-down teammate.

attacks.name: Hyperdimensional Field
attacks.desc:
Activate Hyperdimensional Field, gaining temporary invincibility, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and placing a <shuzhi>65%</> delay for <shuzhi>3</> seconds on the targets (ineffective against bosses in team play). At the same time, the <shuzhi>Void Trace</> on the field immediately executes its skill. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
Ascend into the air and generate a field, placing nearby targets into a High-Dimensional Space that lasts up to <shuzhi>60</> seconds, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody, and Purple Bamboo's damage dealt to targets in the High-Dimensional Space ignores shields.
The High-Dimensional Space gains energy equal to <shuzhi>2</> plus <shuzhi>number of targets within the Space</> every second, and triggers Dimensional Collapse at <shuzhi>45</> energy, dealing damage equal to (<shuzhi>0.1%</> of the total damage dealt by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) in the Space plus <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK). This damage counts as passive damage and is the base multiplier. It is affected by damage boost. The High-Dimensional Space fades after <shuzhi>4</> Dimensional Collapses.

attacks.name: Confining Tune
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and create chains from another dimension to bind the target upon switching to this weapon, delaying them by <shuzhi>65%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds (ineffective against bosses in team play), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and becoming immune to damage for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

<shuzhi>Passive: Void Trace</>
Confining Tune creates <shuzhi>1</> Void Trace that launches coordinated attacks at the current locked-on target. Only <shuzhi>1</> Void Trace may be active, and it fades after <shuzhi>20</> seconds when not in combat.
For every <shuzhi>1</> weapon of a different element or altered weapon equipped, increase Void Trace's damage dealt by <shuzhi>10%</>. Void Trace's damage is also not affected by damage boosts, except for Inhabit, Confining Tune, and rare stats on titan equipment, and won't trigger additional attack effects.
Hold dodge when wielding <shuzhi>Purple Bamboo</> to trigger Possession (unavailable in Apex League) and Possess Void Trace, gaining the ability to control its movements. During Possession, Coordinated Void becomes Void Trace's normal attack and skills.
While under Possession, Void Trace enters Rampage state, increasing speed, damage reduction, shatter, and weapon charge by <shuzhi>50%</>. Its normal attack and its skill damage increase by the same percentage as its Max HP lost at the time.
<shuzhi>Coordinated Void</>: A periodic coordinated attack from Void Trace, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}% to {3}%</> of Void Trace's ATK.
<shuzhi>Void Halo</>: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of Void Trace's ATK every second to nearby targets.
<shuzhi>Void Attack</>: Tap normal attack to launch 4 consecutive attacks, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}% to {6}%</> of Void Trace's ATK.
<shuzhi>Void Skill</>: Consume <shuzhi>25%</> of Void Trace's Max HP and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{7}% to {8}%</> of Void Trace's ATK, increasing Void Trace's Crit Rate by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Void Relief</>: Can be triggered when Void Trace takes lethal damage, when the Wanderer equips or unequips Purple Bamboo, or when holding dodge during Possession.

<shuzhi>Passive: Dark Wretch</>
When switching to Purple Bamboo from other weapons, Confining Tune will grant additional effects based on the element of the weapon.
<shuzhi>Frost</>: Summon Darkness: Alabaster Elite and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{9}%</> of ATK. Also, gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>30</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Create a hail storm by the locked-on target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to nearby targets every second for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Counts as normal attack damage.
<shuzhi>Flame</>: Summon Black Crow Dark Wretch and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{11}%</> of ATK. Burn nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK. Counts as passive damage.
<shuzhi>Volt</>: Summon Longxiang Dark Wretch and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{13}%</> of ATK. When not under Possession, consume <shuzhi>5%</> of Void Trace's Max HP every second and deal <shuzhi>50%</> of the value as damage to nearby targets. Counts as normal attack damage (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Physical</>: Summon Darkness: Hornmane and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK. Gain sweeping for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, dealing additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{15}%</> of ATK to nearby targets on a critical hit. Counts as normal attack damage. Can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.85</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Altered</>: Summon Darkness: Taotie and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{16}%</> of ATK. Void Trace inherits an additional <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{17}%</> of Void Trace's ATK to nearby targets during Void Relief. Counts as skill damage.

advancements.desc:
For every <shuzhi>1</> star gained by the Darkness-Inhabited weapon, increase Inhabit's damage boost by an additional <shuzhi>1%</>.
Dimensional Collapse deals increased damage equal to (<shuzhi>0.1%</> of total actual damage dealt in High-Dimensional Space by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) plus <shuzhi>2,400%</> of ATK) (counts as base multiplier, affected by damage boost).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Void Trace inherits an additional <shuzhi>50%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. When taking lethal damage while not under Possession, instead of being defeated, consume Void Trace to block the lethal damage 1 time and become immune to damage for a short period of time. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>60</> seconds, and has a lower priority when similar effects are present. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

While in High-Dimensional Space, ignore <shuzhi>30%</> of the target's resistances.
Up to <shuzhi>3</> Void Abyss Currents can now be created.

Dimensional Collapse now deals damage equal to (<shuzhi>0.4%</> of total actual damage dealt in High-Dimensional Space by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) plus <shuzhi>2,400%</> of ATK) (counts as base multiplier, affected by damage boost).

passives: <shuzhi>The Final Tune</>: Increase ATK by <shuzhi>30%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>3</> altered weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
<shuzhi>Imbue</>: After switching to Purple Bamboo from another weapon, Purple Bamboo's damage element becomes that of the previous weapon.

<shuzhi>Inhabit</>: The power of the Darkness is able to Inhabit any unlocked weapon. When Purple Bamboo is not deployed, the power of the Darkness can Inhabit any other weapon, increasing its damage dealt by <shuzhi>1%</>. When Purple Bamboo is deployed, the power of the Darkness Inhabits Purple Bamboo, increasing the Wanderer's damage dealt by <shuzhi>15%</>.

fashions.name: Diaphlute
fashions.desc: A treasured gift from an old friend, crafted by a master's hand. Renowned for its ethereal and clear tones, it was aptly named. "I play this cherished tune just for you!"
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance, Diaphlute.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides an all attack boost, while the four-set bonus provides crit damage and final damage boosts, along with an excellent off-hand damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Nora_superpower.name: Rumble
Nora_superpower.desc: A motorcycle and a great sword. What a peculiar combination! But since she was never good at remembering names, she eventually decided to simply call both of them Rumble.
Nora_superpower.lottery_desc: A motorcycle and a great sword. What a peculiar combination! But since she was never good at remembering names, she eventually decided to simply call both of them Rumble.

element.name: Altered Damage
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Additionally, inflict damage equal to <shuzhi>25%</> of all damage received by the target during the duration of the mark, up to a total of <shuzhi>560%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Only 1 mark can exist on a target at a time.

attacks.name: Windrider
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.
In <shuzhi>Superspeed Mode</>, during the Fifth Attack, tap and hold normal attack to chain it with the First Attack.

attacks.name: Cloud Riding
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and launch the target.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back.
<shuzhi>Silent Slash</>: When enemies are hit during the Second and Third Attacks, trigger the Cut effect, extending attack duration and increasing damage.
When enemies are hit by the Second Attack, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target sback.
When enemies are hit by the Third Attack, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back.

attacks.name: Twin Slashes
attacks.desc:
During Superspeed Mode, while using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to second normal attacks to trigger <shuzhi>Twin Slashes</>.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and knock the targets back.

attacks.name: Linked Slashes
attacks.desc:
During <shuzhi>Superspeed Mode</>, when triggering <shuzhi>Twin Slashes</>, continue to tap and hold normal attack to trigger Linked Slashes.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. At the same time, consume all <shuzhi>Overload</> stacks and for every <shuzhi>1</> stack consumed, additionally deal damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of ATK. If <shuzhi>Overload</> is at <shuzhi>6</> stacks, trigger <shuzhi>Extreme Charge</> instead and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK.

attacks.name: Whirlpool Rider
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the third to fourth normal attacks to trigger Whirlpool Rider.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Waterfall Rider
attacks.desc:
While airborne, when using Cloud Riding, tap and hold normal attack (or tap when a target is available) to trigger the diving attack, Waterfall Rider.
Dive down from mid-air. During the course of landing, each hit on an enemy deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Traveling Rider
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger the diving attack, Traveling Rider.
Dive down from mid-air. During the course of landing, each hit on an enemy deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Swift Slash
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Subsonic Slash
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Sonic Skyrider
attacks.desc:
Dodge before holding to enter Sonic Skyrider during which speed is increased and endurance is constantly consumed to attack ahead. Every time the Wanderer lands a hit, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
During Sonic Skyrider, jump and land to consume endurance and receive a temporary speed boost. In the Overworld, after entering Sonic Skyrider for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, damage dealt by Sonic Skyrider can execute non-boss enemies (unavailable in Apex League).

attacks.name: Violent Energy
attacks.desc:
Enter Superspeed Mode for the Wanderer to gain temporary invincibility and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and apply a <shuzhi>3</>-second <shuzhi>65%</> delay to the targets (ineffective against bosses in team play).
During Superspeed Mode, gain hyperbody, and at the same time, each attack of <shuzhi>Windrider</> and <shuzhi>Cloud Riding</> has Supersound, additionally dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> (counts as passive damage). At the same time, each attack landed grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Overload, up to <shuzhi>6</> stacks (up to <shuzhi>1</> stack every <shuzhi>0.65</> seconds).
After entering Superspeed Mode for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, gain the new skill <shuzhi>Flash Rider</> (can be used during Superspeed Mode). Switching weapons during this time will prevent the Wanderer from using <shuzhi>Flash Rider</>.

<shuzhi>Passive: Superspeed Reform</>
<shuzhi>Rumble</> has 5 elemental types. Activate up to <shuzhi>1</> of them via the Skills - Settings page. Unable to switch types while in combat.
Based on <shuzhi>Rumble's</> elemental type, using Violent Energy to land a hit on a target will carry a different corresponding <shuzhi>weapon trait</> and provide a different effect.

<red>Frost-Volt</>: Receive <shuzhi>28</> seconds of Superspeed Mode. During that time, every time <shuzhi>Rumble</> lands a hit with normal attack or every time the Wanderer receives non-excess healing, receive 1 stack of <shuzhi>Thermal Convergence</>, stacking up to <shuzhi>10</> stacks. After Superspeed Mode has ended for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, remove all Thermal Convergence that has not been transformed. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).

<red>Flame-Physical</>: Receive <shuzhi>23</> seconds of Superspeed Mode. When entering Superspeed Mode, consume all <shuzhi>Sparks</>. For every stack consumed, receive <shuzhi>600</> base flame ATK (this flame ATK will not be reflected on the Wanderer's stats and is unavailable in Apex League) and increase <shuzhi>Rumble's</> final damage by <shuzhi>6%</>. During Superspeed Mode, gain Flame Pursuit. When dealing flame damage, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>500%</> of ATK to nearby targets, triggering up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds (unaffected by cooldown resetting or reduction effects).

<red>Volt-Frost</>: Receive <shuzhi>18</> seconds of Superspeed Mode. During Superspeed Mode, increase volt damage by <shuzhi>12%</>. When landing a hit with normal attack while <shuzhi>Rumble</> is in the main slot, receive <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Thunderclap</>, up to <shuzhi>18</> stacks. At full stacks, consume all stacks and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>2,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets (counts as skill damage). At the same time, receive a <shuzhi>10</>-second Shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP (this effect does not stack). The Thunderclap additional effect can trigger up to <shuzhi>5</> times each time the Wanderer enters Superspeed Mode. If <shuzhi>Linked Slashes</> consumes <shuzhi>6</> stacks of <shuzhi>Overload</>, additionally deal damage equal to <shuzhi>3,500%</> of ATK to nearby targets. This damage counts as skill damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds (unaffected by cooldown resetting or reduction effects).

<red>Physical-Flame</>: Receive <shuzhi>19</> seconds of Superspeed Mode. During Superspeed Mode, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>700%</> of ATK to nearby targets every second. Every time this damage hits a target, it grants the Wanderer a <shuzhi>10</>-second Shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP, up to <shuzhi>10%</> being added at a time. This Shield's maximum will not exceed <shuzhi>50%</> of the Wanderer's HP. Cooldown: <shuzhi>21</> seconds (unaffected by cooldown resetting or reduction effects).

<red>Altered</>: Receive <shuzhi>23</> seconds of Superspeed Mode. During Superspeed Mode, increase Max HP by <shuzhi>100%</>. At the same time, each attack landed by <shuzhi>Windrider</> and <shuzhi>Cloud Riding</> additionally deals damage equal to <shuzhi>166%</> of Max HP, not exceeding <shuzhi>30</> times of the Wanderer's ATK. This damage counts as skill damage and is unaffected by damage-boosting effects. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds (unaffected by cooldown resetting or reduction effects).

attacks.name: Flash Rider
attacks.desc:
Can be triggered during Superspeed Mode to deal multiple-phased linked slashes to nearby targets, dealing damage totalling to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Superspeed Mode ends after using this skill.

<shuzhi>Passive: Superspeed Inertia</>
Based on <shuzhi>Rumble's</> element, use Flash Rider to provide an additional effect.

<red>Frost-Volt</>: Consume all <shuzhi>Thermal Convergence</> stacks and gain Deepfreeze, which increases frost damage boost by <shuzhi>0.6%</> of <shuzhi>Thermal Convergence</> stack count. At the same time, deal frost damage equal to <shuzhi>500%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>Thermal Convergence</> stack count times <shuzhi>50%</> of ATK to nearby targets. This damage counts as passive damage and lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

<red>Altered</>: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>6,250%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP to nearby targets. This damage does not exceed <shuzhi>1,000</> times of the Wanderer's ATK, counts as skill damage, and is unaffected by damage-boosting effects.

attacks.name: Skyriding Slash
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: <shuzhi>Supersound's</> damage multiplier is increased to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of the target's all resistance (each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed 50%). When taking lethal damage, block the lethal damage 1 time and become immune to damage for a short period of time. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>60</> seconds. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

After using <shuzhi>Violent Energy</>, recover <shuzhi>6%</> Max HP every second for <shuzhi>10</> seconds (unaffected by healing boost effects). After Superspeed Mode ends, this HP recovery effect will be removed. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase final damage by <shuzhi>35%</>. This effect works in the off-hand slot.

passives: <shuzhi>Shifting</>: When <shuzhi>3</> altered weapons are equipped, increase all elemental damage by <shuzhi>30%</>. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
<shuzhi>Elemental Engine</>: <shuzhi>Rumble</> can actively switch its elemental type (while in the non-combat state). Go to the Skills > Settings page to switch elements.

<shuzhi>Explosive Energy: On-Field</>: When <shuzhi>Rumble</> lands any hit with normal attack, it deals damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of altered ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. This effect can trigger up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Explosive Energy damage is counted as normal attack damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/frost/physical/flame weapon of any kind equipped, Explosive Energy damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Explosive Energy damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Transverse: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Rumble</> is equipped, any weapon's discharge skill will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>73.2%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>1%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>36.6%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>134.3%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in combat, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is 1 frost/volt weapon of any kind equipped, Transverse damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Transverse damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Flame and Mass</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped flame/physical base ATK, the highest equipped flame/physical ATK percentage, and the highest equipped flame/physical damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a flame and a physical weapon.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Fire Dance: On-Field</>: When <shuzhi>Rumble</> lands any normal attack, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. This effect can trigger up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Fire Dance damage counts as normal attack damage. If Nola has <shuzhi>1</> frost or volt weapon equipped, then Fire Dance damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Fire Dance damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Overheat</>: For every summon created on the field, add <shuzhi>1</> stack of Sparks. When entering battle, immediately receive <shuzhi>8</> stacks of Sparks. Every stack of Sparks recovers <shuzhi>8%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP (Charge Count will not be restored when it reaches its limit), for up to <shuzhi>8</> stacks.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Frost and Volt</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped frost/volt base ATK, the highest equipped frost/volt ATK percentage, and the highest equipped frost/volt damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a frost and volt weapon.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Biting Frost: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Rumble</> is equipped, any weapon's discharge skill will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>73.2%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>1%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>36.6%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>134.3%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in combat, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is 1 physical or flame weapon of any kind equipped, Biting Frost damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Biting Frost damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Liquid Nitrogen</>: When <shuzhi>Rumble</> is equipped while entering combat, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. This damage boost is removed after using <shuzhi>Flash Rider</> and this effect can trigger up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>150</> seconds. While a Shield is active, final damage received by the Wanderer is reduced by <shuzhi>20%</>.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Volt and Frost</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped volt/frost base ATK, the highest equipped volt/frost ATK percentage, and the highest equipped volt/frost damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a volt and frost weapon.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Thunderboom: On-Field</>: When hitting any target with <shuzhi>Rumble</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of volt ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Thunderboom damage counts as normal attack damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> physical or flame weapon is equipped, Thunderboom damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Thunderboom damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.
<shuzhi>Shifting</>: When <shuzhi>3</> altered weapons are equipped, increase all elemental damage by <shuzhi>30%</>. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
<shuzhi>Elemental Engine</>: <shuzhi>Rumble</> can actively switch its elemental type (while in the non-combat state). Go to the Skills > Settings page to switch elements.

<shuzhi>Explosive Energy: On-Field</>: When <shuzhi>Rumble</> lands any hit with normal attack, it deals damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of altered ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. This effect can trigger up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Explosive Energy damage is counted as normal attack damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/frost/physical/flame weapon of any kind equipped, Explosive Energy damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Explosive Energy damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Surfing Tunes
fashions.desc: A motorcycle, a great sword mark the sound of the raging waves.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Surfing Tunes.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus boosts all elemental damage in the off-hand slot and enhances Alabaster Tiger's Frost Blade ability. The four-set bonus boosts frost weapons' damage. When Alabaster Tiger is equipped, additionally increase all attack.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The three-set bonus increases the charging speed of a frost team and makes them switch weapons quickly.

Paradox_fire.name: EP-7000 Skyfire
Paradox_fire.desc: Produced by Hykros Headquarters's Defense Ark's first manufacturing bureau, this special weapon was tailor-made for the Authorizer on rotation, Plotti, to meet her combat needs. Even picky Poppa was very satisfied.
Paradox_fire.lottery_desc: Produced by Hykros Headquarters's Defense Ark's first manufacturing bureau, this special weapon was tailor-made for the Authorizer on rotation, Plotti, to meet her combat needs. Even picky Poppa was very satisfied.

element.name: Armor Dissolve
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack inflicts Armor Dissolve on the target for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their flame and physical damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). This effect will replace the grievous status on the target, and targets with this effect cannot become grievous. Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

skills.name: Brilliant Colors
skills.desc: When in the overworld, on the ground, and in the non-combat state, hold dodge to place fireworks of a random style that explode after a short delay.

attacks.name: Standard Protocol
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Burst Fire Protocol
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Rapid Fire Protocol
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to fourth normal attacks to trigger Rapid Fire Protocol and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.

attacks.name: Energizing Protocol
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger a charged attack.
Fire a charged shot at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon hit.

attacks.name: Air Raid Protocol
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to fourth normal attacks to trigger an aerial branch attack and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.

attacks.name: Diving Protocol
attacks.desc: Hold dodge while in mid-air to trigger Diving Protocol, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> upon landing.

attacks.name: Brilliant Colors
attacks.desc: When in the overworld, on the ground, and in the non-combat state, hold dodge to place fireworks of a random style that explode after a short delay.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Recover <shuzhi>150</> endurance and clear the increased endurance consumption effect caused when firing explosive shots while <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> is in effect.

attacks.name: Assault Protocol
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Assault Protocol.
Summon a missile from space and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
While <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> is active, after triggering Assault Protocol, tap and hold normal attack to continuously fire explosive shots.

attacks.name: Propulsion Protocol
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Propulsion Protocol.
Fire a laser beam and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
While <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> is active, after triggering Assault Protocol, tap and hold normal attack to continuously fire explosive shots.

attacks.name: Airborne Protocol
attacks.desc:
Dodge attacks can be used while the Wanderer is airborne.
For every <shuzhi>2</> dodge attacks using <shuzhi>EP-7000 Skyfire</>, Poppa appears and uses a dodge attack as well, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>50% to 100%</> of the Wanderer's damage dealt based on Poppa's mood.
After every <shuzhi>2</> dodge attacks using <shuzhi>EP-7000 Skyfire</> or <shuzhi>1</> dodge attack using <shuzhi>EP-7000 Skyfire</> while <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> is in effect, reduce <shuzhi>Mirror Image's</> cooldown by <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time for each Mirror Image's cooldown.

attacks.name: Mirror Image
attacks.desc:
Roam between the mind and reality, creating <shuzhi>8</> Heart Mirror Walls around the Wanderer (these count as summons) and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. After using the skill, activate Poppa is Here for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, gaining the ability to fly as well as improved movement speed and jumping capabilities. Normal attack now fires explosive shots that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets upon hit and consumes endurance. After an explosive shot hits the ground, it will be transmitted to a Heart Mirror Wall and fired toward the locked-on target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. After Poppa is Here naturally ends, immediately gain <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge.
During Poppa is Here, increase final damage according to the distance in height between the Wanderer and the target hit, by up to <shuzhi>1%</>.
While in the combat state and Poppa is Here not active, Poppa will appear every <shuzhi>8</> seconds and fire a Heavy Energy Round I dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>590%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Extermination Protocol
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove debuffs from the Wanderer</> and activate the Satellite Ionic Beam upon switching to this weapon, summoning an ionic beam from the space station and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. At the same time, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League) and inflict <shuzhi>Armor Dissolve</> on targets hit.
After Extermination Protocol lands a hit, place up to <shuzhi>1</> Mirror on both the locked-on target and the Wanderer for <shuzhi>45</> seconds.
Mirror (Target): The damage dealt by the Wanderer will be reflected by Mirrors to other targets nearby for an additional <shuzhi>15%</> damage.
Mirror (Self): Ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of the target's Flame Resistance (each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed <shuzhi>50%</>). Whenever damage is taken, bounce back <shuzhi>20%</> of the damage received (no more than <shuzhi>500%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP). This effect can be triggered up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>3</> seconds. During cooldown, after Poppa appears, she will admire her reflection in the mirror, reducing this effect's cooldown by <shuzhi>1</> second.

advancements.desc: While <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> is active, Poppa will launch a <shuzhi>Heavy Energy Round II</> for every <shuzhi>7</> explosive shot fired, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>590%</> of ATK to nearby targets and then splits into several high explosives, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>660%</> of ATK to nearby targets.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

After Poppa appears, increase final damage by <shuzhi>12%</> and physical damage by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
After Poppa appears <shuzhi>5</> times, the next use of <shuzhi>Mirror Image</> will refresh Phantasia Cooldown and immediately trigger Phantasia.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Reduce <shuzhi>Heavy Energy Round I's</> trigger interval to <shuzhi>6</> seconds. When firing <shuzhi>Heavy Energy Round I</> or <shuzhi>Heavy Energy Round II</>, also fire a Healing Round that recovers <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.

<shuzhi>Mirror (Target)'s</> damage reflection effect can now also affect the target.
<shuzhi>Mirror (Self)'s</> damage reflection ratio is increased to <shuzhi>30%</> and the maximum reflected damage is increased to <shuzhi>800%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.
Additionally, while <shuzhi>Mirror (Self)</> is in effect, every time the Wanderer takes damage, additionally block damage equal to <shuzhi>10%</> of Max HP (excess damage will be taken normally, unavailable in Apex League). This effect can be triggered up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>3</> seconds. During cooldown, when Poppa appears and admires herself in the mirror, reduce the effect's cooldown by <shuzhi>1</> second.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Flame and Mass</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped flame/physical base ATK, the highest equipped flame/physical ATK percentage, and the highest equipped flame/physical damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a flame and a physical weapon.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Poppa: Detachment</>: After using <shuzhi>Mirror Image</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>87.5%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>12.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>45%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>168.8%</> of crit to the target every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Detachment damages will not stack. Poppa damage counts as skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt or frost weapon equipped, then Poppa's damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Poppa's damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: CP-3000 Terrafire
fashions.desc: Ablaze like the fires of hell, it unleashes its fury within the impregnable fortress.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: CP-3000 Terrafire.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK boost, while the four-set bonus provides an all elemental damage boost and a final damage boost, along with an excellent off-hand damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Linghan_ice.name: Alabaster Tiger
Linghan_ice.desc: With a flourish of sleeves and sword's dance divine, who can fathom the depths of this heart o' mine?
Linghan_ice.lottery_desc: With a flourish of sleeves and sword's dance divine, who can fathom the depths of this heart o' mine?

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Mooncutter
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and draw in enemies to the front of the Wanderer.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and launch the target.
After triggering Sword Art: Mooncutter, tap and hold normal attack to trigger <shuzhi>Sword Art: Endless Snow</>.

After any of <shuzhi>Alabaster Tiger's</> normal attacks land a hit, apply <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Crystalline Crack</> to the target, dealing normal attack damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Only <shuzhi>1</> stack of Crystalline Crack can be applied to the same target every <shuzhi>4</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>3</> times. The stacks will disappear one by one after the effect duration is over.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Plum Swordcry
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Endless Snow
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Sword Art: Endless Snow.
Use mind control to manipulate the sword while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
When Sword Art: Endless Snow ends, release a powerful sword aura, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Falling Frost
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Sword Art: Falling Frost.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time the target is hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Light Steps
attacks.desc:
While the Wanderer is airborne after double jumping, tap jump to trigger Light Steps. Briefly dash upward before continuously gliding. While airborne, Light Steps can be used up to <shuzhi>2</> times.
While on the ground, Light Steps recovers <shuzhi>1</> use attempt every <shuzhi>10</> seconds (switching areas, switching weapons, or unequipping <shuzhi>Alabaster Tiger</> will reset the use attempts).

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Cloud Shower
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Sword Art: Cloud Shower, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets hit.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Mortal Soul
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Sword Art: Mortal Soul. Release a White Tiger illusion to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Shadowy Ice
attacks.desc:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and draw them in. Then, form a Sword Array to summon a heavy rain of swords and <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) for <shuzhi>4</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After successfully using Sword Art: Shadowy Ice, the Wanderer emits <shuzhi>Cold Air</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to nearby targets every second, and also reducing the targets' speed by <shuzhi>30%</> (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses).
After completely executing Sword Art: Shadowy Ice, the Wanderer creates the maximum amount of <shuzhi>Frost Blades</>, firing <shuzhi>1</> blade every <shuzhi>7.5</> seconds at the currently locked-on target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}%</> of ATK and inflicting <shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</> on the target. There can be up to <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Frost Blades</> created initially, and all blades will be removed while in the non-combat state.
<shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</>: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>3</> seconds to nearby targets for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

attacks.name: Sword Art: Icy Beckon
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon a Sword Array around the Wanderer, engulfing the area in cold and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Soon after, summon a White Tiger to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, during which damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive</>: After Sword Art: Icy Beckon lands a hit, increase final damage by <shuzhi>8%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancements.desc: After launching <shuzhi>Frost Blades</>, the Wanderer's frost ATK is increased by <shuzhi>10%</> and nearby targets will be dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>80%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

The Wanderer can produce up to <shuzhi>4</> <shuzhi>Frost Blades</> and <shuzhi>Temperature Reduction's</> damage's base multiplier is increased to <shuzhi>360%</>.
If the target is the only one affected by <shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</> within <shuzhi>6</> seconds, additionally apply <shuzhi>Vein Seal</> to the target, reducing their speed by <shuzhi>30%</> (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses). If the target receives <shuzhi>Frost Blade</> damage again during <shuzhi>Vein Seal's</> duration, trigger Icy Burst, dealing skill damage equal to <shuzhi>1700%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>2%</> of the target's already-lost HP at that point (Icy Burst damage will be no lower than <shuzhi>2000%</> of the Wanderer's frost ATK and no higher than <shuzhi>2200%</> of the Wanderer's frost ATK). Then, remove the <shuzhi>Vein Seal</> and <shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</> effects on the target.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

The damage dealt by <shuzhi>Crystalline Crack</> and <shuzhi>Cold Air</> is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>. <shuzhi>Light Steps'</> use attempts is increased to <shuzhi>10</> and recovery rate is increased to <shuzhi>1</> attempt every <shuzhi>3</> seconds.

The <shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</> effect inflicted after firing <shuzhi>Frost Blades</> is now applied to an area and also deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>990%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

passives: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Extreme Cold: Unload</>: After using <shuzhi>Sword Art: Shadowy Ice</>, every second, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>70%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>36%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>135%</> of crit to targets hit for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Unload damage will not stack and Extreme Cold damage will be counted as skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/flame/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Extreme Cold damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Extreme Cold damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Flowerstream
fashions.desc: Atop the waves, where snowflakes dance.

Loslyn_ice.name: Calm Waters
Loslyn_ice.desc: The anchor removed from her grandpa's old ship "Calm Waters." It was modified and later became Roslyn's weapon.
Loslyn_ice.lottery_desc: The anchor removed from her grandpa's old ship "Calm Waters." It was modified and later became Roslyn's weapon.

element.name: Force Impact
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack applies Force Impact on the enemy for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their frost and volt damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). Force Impact replaces the target's grievous status, and targets with Force Impact cannot become grievous. Frost attacks will freeze targets with Force Impact for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and volt attacks will remove the buffs on targets with Force Impact. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Icebound Anchor Strike
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>6</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>6</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>6</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>14</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>10</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target down. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>20</> stacks of Chilling Strike.

attacks.name: Flying Anchor
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>6</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>6</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>6</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>14</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>10</> stacks of Chilling Strike.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>20</> stacks of Chilling Strike.

attacks.name: Still North Wind
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Still North Wind.
Swing forth Calm Waters to stir up a frosty whirlwind, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>15</> stacks of Chilling Strike.

attacks.name: Snowstorm Hurricane
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Snowstorm Hurricane.
The Wanderer follows Calm Waters for a spinning attack, consuming endurance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets each time they are hit.

attacks.name: Skyfall Anchor
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Skyfall Anchor.
Fall down from mid-air. During the course of landing, each hit on an enemy deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>8</> stacks of Chilling Strike.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Anchor of Cyclicity
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Anchor of Cyclicity, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead. Landing a hit breaks a target's <shuzhi>Icebound</> effect and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>15</> stacks of Chilling Strike.

attacks.name: Cold Anchor Meteor
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Cold Anchor Meteor, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead. Landing a hit breaks a target's <shuzhi>Icebound</> effect and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>10</> stacks of Chilling Strike.

attacks.name: Frostlink Aura
attacks.desc:
Swing both ends of Calm Waters to attack separately, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. When using the skill, receive <shuzhi>20</> seconds of hyperbody. While in <shuzhi>Bitter Cold</>, add <shuzhi>52</> stacks of Chilling Strike. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
Apply <shuzhi>15</> seconds of Flashfreeze to targets hit and reduce their ATK by <shuzhi>5%</>.

attacks.name: Bitter Strike
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and toss Calm Waters ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
After using Bitter Strike, enter Bitter Cold for <shuzhi>14</> seconds. During this state, certain attacks with <shuzhi>Calm Waters</> will apply Chilling Strike stacks to the target hit. The target's maximum Chilling Strike stacks is <shuzhi>100</>. Upon reaching the maximum number of stacks, the stack count will reset, and the target will be Icebound for <shuzhi>4</> seconds and also become <shuzhi>strongly frozen</> (<shuzhi>strong freeze</> is ineffective against bosses).
When an attack with Chilling Strike lands a hit on a target, recover <shuzhi>3%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.

advancements.desc: After using <shuzhi>Frostlink Aura</>, the Wanderer will receive a shield equal to <shuzhi>75%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
When an attack with <shuzhi>Chilling Strike</> hits a target, additionally deal damage equal to the number of <shuzhi>Chilling Strike</> stacks times <shuzhi>40%</> of ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Increase the duration for <shuzhi>Icebound</> to <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Increase the ATK reduction effect on <shuzhi>Flashfrozen</> targets to <shuzhi>10%</>.

After using <shuzhi>Frostlink Aura</>, the Wanderer will ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of targets' frost resistance (each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed <shuzhi>50%</>). At the same time, increase final damage by <shuzhi>18%</> for <shuzhi>40</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Frost and Volt</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped frost/volt base ATK, the highest equipped frost/volt ATK percentage, and the highest equipped frost/volt damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a frost and volt weapon.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Frost Edge: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Calm Waters</> is equipped, any weapon's discharge skill will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>0.97%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>73.2%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>36.6%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>134.3%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in combat, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is 1 physical/flame weapon of any kind equipped, Frost Edge damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Frost Edge damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

After Calm Waters is switched to the off-hand slot, deal burst damage equal to <shuzhi>400%</> of ATK 1 time. If an enemy has Flashfreeze, it will remove the Flashfreeze from the enemy and deal continuous off-hand damage equal to <shuzhi>700%</> of ATK each second for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

fashions.name: Clear Waves
fashions.desc: An improved replica of Calm Waters. It's more lightweight and easy to carry, making it suitable as field equipment.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Clear Wave.

attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Solar Shot.
Fire a charged shot at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target upon hit.

attacks.name: Electrified Flicker
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Electrified Flicker.
Fall down from mid-air. During the course of landing, each hit on an enemy deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Magnetoelectric Artillery
attacks.desc: Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Magnetoelectric Artillery, which has three strengths according to the length of time charged: deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, or <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to targets ahead. Max charge can execute non-boss targets (other than Wanderers) with up to 30% of Max HP remaining.

attacks.name: Cosmic Thunder
attacks.desc:
Switch Siege Edge to longsword form, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> (this does not accumulate <shuzhi>Electroblade</>). This skill has a cooldown of <shuzhi>20</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).
When <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is triggered: Using Cosmic Thunder provides nearby teammates with hyperbody for <shuzhi>10</> seconds; using Cosmic Thunder while <shuzhi>Electroblade Enhancement</> is in effect draws in nearby enemies and inflicts them with resistance reduction of <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

attacks.name: Magnetic Ray Cannon
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Siege Edge changes to EM Blaster form and unleashes a powerful blast, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead. When unleashing this blast, immune to damage for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
After using Magnetic Ray Cannon, increase the Wanderer's volt ATK by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds and enter Electromagnetic Disruption for <shuzhi>22</> seconds: During this time, the Wanderer gains hyperbody; using any volt weapon skill gives an additional <shuzhi>500</> weapon charge; volt damage has a <shuzhi>25%</> chance to trigger Chain Static, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of ATK to up to <shuzhi>7</> targets (this is counted as normal attack damage but does not trigger normal attack effects), and this effect can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds; defeating a target triggers Chain Static again, and this effect can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>0.1</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is triggered:
In Electromagnetic Disruption state, taunt nearby enemies every <shuzhi>2</> seconds and provide the Wanderer with a shield equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of Max HP that lasts for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance is not</> triggered:
In Electromagnetic Disruption state, <shuzhi>Siege Edge</> attacks inflict Static to targets upon hit, reducing their speed by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

advancements.desc:
When <shuzhi>Siege Edge</> is in the main slot, <shuzhi>Chain Static</> has a <shuzhi>25%</> chance to trigger Magnetic Tempest, dealing 500% of ATK as damage (this is counted as skill damage). This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>2</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>Siege Edge</> is switched to the off-hand slot when in the <shuzhi>Electromagnetic Disruption</> state, triggers a charge effect that lasts for <shuzhi>4</> seconds, granting <shuzhi>100</> weapon charge every second.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Any volt weapon skill or discharge, <shuzhi>Solar Shot</>, <shuzhi>Step-Back Shot</>, and <shuzhi>Magnetoelectric Artillery</> can give special energy. When fully charged, using <shuzhi>Magnetic Ray Cannon</> will consume all special energy and enhance <shuzhi>Electromagnetic Disruption</>: Chance of triggering <shuzhi>Chain Static</> and <shuzhi>Magnetic Tempest</> is increased to <shuzhi>100%</>.
Gives full special energy upon entering combat state.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

In enhanced <shuzhi>Electromagnetic Disruption</> state, increase damage multiplier of <shuzhi>Chain Static</> and <shuzhi>Magnetic Tempest</> by <shuzhi>100%</>.
When <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is triggered, using <shuzhi>Cosmic Thunder</> while <shuzhi>Electroblade Enhancement</> is in effect provides the user and nearby teammates with <shuzhi>20%</> damage reduction that lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds and a shield equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of the user's Max HP that lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Electroblade: Swift Cut</>: When equipped with <shuzhi>Siege Edge</>, weapon discharge skills deal damage equal to <shuzhi>0.97%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>73.2%</> of volt ATK plus <shuzhi>36.6%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>134.3%</> of crit to nearby targets. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage counts as discharge damage. If any physical or flame weapon is equipped, volt damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, volt damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

Electroblade and Electroblade Enhancement are cleared after exiting battle.

attacks.desc:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window to trigger a slowing magnetic field.
Venus fires a charged orb that explodes after traveling forward a set distance or coming in contact with targets. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and generate a slowing magnetic field for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, which reduces the movement speed and attack speed of all enemies caught within by <shuzhi>35%</>.
Dodging will trigger a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>67.7%</> of the Wanderer's ATK; for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds, a small Healing Chain will trigger every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, which heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>22.5%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Dodging grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Healing Chain enhance, which increases the effects of Healing Chains by <shuzhi>25%</>. Stacks up to <shuzhi>5</> times and lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Switching weapons doesn't cancel this effect.

attacks.name: Parallel Beams
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Parallel Beams.
Venus fires a pair of parallel energy beams, dealing piercing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Dodging will trigger a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>67.7%</> of the Wanderer's ATK; for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds, a small Healing Chain will trigger every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, which heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>22.5%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Dodging grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Healing Chain enhance, which increases the effects of Healing Chains by <shuzhi>25%</> (stack up to <shuzhi>5</> times) and lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Switching weapons doesn't cancel this effect.

attacks.name: Pulse Lock
attacks.desc: Venus fires a guided missile that explodes on contact with enemy targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking down targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

attacks.name: Particle Beam Burst
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and command Venus to fire a cross-shaped ray at the ground, creating an unstable area and slowing targets' movement speed by <shuzhi>70%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. After a brief delay, unleash an electromagnetic burst that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Using a discharge attack will spawn <shuzhi>1</> Electrode at the target's position that attacks once every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The Electrode gains <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's stats, can be attacked or healed, and loses <shuzhi>3%</> of its Max HP every second.
Only <shuzhi>1</> Electrode can exist at any given time, and summoning a new Electrode will replace the previous one.

advancements.desc: After using <shuzhi>Pulse Lock</> or <shuzhi>Particle Beam Burst</>, creates <shuzhi>1</> Electrode that immediately grants the user <shuzhi>5</> stacks of Healing Chain Enhance. In addition, unleash a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>135%</> of the Wanderer's ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Every <shuzhi>6</> seconds, the Electrode will unleash <shuzhi>Ring Lightning</>, which deals area damage equal to a maximum of <shuzhi>230%</> of ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
After using <shuzhi>Pulse Lock</>, increase the Wanderer's ATK by (<shuzhi>5</> + (Number of Electrodes <shuzhi>5</>))% for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
Up to <shuzhi>2</> Electrodes can be active at the same time. Summoning more Electrodes will replace the ones furthest from the user.

passives: <shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
<shuzhi>Volt Benediction</>: Increase the entire team's volt ATK by <shuzhi>5%</> when Benediction Resonance is active.

fashions.name: White Dwarf
fashions.desc: A shining star might look small, but it gives off unimaginable energy.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: White Dwarf.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases healing and damage output. The four-set bonus further dishes out extra damage output via healing.
The three-set bonus increases weapon charge, which enhances healing.

Frigg_ice.name: Balmung
Frigg_ice.desc: The greatsword and the saber belonging exclusively to the Angel of Clemency, Frigg. They were adapted to Frigg's cybernetic body when they were manufactured. The two weapons are not one and the same, but Frigg refers to them collectively as Balmung.
Frigg_ice.lottery_desc: The greatsword and the saber belonging exclusively to the Angel of Clemency, Frigg. They were adapted to Frigg's cybernetic body when they were manufactured. The two weapons are not one and the same, but Frigg refers to them collectively as Balmung.

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Normal Attack
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, initiate 5 attacks in a row with Balmung.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.

attacks.name: Aerial Discharge
attacks.desc:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Soaring Slash
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Soaring Slash.
Lunge forward with a horizontal swipe, then suspend the target mid-air before going airborne with the target. Deal a maximum of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

attacks.name: Helix Slash
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Helix Slash.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Multislash
attacks.desc:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window to trigger Multislash.
Unleash multiple slashes at a set distance in front of the user, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

attacks.name: Fimbulwinter
attacks.desc:
Slash the space around the Wanderer, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, launching and suspending targets and gaining damage immunity while this skill is in use. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After unleashing <shuzhi>"Fimbulwinter"</>, a large Frost Domain will be formed around the Wanderer for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Dodge attempts will not be consumed while dodging with Balmung within the Frost Domain.
