Grant "Domain of Frost I" when you are in the Frost Domain: When using a frost weapon, shatter is increased by <shuzhi>25%</> and frost ATK is increased by <shuzhi>15%</>.

attacks.name: Frigid Fracture
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and dash forward and attack, temporarily controlling surrounding enemies before unleashing a wide-area slash. Launch targets into the air and deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

advancements.desc:
Gain <shuzhi>1</> frostiness point every time you deal any elemental damage equal to <shuzhi>550%</>  frost ATK in the Frost Domain. Up to <shuzhi>10</> frostiness points can be accumulated.
When the Frost Domain ends, frostiness points  frost ATK  <shuzhi>95%</> of blast damage will be dealt to all enemies in the Frost Domain. After leaving the Frost Domain, lose <shuzhi>1</> frostiness point every <shuzhi>3</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Increase frostiness limit to <shuzhi>15</>. When using discharge skills of frost weapons in the Frost Domain, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>25%</> of frost ATK  (current frostiness + 5) to all the targets in the Frost Domain.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When shattering a shield with a frost weapon in the Frost Domain, freeze the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and deal additional damage equal to frostiness  <shuzhi>35%</> of frost ATK. If the target cannot be frozen, the additional damage dealt is doubled.
When frostiness reaches <shuzhi>15</> points and you are in the Frost Domain, you will get an additional "Domain of Frost II" that increases frost ATK by <shuzhi>25%</> when frost weapons are used.

passives: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases frost ATK and damage output. The four-set bonus enhances Balmung Frost Domain and increases damage output.
The three-set bonus increases damage output and benefits the attacking scenarios of Balmung.

funnel_fire.name: Spark
funnel_fire.desc: A special weapon Lin asked Mirroria R&D to make for Ruby. Its main functions include: Acting as the housekeeper in the play-house game, waking Ruby up in the morning, and leading the way for Ruby... But most importantly, protecting Ruby.
funnel_fire.lottery_desc: A special weapon Lin asked Mirroria R&D to make for Ruby. Its main functions include: Acting as the housekeeper in the play-house game, waking Ruby up in the morning, and leading the way for Ruby... But most importantly, protecting Ruby.

element.name: Flame
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for <shuzhi>8</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK every second. While ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Spark Attack
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> against each target.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> against each target and <shuzhi>launches</> targets.

attacks.name: Aerial Discharge
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> against each target.

attacks.name: Gotcha!
attacks.desc: Tap and hold normal attack or do this after Lockdown Zone is triggered to continuously fire searing energy beams at enemies in a target direction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Consumes Wanderer's endurance.

attacks.name: Blazing Dive
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Blazing Dive.
Envelop the body in energy before rapidly plunging into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Lockdown Zone
attacks.desc: After the second normal attack, hold the button during any attack to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against the target. The locked-on target is confined and burned for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, and damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> is dealt to the target every second (ineffective against bosses).

attacks.name: Go, Dolly!
attacks.desc: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against them, as well as taunting them for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Sparkling Collider
attacks.desc:
Spark fires out Sparks that last for 15 seconds and bounce between the target and the Wanderer. Upon hitting the target, the Sparks slow it down for <shuzhi>4</> seconds with a <shuzhi>15</>-second cooldown. Sparks deal more damage the further they travel. Upon landing a hit, they will deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflict a <shuzhi>25</>-second Emblazen mark on the target. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets, with each bullet dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> against its target. Spark's normal attacks deal <shuzhi>30%</> more damage to Emblazen-marked targets. When Sparks hit targets burned by the Wanderer, they burn or ignite the target once and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are counted together) and will automatically tally again 1 time. The result calculation cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds and the skill cooldown is <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: When Sparks is active, each time Spark Attack or Sparks deals damage, the Wanderer gains <shuzhi>1</> point of Heat with a <shuzhi>0.9</>-second cooldown, for up to <shuzhi>8</> points of Heat. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Wanderer gains the effect Ultimate Heat, increasing flame ATK by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

attacks.name: Supernova
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting wide-area searing energy beams forward before eventually exploding, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. When Sparks hits targets burned by the Wanderer, it burns or ignites the target 1 time and deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are tallied together). The burn tally cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Emblazen increases the damage of Spark Attack to <shuzhi>80%</>. Skill cooldown drops to <shuzhi>24</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Emblazen increases flame boost by <shuzhi>8%</> and the burn tally multiplier to <shuzhi>75%</>.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Restore an additional <shuzhi>75</> points of weapon charge each time Spark Attack hits an enemy. Cooldown: 0.9 seconds. Shatter increases by <shuzhi>25%</> when Ultimate Heat is active.
Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark Attack to <shuzhi>160%</> and doubles Heat acquisition efficiency. Skill cooldown drops to <shuzhi>16</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

fashions.name: Falling Flames
fashions.desc: A magical creation that contains mysterious energy in the picture book Crimson Tale. It's also Little Red Riding Hood's closest friend.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Falling Flames.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases flame ATK and damage output. The four-set bonus increases flame damage and benefits the attacking scenarios of Spark.
The three-set bonus increases ATK and benefits the attack range of Spark.

Dkatana_ice.name: Heartstream
Dkatana_ice.desc: A special tachi that adapts to the Super Flow experiments. It is able to sense the user's mental state and generate Sword Shadow to assist in combat at the right time.
Dkatana_ice.lottery_desc: A special tachi that adapts to the Super Flow experiments. It is able to sense the user's mental state and generate Sword Shadow to assist in combat at the right time.

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Ragestream
attacks.desc:
Launch 5 Heartstream attacks while on the ground.
The first attack deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> damage to the target and launches the target into the air.

attacks.name: Airsplit
attacks.desc:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Excited Flow: Vortex
attacks.desc:
In the Excited Flow mode, tap and hold normal attack to trigger the skill.
Dash forward with a swirling multi-attack, dealing a maximum of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

attacks.name: Silent Flow: Barrier
attacks.desc:
In the Silent Flow mode, hold normal attack immediately or while launching normal attacks to trigger the skill.
Hold the attack button to keep the Anticipation. Release the button to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. When hit during the attacking period, blocks <shuzhi>20%</> of your Max HP.

attacks.name: Frostfall
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Polar Front
attacks.desc:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging.
Dash and spin to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Excited Flow: Flashing Stream
attacks.desc: Dash toward the target and temporarily immobilize enemies along the path, dealing delayed damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

attacks.name: Silent Flow: Concentrated Stream
attacks.desc:
Cast the Silent Flow skills to begin charging for up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds, continuously taunting nearby targets and absorbing damage up to <shuzhi>60%</> of Max HP. At the end of the charge, deal frost damage equal to <shuzhi>408%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>50%</> of absorbed damage to targets, and <shuzhi>20%</> of the unconsumed value is converted to HP recovery. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Enter Silent Flow when Fortitude Resonance is activated. <shuzhi>Excited Flow: Flashing Stream</> is replaced by <shuzhi>Silent Flow: Concentrated Stream</>. Enter Excited Flow when Fortitude Resonance is not activated.
The Wanderer can gain Sword Shadow, which follows them around when using Saki Fuwa's skills. Sword Shadow will release Surge when the Wanderer uses Saki Fuwa's branch skills or discharge skills, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>175%</> of frost ATK. Cooldown of Surge: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
While in Excited Flow: Sword Shadow will release Flow when the Wanderer deals damage with any weapon, which inflicts damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of frost ATK on the first hit target and recovers HP equal to <shuzhi>57%</> of the damage. The maximum recovery each time cannot exceed <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds.
While in Silent Flow: After Sword Shadow releases Surge, the Wanderer obtains <shuzhi>3</> blocks for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, and the maximum block capacity cannot exceed <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP. Each successful block deals Counterattack damage equal to <shuzhi>225%</> of frost ATK to the target, and the shatter of Surge increases by <shuzhi>100%</> with an added taunt effect.

attacks.name: Heartlotus
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and dash toward the target with a combo attack, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

advancements.desc: When Frost Resonance is activated, all weapon skill cooldowns are cleared every <shuzhi>5</> times weapon skills are used, and the damage of Flow and Counterattack is increased by <shuzhi>1</> time for the next <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Excited Flow: Increase the damage of Sword Shadow: Surge to <shuzhi>350%</> of frost ATK.
Silent Flow: The cooldown of Sword Shadow: Surge becomes <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Freeze time and trigger Phantasia upon Surge hitting the target. Share cooldown with the Phantasia triggered by dodging.

Upon hitting a target with Surge, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>11%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
Upon triggering block with Sword Shadow, reduce the frost damage dealt by nearby enemy targets by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

fashions.name: Ultimate Pure White
fashions.desc: "Ultimate justice! Ultimate valor! The Ultimate Warriors who give Night City ultimate protection! Elegant, pure, mighty! Super, super ultimate!"
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the Simulacrum Haute Couture: Ultimate Pure White.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases the off-hand DPS and control abilities of a frost team. The four-set bonus further enhances the DPS of a frost team.
The three-set bonus increases the charging speed of a frost team and makes them switch weapons quickly.

fan_superpower.name: Shadoweave
fan_superpower.desc: The initial design shows it to be a lightweight and covert concealed weapon, but it's changed to a heavy blade by the user's own request. It's heavy and not like a concealed weapon at all.
fan_superpower.lottery_desc: The initial design shows it to be a lightweight and covert concealed weapon, but it's changed to a heavy blade by the user's own request. It's heavy and not like a concealed weapon at all.

element.name: Altered Damage
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Additionally, inflict damage equal to <shuzhi>25%</> of all damage received by the target during the duration of the mark, up to a total of <shuzhi>560%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Only 1 mark can exist on a target at a time.

attacks.name: Normal Attack
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use Shadoweave to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>. 
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Aerial Discharge
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Scattered Soil
attacks.desc:
After the second normal attack on the ground or in mid-air, hold normal attack to trigger Scattered Soil.
Attack the target position, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target down.
Passive: After unleashing Scattered Soil on the ground, rapidly tapping normal attack will immediately unleash Brief Bloom (the 3rd stack).

attacks.name: Brief Bloom
attacks.desc:
Hold normal attack to unleash Brief Bloom. Can be charged for up to 3 stacks, gaining hyperbody and control immunity during charging.
First stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

attacks.name: Falling Shadow
attacks.desc:
Hold normal attack in mid-air to trigger Falling Shadow.
Plummet from the skies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target down.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Leafy Green
attacks.desc:
Unleash Leafy Green at the target while performing a backflip, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, generating <shuzhi>13</> epiphyllums upon hit, and forming a Green Field that lasts for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. When enemies in the Green Field lock onto the Wanderer, their movement speed is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.
Passive: Can be unleashed on the ground or mid-air.
Passive: Immediately break the control if under control effect and automatically release Leafy Green without using any dodge attempts. Skill cooldown lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

attacks.name: Moonlight Realm
attacks.desc:
Create a Moonlight Realm around yourself for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Your attack in the realm is increased by <shuzhi>15%</>, jumping ability increased by <shuzhi>20%</>, and endurance consumption reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Enter the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm. Your fall speed is greatly reduced and you can perform multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target. Upon hit, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and randomly generate <shuzhi>13</> epiphyllums.

Passive: In the Moonlight Realm, <shuzhi>1</> epiphyllum will be generated near 1 target every <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds. 
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, an extra <shuzhi>50%</> of damage is dealt to enemies with less than <shuzhi>20%</> HP.
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, you will blink away from the target when incoming damage is detected. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Passive: Weapons Master
Flame: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 flame weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Flame: Moonlight Realm. When a target is burned while in Flame: Moonlight Realm, they are burned for an extra <shuzhi>4</> seconds. Targets with shield take an extra <shuzhi>15%</> flame damage. 

Volt: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 volt weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Volt: Moonlight Realm. While in Volt: Moonlight Realm, dodging has a <shuzhi>65%</> chance of not consuming a dodge attempt, dodge attacks deal <shuzhi>5%</> additional damage, and volt damage is increased by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Frost: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 frost weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Frost: Moonlight Realm. While in Frost: Moonlight Realm, frost ATK is increased by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Physical: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 physical weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Physical: Moonlight Realm. While in Physical: Moonlight Realm, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets within attack range every second.

Balance: When Shadoweave is paired with any two different elemental weapons (among flame, volt, frost, and physical weapons), the Wanderer's ATK is increased by <shuzhi>15%</> in the realm, and counted as activating flame, volt, frost, and physical resonance without resonance effects.

attacks.name: Gravity Weave
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Gravity Weave with a stronger absorption force, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Then explode and create a ranged diffusion wave after <shuzhi>5</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> + <shuzhi>{3}</>. Damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc:
Normal attacks now deal area damage upon hit.
When there is another epiphyllum within the epiphyllum explosion area, increase the damage of each of the subsequent epiphyllum explosions by <shuzhi>10%</>, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>50%</>.
The epiphyllum generation interval from <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</> is now reduced to <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

The epiphyllum generation interval from <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</> is now reduced to <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds.
Epiphyllums will attach to the enemy.
The duration of <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</> is now increased to <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
When under the effect of <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</>, gain <shuzhi>30</> weapon charge every second and increase the damage of discharge skill by <shuzhi>15%</>.

Switch modes on <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</> up to <shuzhi>2</> times. Gain <shuzhi>1</> attempt after skill cooldown and another <shuzhi>1</> attempt by charging discharge.
Use any weapon discharge <shuzhi>3</> times to gain <shuzhi>+1</> on the <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</> count. Effective even when Shadoweave is in the off-hand slot.
When under the effect of <shuzhi>Moonlight Realm</>, increase attack by <shuzhi>23%</>.

passives: When pairing Shadoweave with other weapons, the <shuzhi>Weapons Master</> effect can be created.

Epiphyllum will appear around the target randomly and explode within <shuzhi>13</> seconds, dealing <shuzhi>37.5%</> area damage. <shuzhi>Flying Petals: On-Field</>: When landing any hit with <shuzhi>Shadoweave</>, it deals damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>320%</> of altered ATK plus <shuzhi>4.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>166%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>6.1%</> of crit. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. The Flying Petals damage counts as normal attack damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/frost/physical/flame weapon of any kind equipped, Flying Petals damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Flying Petals damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Misty Weave
fashions.desc: The wind blown by this fan seems cooler than before... Though it may just be the visual effects which make it seem that way?
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Misty Weave.

fashions.name: Coral Weave
fashions.desc: Even at the bottom of the sea, Coral Weave seems to withstand the current and emit a gentle breeze. Although it may not be as easy to conceal in the darkness as before, its appearance is now far more stunning.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Coral Weave.

fashions.name: Chilling Fireworks
fashions.desc: The chilling wind and the quiet night. When it stirs, it's as if there's a burst of fireworks fluttering, soaring, and dancing into the sky.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Chilling Fireworks.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases ATK and DPS. The four-set bonus further enhances damage via the wind field.
The three-set bonus increases ATK and benefits the attack range of Shadoweave.

tianlang_thunder.name: Thunderbreaker
tianlang_thunder.desc: This long spear covered in lightning is the SMA1-TS00-Thunderbreaker. It is able to unleash the stored power through unimaginable means. The electric field that it generates disrupts the mind of its wielder, so it cannot be mastered by ordinary people.
tianlang_thunder.lottery_desc: This long spear covered in lightning is the SMA1-TS00-Thunderbreaker. It is able to unleash the stored power through unimaginable means. The electric field that it generates disrupts the mind of its wielder, so it cannot be mastered by ordinary people.

element.name: Volt
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly paralyze</> targets for <shuzhi>1</> second and electrify them for <shuzhi>6</> seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. Electrified targets can't receive any buffs for the next <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

attacks.name: Normal Attack Passive
attacks.desc: When wielding Thunderbreaker, hitting the target <shuzhi>4</> times with normal attack will charge the weapon, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> charge points. After charging, any Electromancy dodge skill triggers electrocution with lightning. Lightning damage dealt equals <shuzhi>3%</> of HP lost (but no lower than <shuzhi>100%</> of Volt ATK, and no higher than <shuzhi>1,000%</> of Volt ATK), and triggers Electrified Entity, which deals area volt damage equal to <shuzhi>2%</> of HP lost (no lower than <shuzhi>40%</> of Volt ATK, and no higher than <shuzhi>400%</> of Volt ATK).

attacks.name: Mizar
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, initiate 6 attacks in a row with Thunderbreaker.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Megrez
attacks.desc:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Phecda
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger.
Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target and gather enemies around you.

attacks.name: Merak
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Alioth
attacks.desc:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging.
Dash to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Dubhe
attacks.desc:
Unleash a barrage of attacks, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies within range, and transform enemies or your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities. Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Gain Volt Sense when Dubhe is used: Scan the other two equipped weapons when unleashing skills. Each time a volt weapon is sensed, volt damage increases by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon discharge skill, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP (no less than <shuzhi>100%</> of volt ATK, no more than <shuzhi>1,000%</> of volt ATK).

When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge skill consumes <shuzhi>30%</> of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the consumed HP (no less than <shuzhi>400%</> volt ATK, no more than <shuzhi>3,000%</> volt ATK). After <shuzhi>8</> seconds or when HP is lower than <shuzhi>10%</>, recover <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds (not affected by any healing effects). The recovery effect cannot be stacked.

attacks.name: Obliterator
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Thunderbreaker unleashes wide-range volt damage, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and transforms enemies or your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities. Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time.

Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon discharge skill, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP (no less than <shuzhi>100%</> volt ATK, no more than <shuzhi>1,000%</> volt ATK).

When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge consumes <shuzhi>30%</> of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the consumed HP (no less than <shuzhi>400%</> of volt ATK and no more than <shuzhi>3,000%</> of volt ATK). After <shuzhi>8</> seconds or when HP is lower than <shuzhi>10%</>, recover <shuzhi>5%</> missing HP every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds (not affected by healing effects). The recovery effect cannot be stacked.

advancements.desc: Gain 1 stack of Superconductor per charge: Increase Max HP by <shuzhi>7.5%</> but increase damage received by <shuzhi>2%</> (except when the current HP is lower than 50 times of volt ATK and no HP Shield is equipped), stacking up to <shuzhi>8</> times. Lose 1 stack if no Superconductor gets refreshed within <shuzhi>6</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Release any volt weapon skill or discharge skill to get <shuzhi>2</> charges. Gain hyperbody at <shuzhi>8</> Superconductor stacks.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Each Superconductor stack increases final damage by <shuzhi>1%</>.
Boost Dubhe's Volt Sense: For every 1 other volt weapon sensed, gain <shuzhi>10%</> volt damage boost for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activated by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

recommended_matrices.reason: Both the 2-piece and the 4-piece set increase the off-hand damage of Thunderbreaker in a volt group.
The 3-piece set increases the damage dealt when HP is low, making it a great match for Thunderbreaker.

arm_physic.name: Vesper
arm_physic.desc: A support weapon custom-made for an insider of the Maidelin Foundation. Ms. Maidelin believes that Lyra could make proper use of it.
arm_physic.lottery_desc: A support weapon custom-made for an insider of the Maidelin Foundation. Ms. Maidelin believes that Lyra could make proper use of it.

element.name: Grievous
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for <shuzhi>7</> seconds, increasing their damage received by <shuzhi>20%</> and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. When in <yellow_lbl_14_1>team play</>, physical damage dealt to grievous targets is increased by an additional <shuzhi>20%</>.

attacks.name: Normal Vesper Attack Passive
attacks.desc:
<ComLblGreen>Enlightenment</>: Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack without Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you carry  <shuzhi>2.1%</> of ATK (no more than 12.6%  ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.

Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack with Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you and teammates carry  <shuzhi>1.5%</> of ATK (no more than 12%  ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.
<ComLblGreen>Glowing</>: Upon hit, all of Vesper's normal attacks recover HP equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK.
<ComLblGreen>Sacred Strike</>: Vesper's aerial attack and Accumulator can convert 60% of charge to shatter.
<ComLblGreen>Guard</>: For every <shuzhi>15%</> loss of Max HP or every <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge gained, obtain up to <shuzhi>5</> Enlightenment Guards for yourself (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Enlightenment Guards lasts for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. If you have the maximum number of Enlightenment Guards, the newly produced Enlightenment Guards will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to <shuzhi>48%</> of ATK, then disappear. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects.

Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not regarded as a support weapon.

attacks.name: Normal Vesper Attack
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use Vesper to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back significantly. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Frustration
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap normal attack to unleash Frustration. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and consumes <shuzhi>10</> endurance. The last hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launches the target.
When unleashing Frustration, grab the target if possible and throw it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> in total.

attacks.name: Accumulator
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack for up to <shuzhi>3</> charges. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target upon hit, and become immune from damage and control effects during an Accumulator attack. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

attacks.name: Shimmer
attacks.desc: Tap and hold normal attack during normal attacks or after dodging to unleash Shimmer. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and consumes <shuzhi>10</> endurance. Release to trigger Accumulator.

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger 3 mid-air charges. Release to pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

attacks.name: Mind Capture
attacks.desc: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger <shuzhi>Shimmer</> after unleashing <shuzhi>Mind Capture</>.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds and recover <shuzhi>250</> endurance.

attacks.name: Forgiveness Guard
attacks.desc:
<ComLblGreen>Forgiveness Guard</>: When the healing effect overflows, gain an HP Shield equal to up to <shuzhi>25%</> of Max HP. When Vesper has Forgiveness Guard, different guard effects are activated under different Resonances.
<ComLblGreen>Benediction Guard</>: The skill is replaced with <shuzhi>Shinerise</>, and the Wanderer earns no more Enlightenment Guard, which is converted to Forgiveness Guard for teammates. Earn 1 Forgiveness Guard for each <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP healed, and grant up to 1 Forgiveness Guard to every teammate. If every teammate has one, Forgiveness Guard deals physical damage equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of ATK to an enemy and disappears. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Also, increase Max HP by <shuzhi>10%</> for self and teammates. This effect cannot be stacked.
<ComLblGreen>Attack Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Fortitude Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain healing, restoring <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP per second for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Balance Guard</>: When HP is more than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>. When HP is less than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>10%</>.

attacks.name: Starfall
attacks.desc: Leap toward the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> it. Inflict an Enlightenment mark on the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

attacks.name: Shinerise
attacks.desc: Pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> targets in front, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and summoning up to <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Blades</> for <shuzhi>75</> seconds (up to 1 Blade every 2 meters). This skill can be used up to <shuzhi>3</> times, with a cooldown of <shuzhi>20</> seconds each time. When 2 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist on the field, a <shuzhi>Clearshine</> is created. When a <shuzhi>Blade</> is touched, it heals targets within the movement radius, restoring HP equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of the target's ATK. When 3 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist, a <shuzhi>Nebula</> is created. When a <shuzhi>Blade</> is touched, it damages targets within the movement radius, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK  movement distance / <shuzhi>5</>m.

skills.name: Chanting Sigh
skills.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another<shuzhi> removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

attacks.name: Chanting Sigh
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: When releasing any weapon skill or discharge, if your Guards are at the maximum, the Guard duration will be refreshed, dealing physical damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of physical ATK  number of Guards to the enemy. Up to 8 Guards when under the effect of Benediction, and up to 6 when without it.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Increase all damage dealt by Guards by <shuzhi>20%</>, and increase the guarded target's final damage by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>10 seconds</> when releasing any weapon skill or discharge under the effect of Benediction Resonance.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Forgiveness Guard: After releasing Resonance 5 times, receive <shuzhi>1</> chance to negate lethal damage for the wielder and the guarded target. After a teammate negates lethal damage, they will consume Forgiveness Guard and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. Unavailable in Apex League.
Enlightenment Guard: After releasing Resonance 5 times and when having Enlightenment Guard, the wielder receives <shuzhi>2</> chances to negate lethal damage. Stack up to <shuzhi>5</> times. After the wielder negates lethal damage, they will consume 1 stack of Enlightenment Guard and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. Unavailable in Apex League.

When unleashing any weapon skill or discharge, the increase of final damage and healing depends on the number of Guards. Each Guard increases final damage and healing by <shuzhi>1.6%</>, up to <shuzhi>8%</> for <shuzhi>25 seconds</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
<shuzhi>Physical Benediction</>: Increase the entire team's physical ATK by <shuzhi>5%</> when Benediction Resonance is active.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus enhances the damage and recovery of Vesper while it's in the main slot. The four-set bonus further enhances Vesper's survivability while it's in the main slot.
The three-set bonus gives a damage boost to grievous targets, benefitting Vesper while it's in the main slot.

Rubilia_thunder.name: Lost Art
Rubilia_thunder.desc: A gentle swing in the chaotic abyss will stir up a tempest that affects everyone's fate.
Rubilia_thunder.lottery_desc: A gentle swing in the chaotic abyss will stir up a tempest that affects everyone's fate.

element.name: Volt
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly paralyze</> targets for <shuzhi>1</> second and electrify them for <shuzhi>6</> seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. Electrified targets can't receive any buffs for the next <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

attacks.name: Wingspan
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.

attacks.name: Suppress
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Advance
attacks.desc: While attacking on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Advance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Descent
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Descent.
Dive through the air, consuming endurance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Pillage
attacks.desc:
Tap normal attack during the perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging forward) to trigger Pillage, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
Using Pillage can trigger <shuzhi>Feedback</>.

attacks.name: Swarm
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Swarm, summoning two Abyssant illusions which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
Using Swarm can trigger <shuzhi>Feedback</>.

attacks.name: Weave
attacks.desc: When on the ground, holding any dodge can trigger Weave, dashing for a distance toward the sky (does not work in areas where Jetpack can't be used).

attacks.name: Seal
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Seal, launching a hive consciousness forward which controls Grayspace Entities that it hits, turning them into allies for <shuzhi>60</> seconds (does not work on bosses).
The control state is removed when Seal is used again on an affected target or its duration ends, dealing <shuzhi>45%</> of all damage dealt by the Wanderer during the control period.
The hive consciousness can be resisted by non-Grayspace Entity targets, which are not affected by this control effect.

attacks.name: Field
attacks.desc:
Dash rapidly between two points <shuzhi>10</> times, drawing in nearby targets and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Each dash absorbs <shuzhi>10%</> of the Max HP of all Crystamax thorns (unavailable in Apex League), and deals additional damage equal to the number of Crystamax thorns times <shuzhi>40%</> of ATK, or the number of Crystamax thorns times <shuzhi>1%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, whichever is greater, until the Crystamax thorns are exhausted.
The <shuzhi>HP loss ratio</> of the Crystamax thorns' Max HP counts as the <shuzhi>HP loss ratio</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.

attacks.name: Harrah's Embrace
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon Harrah to cast <shuzhi>12</> Tempest Rounds, each of which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this, the Wanderer gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>7%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds after successfully using Harrah's Embrace. In addition, generate <shuzhi>3</> Crystamax thorns (up to <shuzhi>5</> can exist at one time). Crystamax thorns start with <shuzhi>100%</> Max HP, are unable to be attacked, can only be healed by <shuzhi>Feedback</>, and last for <shuzhi>150</> seconds.
Gain <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Feedbacks</> after Harrah's Embrace lands an attack (can stack up to <shuzhi>4</> times). Lost Art consumes <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Feedback</> every dodge attack, dealing damage to the target equal to the number of Crystamax thorns times <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK, recovering <shuzhi>25%</> of Max HP to all Crystamax thorns, and resetting Crystamax thorn location and duration.
After landing a hit with Harrah's Embrace, gain <shuzhi>1</> opportunity to dodge without consuming a dodge attempt.

advancements.desc: After triggering <shuzhi>Feedback</>, every Crystamax thorn will deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>66.7%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>2</> seconds for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Using the weapon skill or the discharge skill of any other weapon will generate <shuzhi>1</> Crystamax thorn.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Increase <shuzhi>Feedback's</> Max HP recovery of Crystamax thorns to <shuzhi>50%</>.
After successfully using Harrah's Embrace, increase volt damage by an additional <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

fashions.name: Swan Song
fashions.desc: Final regards from her.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Swan Song.

recommended_matrices.reason: Two-set bonuses and four-set bonuses greatly increase the damage bonus of volt weapons.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
Deals additional damage. Beneficial for Rubilia's multi-stage attacks.

iceblade_ice.name: Unyielding Wing
iceblade_ice.desc: Combat armor crafted with a foot-blade as its core. Powered by the user's mental energy, it is the result of cutting-edge science and technology from before the Cataclysm, and explodes with terrifying power when necessary.
iceblade_ice.lottery_desc: Combat armor crafted with a foot-blade as its core. Powered by the user's mental energy, it is the result of cutting-edge science and technology from before the Cataclysm, and explodes with terrifying power when necessary.

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Swan Arc
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use Unyielding Wing to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back significantly.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Sweeping Combo
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air and consume endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.

attacks.name: Dancing Flash
attacks.desc:
While using Swan Arc, tap and hold normal attack to pull the targets together and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all targets within range. The last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: After entering Latent State for <shuzhi>4</> seconds or using any weapon skill, become immune to damage during the next Dancing Flash.

attacks.name: Sweeping Dive
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit and continuously consume endurance.

attacks.name: Waltz
attacks.desc: Tap and hold normal attack to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time the target is hit. The last hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain <shuzhi>hyperbody</> during this time and continuously consume endurance.

attacks.name: Dance Form
attacks.desc: After dodging backward, tap normal attack 3 times consecutively to deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target with the first hit.

attacks.name: Latent State
attacks.desc: Dodge before holding to enter Latent State, during which endurance is constantly consumed and speed is increased by <shuzhi>50%</>. Increase speed by an additional <shuzhi>50%</> in the Chilling Field. When exiting Latent State, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all nearby targets and freeze them for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Chilling Field
attacks.desc:
Pull nearby targets together, then deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to them and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them. The Wanderer enters the Chilling Field for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Gain hyperbody when activating the skill.
<red>Passive</>: When using any frost weapon discharge skill in the Chilling Field, deal Hoarfrost Damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> 1 time and slow the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (the slow effect is ineffective against bosses). While in the field, for every <shuzhi>12</> times Unyielding Wing's hit effect is triggered, further triggers Spatial Slice, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> 1 time to targets in the space every 2 seconds for <shuzhi>25</> seconds (this also stops when the space disappears).

skills.name: Starry Night
skills.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

attacks.name: Starry Night
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Receive Alyss's support when using any frost weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward. Alyss's supporting discharge skill and skill damage is equal to <shuzhi>70%</> of her skill's original damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Receive Alyss's Support every time Starry Night is triggered and increase Starry Night and Hoarfrost Damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>12</> seconds. Stack up to <shuzhi>3</> times.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Increase the damage of Unyielding Wing's normal attack and Spatial Slice by <shuzhi>35%</>. The Wanderer receives Alyss's Protection upon taking lethal damage, protecting the Wanderer from death 1 time and making the Wanderer immune to damage for a short time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
Increase frost damage by <shuzhi>12%</> when Alyss's Support reaches 3 stacks.

passives: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

fashions.name: Platinum Wings
fashions.desc: Unyielding Wing is converted to Platinum Armor Form to make Alyss even mightier.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Platinum Wings.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus and four-set bonus greatly increase Unyielding Wing's damage boost, and have certain off-hand slot abilities, allowing them to be used with weapons of other elements.
The three-set bonus increases the charging speed of a frost team and makes them switch weapons quickly.

Killknife_physic.name: Equilibrium
Killknife_physic.desc: With rules, the universe is in balance. After thousands of trials, only the sharpest remain. Without bias, all colors wither and fade. Like the clouds, justice rains swords upon the earth.
Killknife_physic.lottery_desc: With rules, the universe is in balance. After thousands of trials, only the sharpest remain. Without bias, all colors wither and fade. Like the clouds, justice rains swords upon the earth.

element.name: Armor Dissolve
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack inflicts Armor Dissolve on the target for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their flame and physical damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). This effect will replace the grievous status on the target, and targets with this effect cannot become grievous. Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Streaming Light and Ink
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

attacks.name: Purecloud Skies
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

attacks.name: Realm of the Profound
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, hold normal attack when using the third normal attack to trigger Realm of the Profound.
Throw Equilibrium toward the ground, forming a whirling blade that spins outward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspending targets in the air.

attacks.name: Falling Moonleaf
attacks.desc:
While airborne, hold normal attack to trigger Falling Moonleaf.
Fall from the air and land on the ground, unleashing Equilibrium and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and launching them. As Equilibrium expands and retracts, it slightly pulls in nearby targets and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Dancing Shadows
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Dancing Shadows and fling out Equilibrium, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Cloud Carver
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging backward to trigger Cloud Carver, randomly throwing <shuzhi>8</> pairs of homing blades that go after random targets ahead, dealing total area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> upon hit.

attacks.name: Frigid Brilliance
attacks.desc: Hold normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Frigid Brilliance, continuously throwing homing blades that go after targets ahead, exploding upon hit and dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Upon release, leap and fling out Equilibrium ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Can hold for up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds, after which time Equilibrium will automatically be thrown.

attacks.name: Cloud-Piercing Whirl
attacks.desc: While on the ground or airborne, dodge backward and hold dodge to trigger Cloud-Piercing Whirl. After briefly charging, release to transform into a beam of light and fly forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Charging for longer increases the flight distance. Can hold for up to <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Enduring Rotation
attacks.desc:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and obtain hyperbody for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. When <shuzhi>Enduring Rotation</> ends, obtain <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Searing Blades</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds (<shuzhi>Searing Blades</> can be obtained once every <shuzhi>20</> seconds). Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Searing Blades</>: When dealing <shuzhi>physical</> or <shuzhi>flame</> dodge attack damage to a target, consume <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Searing Blade</> and deal additional damage of the weapon's corresponding element equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and inflict them with <shuzhi>armor dissolve</>. After dealing damage, restore <shuzhi>1</> dodge attempt and increase final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. This damage counts as normal attack damage and can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>2.8</> seconds.

attacks.name: Sky-Piercing Meteor
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and quickly spin Equilibrium to create a razor-like wind and charge forward like a storm, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Increase number of <shuzhi>Searing Blades</> obtained when using <shuzhi>Enduring Rotation</> to <shuzhi>4</>. Decrease cooldown of <shuzhi>Searing Blade</> to be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>1.8</> second(s).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of target's physical resistance and <shuzhi>15%</> of target's flame resistance. (Each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed 50%)
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When consuming a <shuzhi>Searing Blade</>, obtain a shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Shield cannot exceed <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP, and <shuzhi>50%</> of the exceeding amount will be converted to healing.
Increase damage of <shuzhi>Searing Blade</> to <shuzhi>2600%</>. After consuming a <shuzhi>Searing Blade</>, increase final damage by an additional <shuzhi>8%</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the currently equipped weapon's highest physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flying Blades: On-Field</>: When hitting any target with <shuzhi>Equilibrium</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>164%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>2.3%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>85%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>312%</> of crit to nearby targets. Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Flying Blades damage counts as normal attack damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> frost or volt weapon is equipped, Flying Blades damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Flying Blades damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK boost, while the four-set bonus provides an all elemental damage boost, along with an excellent off-hand damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Lances_Ice.name: Wicked
Lances_Ice.desc: By sealing the malicious dark energy within the lance, the knight truly becomes a "knight." And then... the knight takes the girl's hand, and together, they step into a tomorrow with endless possibilities.
Lances_Ice.lottery_desc: By sealing the malicious dark energy within the lance, the knight truly becomes a "knight." And then... the knight takes the girl's hand, and together, they step into a tomorrow with endless possibilities.

element.name: Force Impact
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack applies Force Impact on the enemy for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their frost and volt damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). Force Impact replaces the target's grievous status, and targets with Force Impact cannot become grievous. Frost attacks will freeze targets with Force Impact for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and volt attacks will remove the buffs on targets with Force Impact. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Pillage
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks (up to <shuzhi>45</> ice cores may exist on the field at any given time).
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and create <shuzhi>1</> ice core.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, and create <shuzhi>2</> ice cores.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, and create <shuzhi>1</> ice core.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, and create <shuzhi>3</> ice cores.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

attacks.name: Hunt
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

attacks.name: Frozen Spike
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the second, fourth, and fifth normal attacks to trigger Frozen Spike, leaping backward to charge while in the air, up to <shuzhi>3</> charges.
Phase 1 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

attacks.name: Death From Above
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Death From Above.
Stab the ground with the lance upon landing, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Fixate
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, hold normal attack to trigger Fixate to charge. Within <shuzhi>6</> seconds, damage increases depending on the charge duration, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody, then the weapon is tossed in the target's direction. After the weapon <shuzhi>lands a hit</>, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Aim assist is activated after aiming at a target within range for <shuzhi>2.5</> seconds during Fixate's charging. The tossed weapon automatically hits the target in the head (losing the target with aim assist does not affect charging).
After Fixate tosses the weapon, a new skill button for <shuzhi>Shadow Execution</> becomes available.

attacks.name: Boneshaver
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when aiming at the sky to trigger Boneshaver, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Tosses the lance in the target direction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and placing <shuzhi>Force Impact</> on targets hit.
Boneshaver does not trigger <shuzhi>Shadow Execution</> after tossing the weapon.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Concealment
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold dodge to trigger Concealment for <shuzhi>60</> seconds and become concealed (in solo mode, create an ice sculpture that attracts enemy attention for up to <shuzhi>15</> seconds), increasing movement speed by <shuzhi>30%</>. While concealed, the Wanderer blocks damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of Max HP up to <shuzhi>1</> time (this effect can only be triggered up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>10</> seconds). Concealment breaks when launching an attack and dealing damage with <shuzhi>Wicked</>, being attacked, or swapping weapons.
<shuzhi>Hunting</>: When concealment breaks from launching an attack with <shuzhi>Wicked</> and <shuzhi>landing a hit</>, trigger Fevered Hunt. This resets <shuzhi>Arctic Bite's</> cooldown and increases the Wanderer's final damage exponentially by <shuzhi>2.4%</> to <shuzhi>36%</> based on the Concealment duration. Receive maximum damage boost after <shuzhi>10</> seconds of Concealment. Damage dealt using <shuzhi>Fixate</> to trigger Hunting also benefits from the damage boost.

attacks.name: Impending Chill
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Impending Chill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead and creating <shuzhi>2</> ice cores (up to <shuzhi>45</> ice cores may exist on the field at any given time).

attacks.name: Death Aflutter
attacks.desc: Use normal attack right after dodging backward to trigger Death Aflutter, leaping forward and dealing equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon landing. This also creates <shuzhi>1</> ice core (up to <shuzhi>45</> ice cores may exist on the field at any given time).

attacks.name: Unforeseen Doom
attacks.desc: Tap normal attack at the moment the Wanderer enters concealment from holding dodge to quickly trigger <shuzhi>Fixate</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After tossing the weapon, a new skill button for <shuzhi>Shadow Execution</> becomes available.

attacks.name: Arctic Bite
attacks.desc:
Swing the lance to tear through space, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody and a <shuzhi>2</>-second <shuzhi>80%</> damage reduction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and creating a tear to draw in nearby targets that lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. This also creates <shuzhi>6</> ice cores (up to <shuzhi>45</> ice cores may exist on the field at any given time). Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
After successfully using Arctic Bite, increase the Wanderer's frost and volt damage by <shuzhi>9%</>, and the Wanderer ignores <shuzhi>15%</> of the target's frost and volt resistance, lasting for <shuzhi>60</> seconds (each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed <shuzhi>50%</>).

attacks.name: Frigid Blast
attacks.desc:
When <shuzhi>Fixate</> tosses the weapon through the tear, the cold air explodes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies near the tear, <shuzhi>strongly freezing</> them for <shuzhi>5</> seconds (triggers up to <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>30</> seconds, does not work on <shuzhi>bosses</>). Additionally, it draws in and detonates all the nearby ice cores, and places <shuzhi>Force Impact</> on the targets.
<shuzhi>Ice Core Detonation</>: Each ice core deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets, and the shatter from each ice core is calculated independently.

attacks.name: Shadow Execution
attacks.desc:
Move to the weapon's location and strike swiftly (if the thrown weapon has previously hit a target, then move in front of that target), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (does not trigger the skill's additional effect).
When Shadow Execution hits a target, triggers Phantasia if it's not on cooldown.

attacks.name: Deadly Euphoria
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Yanuo stabs the lance into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the targets in the area ahead and creating <shuzhi>6</> ice cores (up to <shuzhi>45</> ice cores may exist in battle at any given time). During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc:
When dealing damage to targets below <shuzhi>80%</> HP, increase final damage by <shuzhi>12%</>. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Being attacked when in <shuzhi>Concealment</> state will not break Concealment and the maximum number of attacks that can be blocked is increased to <shuzhi>3</> times.
