After breaking Concealment by launching an attack, additionally gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>Concealment</> duration multiplied by <shuzhi>5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP (does not exceed <shuzhi>120%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP). Lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Increase <shuzhi>Wicked's</> shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>.
When <shuzhi>Fevered Hunt</> is <shuzhi>triggered</>, draw in nearby ice cores to the Wanderer's surroundings and detonate them, then enter Permeation for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, during which <shuzhi>Arctic Bite</> replaces the weapon-switching button (but this Arctic Bite does not trigger the additional skill effects) and each time it is used reduces <shuzhi>Arctic Bite's</> cooldown by <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Use normal attack to immediately exit Permeation.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Increase Ice Core Detonation damage by <shuzhi>150%</>.
After <shuzhi>Fixate</> tosses the weapon and <shuzhi>hits a target</>, place Snow Trace on the target for <shuzhi>5</> seconds (this effect's trigger is prioritized before the charged attack damage from <shuzhi>Fixate</>). When Snow Trace fades, target takes damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of the total damage taken during Snow Trace (does not exceed Wanderer's ATK multiplied by <shuzhi>650</> in solo mode, and Wanderer's ATK multiplied by <shuzhi>6500</> while on a team). Damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects. Snow Trace can be triggered up to <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
The frost-volt damage increase from <shuzhi>Arctic Bite</> can be stacked up to <shuzhi>3</> times.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Volt and Frost</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped volt/frost base ATK, the highest equipped volt/frost ATK percentage, and the highest equipped volt/frost damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a volt and frost weapon.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence

<shuzhi>Chilling Strike: On-Field</>: When hitting any target with <shuzhi>Wicked</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>205%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>2.9%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>106%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>3.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Chilling Strike damage counts as normal attack damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> physical or flame weapon is equipped, Chilling Strike damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Chilling Strike damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK boost, while the four-set bonus provides an all elemental damage boost, along with an excellent off-hand damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Blevi_thunder.name: Pactcrest  Metz
Blevi_thunder.desc: Since familiars and contract beasts can grant extraordinary powers to multiple girls, wouldn't it be more efficient for them to take direct action in combat? With this in mind, she decided to let her little helper set an example.
Blevi_thunder.lottery_desc: Since familiars and contract beasts can grant extraordinary powers to multiple girls, wouldn't it be more efficient for them to take direct action in combat? With this in mind, she decided to let her little helper set an example.

element.name: Force Impact
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack applies Force Impact on the enemy for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their frost and volt damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). Force Impact replaces the target's grievous status, and targets with Force Impact cannot become grievous. Frost attacks will freeze targets with Force Impact for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and volt attacks will remove the buffs on targets with Force Impact. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Firefly Wave
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspend the target.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target down.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.

After triggering Firefly Wave, tap and hold normal attack to trigger <shuzhi>Phantasmic Rhythm</>.

While in the combat state, when <shuzhi>Pactcrest  Metz</> is in the off-hand slot, Metz remains on the battlefield for coordinated attacks. Metz is considered a summon, and each attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
When Benediction Resonance is active:
The first attack from Firefly Wave appoints up to <shuzhi>1</> teammate as "Bestie" and summons up to <shuzhi>1</> Metz to follow the Bestie. Using Metz Halo recovers HP equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's ATK to nearby teammates every second, and increases their final damage by <shuzhi>5%</>. This effect does not stack. Metz stops following the Bestie when the Wanderer is knocked down, or when Metz gets too far from the Wanderer.

attacks.name: Flying Star Wave
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Pink Chain Frenzy
attacks.desc:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Pink Chain Frenzy.
Command Metz to attack a target, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody and consumes endurance. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Phantasmic Rhythm
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Phantasmic Rhythm.
Transform into Metz and dash forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the targets ahead, then pounce on a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.

attacks.name: Familiar Descent
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Familiar Descent.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time the target is hit.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Strolling Flash
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Strolling Flash, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets hit.

attacks.name: MetzZZz
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger MetzZZz. Metz crashes into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Million-Metz Shockwave
attacks.desc:
After using Million-Metz Shockwave, the Wanderer enters Pact Amplification for <shuzhi>30</> seconds: When <shuzhi>Pactcrest  Metz</> is in the main slot, increase the Wanderer's volt damage by <shuzhi>25%</>. When <shuzhi>Pactcrest  Metz</> is in the off-hand slot, increase the Wanderer's frost damage by <shuzhi>10%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

When <shuzhi>non-Benediction Resonances are active</>:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and apply <shuzhi>Force Impact</> on them. When Million-Metz Shockwave is on cooldown, dealing accumulated damage equal to <shuzhi>100</> times of ATK during Pact Amplification grants <shuzhi>1</> use of Metz Energy Wave each time. Metz Energy Wave: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>1,800%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Gain up to <shuzhi>1</> use every <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
Using Million-Metz Shockwave again during Pact Amplification resets the duration of Pact Amplification and accumulated damage.
When Pact Amplification ends naturally, unused Metz Energy Waves are accumulated, and deal damage equal to unused charges times <shuzhi>1,200%</> of ATK.

When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance is active</>:
Using skills deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and applies <shuzhi>Force Impact</> on targets hit. Recover HP equal to <shuzhi>400%</> of ATK to the Wanderer and nearby teammates, and recover an additional <shuzhi>10%</> of the Bestie's Max HP. Remove debuffs and control effects on the Wanderer and nearby teammates (including Graying Bite), and grant immunity to debuffs and control effects for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

attacks.name: Strange Symphonic Realm
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon a Strange Symphonic Realm, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, during which damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance is active</>:
Remove all debuffs and control effects from the Wanderer and nearby teammates (including Graying Bite), and grant them immunity to debuffs and control effects for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. The Strange Symphonic Realm transforms nearby targets hit and non-teammate players into Metz (not effective against bosses, and unavailable in Apex League) for <shuzhi>4</> seconds. Each target can be transformed up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancements.desc:
Each <shuzhi>Pink Chain Frenzy</> or <shuzhi>Metz off-hand coordinated attack</> hit recovers HP equal to <shuzhi>12%</> of ATK. In team play, each hit recovers HP by <shuzhi>18%</>.
When a Bestie takes damage that reduces their HP below <shuzhi>25%</> of their max HP, also recover HP equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of their Max HP and grant them damage immunity for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. If the damage is fatal, then additionally prevent the lethal effect 1 time. Can be triggered up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When <shuzhi>non-Benediction Resonances are active</>, gain <shuzhi>2</> additional uses of <shuzhi>Metz Energy Wave</>, and increase volt damage and frost damage to bosses by <shuzhi>10%</>.
When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active, gain <shuzhi>1</> additional use of <shuzhi>Million-Metz Shockwave</>, and now recover HP equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of the Bestie's Max HP to Bestie.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>Metz off-hand coordinated attack</> and <shuzhi>Metz Energy Wave</> by <shuzhi>30%</>.

While Pact Amplification is active, increase volt and frost damage boost effects by <shuzhi>10%</> and <shuzhi>4%</> respectively. Metz Halo increases nearby teammates' final damage by <shuzhi>20%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>25%</>. This effect does not stack.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Volt and Frost</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped volt/frost base ATK, the highest equipped volt/frost ATK percentage, and the highest equipped volt/frost damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a volt and frost weapon.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Thunderbolt: Swift Cut</>: When equipped with <shuzhi>Pactcrest  Metz</>, weapon discharge skills deal initial damage equal to <shuzhi>46.87%</> of volt ATK plus <shuzhi>0.62%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>23.43%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>85.93%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in the combat state, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage counts as discharge damage. If any flame or physical weapon is equipped, Thunderbolt damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Thunderbolt damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Miraculous Turnaround</>: When challenging Bygone Phantasm and Sequential Phantasm with <shuzhi>Pactcrest  Metz</> equipped, gain an additional <shuzhi>15</> seconds to the challenge duration. When challenging <shuzhi>Origin of War</>, for every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Pactcrest  Metz</> equipped by the team, the team gains an additional <shuzhi>25</> seconds to the challenge duration, up to <shuzhi>50</> seconds.

fashions.name: Heartcrest Metz
fashions.desc: If a rose saves up its energy and unleashes it all at once in full bloom, will it also unlock an all-new evolutionary form...? I wonder...
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Heartcrest Metz.

recommended_matrices.reason: Two-set bonus: Increase all elemental damage. Four-set bonus: Increase attack and final damage.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

DFishChess_Fire.name: Freeflow
DFishChess_Fire.desc: A long history and a vast wild world.
DFishChess_Fire.lottery_desc: A long history and a vast wild world.

element.name: Armor Dissolve
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack inflicts Armor Dissolve on the target for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their flame and physical damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). This effect will replace the grievous status on the target, and targets with this effect cannot become grievous. Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Shifting Stars
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Starting Move
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

attacks.name: Review Board
attacks.desc: While on the ground, hold normal attack to activate Review Board. Gather up to 5 pieces that pursue targets after being launched out, with each piece dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Generational Leap
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Generational Leap.
Unleash the twin fish upon landing and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and launch them.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Seize Advantage
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to place <shuzhi>1</> black piece in front. The piece briefly draws in and slows nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Starfall
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging backward to place <shuzhi>3</> white pieces in front. Each white piece deals area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon landing. The pieces also set traps that explode when enemies come close, briefly slowing them and dealing an additional <shuzhi>57%</> damage.

attacks.name: Step into the Game
attacks.desc:
Leap into the air, transforming the battlefield into a Go board, and float in mid-air (unable to move during this time). Gain an elevated view for up to <shuzhi>10</> seconds. During this time, your attacks become Go pieces and your skills are replaced with <shuzhi>Half-Piece Advantage</>. Tap the Go board to place <shuzhi>18</> pieces in order, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>250%</> of ATK to all targets on the board and briefly slowing them down. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</> seconds. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
<shuzhi>Decisive Placement</>: Using <shuzhi>Review Board</>, <shuzhi>Seize Advantage</>, <shuzhi>Starfall</>, and <shuzhi>This Ends Here</> or creating (not refreshing an existing one) summons grants Decisive Placement stacks, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>9</> stacks. While Decisive Placement is active, each Go piece consumes <shuzhi>1</> stack to deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK to all targets on the board. No stacks can be gained while the skill is active.

attacks.name: Half-Piece Advantage
attacks.desc: While <shuzhi>Step into the Game</> is active, manually use or automatically trigger Half-Piece Advantage at the end of the duration. Fall from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all targets on the board. Additionally, deal damage equal to the number of <shuzhi>Decisive Placement</> stacks consumed during the skill duration times 200% of ATK. The twin fish then circle outward, pushing away nearby targets and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.

attacks.name: This Ends Here
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Deploy a zone and place <shuzhi>1</> piece in front that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this time, the Wanderer is immune to damage for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (not available in Apex League).
Activate the zone to deal <shuzhi>300%</> damage per second to a wide area around theWanderer. The zone exists for <shuzhi>30</> seconds or disappears <shuzhi>5</> seconds after leaving combat. Each summon extends the zone's duration by <shuzhi>3</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Tactical Deployment</>: Each summon adds <shuzhi>1</> stack of Tactical Deployment, increasing the zone's damage by an additional <shuzhi>50%</> of ATK per second, up to <shuzhi>8</> stacks.
<shuzhi>Scorching Sun</>: Gaining Tactical Deployment stacks also grants equivalent stacks of Scorching Sun, with each stack increasing flame damage by an additional <shuzhi>2.5%</>, up to <shuzhi>8</> stacks.
<shuzhi>Blazing Core</>: When using any flame weapon's discharge skill, gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>8</> seconds.

advancements.desc: Increase the maximum stacks of <shuzhi>Decisive Placement</> to <shuzhi>18</>. The additional damage from each stack of <shuzhi>Decisive Placement</> is increased to <shuzhi>400%</> of ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When <shuzhi>Freeflow</> is equipped, ignore <shuzhi>15%</> flame resistance of the targets in the zone. This effect works in the off-hand slot. Each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed 50%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When <shuzhi>Step into the Game</> is active, damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>30%</>. When receiving lethal damage, restore <shuzhi>100%</> of Max HP immediately. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time per skill activation.
Increase flame damage to <shuzhi>5%</> for each stack of <shuzhi>Scorching Sun</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Flame and Mass</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Central Nexus: On-Field</>: When hitting any target with <shuzhi>Freeflow</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Central Nexus damage counts as normal attack damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> frost or volt weapon is equipped, Central Nexus damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Central Nexus damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Shimmer
fashions.desc: With the mysteries of the universe in hand and the world in heart.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance Shimmer

fashions.name: Epoch
fashions.desc: Through turbulent and changing years, she walked alongside them.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance Epoch

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK boost, while the four-set bonus provides an all elemental damage boost, along with an excellent off-hand damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Snipe_fire.name: Clover Cross
Snipe_fire.desc: A VR multiplayer shooting game that is incredibly popular in Mirroria specially designed this exclusive gun for their top player from a certain season. The customized physical model of the gun was also sent to the player, but nobody realized it could be used just like in the game...
Snipe_fire.lottery_desc: A VR multiplayer shooting game that is incredibly popular in Mirroria specially designed this exclusive gun for their top player from a certain season. The customized physical model of the gun was also sent to the player, but nobody realized it could be used just like in the game...

element.name: Flame
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for <shuzhi>8</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK every second. While ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Normal Attack
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, attack 3 times in a row with the sniper rifle.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Cross Snipe
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack, dealing base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After charging, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Deal double damage for a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and launch the target (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Recover <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge when Cross Snipe hits a burning target or lands a critical hit. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Speed is increased by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds after using Cross Snipe.

attacks.name: Boiling Noise
attacks.desc: After any normal attack, tap and hold normal attack to fire a laser projectile that explodes upon hitting the target, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target within range and suspending them.

attacks.name: Aerial Discharge
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 3 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Twilight Arc
attacks.desc:
Leap backward and throw 1 grenade forward, which detonates upon hitting the ground, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets and suspending them in the air.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> After using Twilight Arc, use normal attack to instantly fire a fully charged Cross Snipe.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Ember Mag
attacks.desc:
Switch modules to change the effects of Cross Snipe and Twilight Arc. Cross Snipe can be used up to <shuzhi>8</> times. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>14</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Ruthless Bomb</>: The effect of Cross Snipe becomes a flame explosion that deals base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> within an area. After charging, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Upon hitting targets that are not burning, inflict them with Cross Burn, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>90%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>13</> seconds. Upon hitting burning targets, inflict them with Cross Burn, and enter Burn Enhancement for <shuzhi>20</> seconds, which increases burn damage on targets by <shuzhi>20%</>. When using Twilight Arc, you now throw <shuzhi>3</> grenades instead.
<shuzhi>Deceitful Bomb</>: Changes the effects of Cross Snipe into a ranged Gas attack that deals base damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> upon hit. After charging, deal up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>. Targets in the Gas will be slowed. The slow effect becomes stronger over time, and the Gas lasts <shuzhi>7</> seconds. Twilight Arc can detonate the Gas (the longer the charge, the greater the Gas explosion damage), dealing explosion damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> (this is deemed as triggering Cross Snipe 1 time) and reducing the target's flame resistance by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

<shuzhi>Passive</>: After confirming the module, you will receive Optical Enhancement corresponding to the number of dodge attempt recoveries and Cross Snipe charge time reductions. Optical Enhancement: Reduces the charging time of Cross Snipe by <shuzhi>30%</>, becoming immune to control effects while charging. Recover <shuzhi>1</> dodge attempt (up to <shuzhi>4</> dodge attempts) every <shuzhi>2</> dodges.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: While the Deceitful Bomb Module is in effect, Cross Snipe has a chance of reducing the cooldown of other flame weapon skills by <shuzhi>0.7</> seconds after hitting a target.
<shuzhi>Passive</> <shuzhi>Tranquil Heart</>: When Clover Cross uses discharge/skill/charged attack/dodge, increase final crit rate of Clover Cross by <shuzhi>5%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. This effect can stack up to <shuzhi>3</> times. After crit rate exceeds <shuzhi>100%</>, <shuzhi>50%</> of the excess crit rate is converted to crit damage, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>7.5%</> crit damage.

attacks.name: Bombardment Command
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and throw an incendiary bomb that can be detonated by firing at it, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets within range and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them. Damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc:
Hitting a target <shuzhi>2</> times with Cross Snipe creates an <shuzhi>Optical Space</> for <shuzhi>12</> seconds at the target location. After an enemy in the Optical Space triggers burn tally, burn tally will be triggered an additional <shuzhi>2</> times. When an enemy leaves the Optical Space, their speed is reduced by <shuzhi>80%</> for <shuzhi>2.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.
Targets of Cross Snipe will be terrified (speed is slowed by <shuzhi>80%</>) for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

After Cross Snipe lands a critical hit, recover HP equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of the damage dealt (not exceeding <shuzhi>15%</> of own Max HP, Gas Explosion damage not included) and <shuzhi>50</> weapon charge.
Each stack of Tranquil Heart increases the final crit rate to <shuzhi>9%</>, up to <shuzhi>27%</>, converting up to <shuzhi>13.5%</> of crit damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

<shuzhi>Ruthless Bomb</> Enhancement: While in the Burn Enhancement state, burn damage dealt to targets is increased to <shuzhi>30%</>.
<shuzhi>Deceitful Bomb</> Enhancement: Gas explosion damage ignores <shuzhi>30%</> of the target's flame resistance.
Increase damage dealt by Cross Snipe by an additional <shuzhi>20%</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

fashions.name: No Fear of the Sun
fashions.desc: UV rays are the enemy of all women... But she seems to enjoy bathing in the sunlight.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the Simulacrum Haute Couture: No Fear of the Sun and the weapon appearance: Sunny Breeze.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases DPS by increasing final damage and crit rate. The four-set bonus further increases final damage and crit rate, and grants dodge attempts.
The three-set bonus increases ATK and benefits the attack range of Clover Cross.

Asuka_physic.name: Spear of Longinus
Asuka_physic.desc: Legend has it that this weapon is formed from roots of the Tree of Life, possessing powers no one can withstand.
Asuka_physic.lottery_desc: Legend has it that this weapon is formed from roots of the Tree of Life, possessing powers no one can withstand.

element.name: Armor Dissolve
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack inflicts Armor Dissolve on the target for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their flame and physical damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). This effect will replace the grievous status on the target, and targets with this effect cannot become grievous. Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Brandishing Spear: Forming Shadow
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Thrusting Spear: Blinking Shadow
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Reverent Spear: Raging Wave
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger <shuzhi>Reverent Spear: Raging Wave</>.
Continuously attack multiple times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Charging Spear: Assassinate
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger <shuzhi>Charging Spear: Assassinate</>.
Dive down from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Extending Spear: Plunder
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger <shuzhi>Extending Spear: Plunder</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Leaping Slam
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger <shuzhi>Leaping Slam</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Cloud-Piercer
attacks.desc:
Throw the weapon toward the target and draw in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, then briefly immobilize nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
After successfully using this skill, gain <shuzhi>10</> stacks of Vengeance. Dealing damage to an enemy will consume <shuzhi>1</> Vengeance stack. If the equipped weapon's type is <shuzhi>physical</> or <shuzhi>flame</>, deal additional damage of the weapon's type equal to <shuzhi>720%</> of ATK to nearby targets. This effect can trigger up to <shuzhi>1</> time per second.
Additionally, after successfully using this skill, generate an A.T. Field with durability equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. During this time, increase the Wanderer's physical damage by <shuzhi>18%</> and flame damage by <shuzhi>12%</>, and gain hyperbody.
When the Wanderer receives damage, the A.T. Field will reduce damage based on its remaining durability percentage and deduct its durability based on the damage dealt (down to a minimum of <shuzhi>10%</> durability).
While Fortitude Resonance is active, if the Wanderer receives damage while having Vengeance stacks, consume <shuzhi>1</> Vengeance stack and block damage equal to <shuzhi>8%</> of Max HP. This effect can trigger up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Weapons Lift-Off
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and pilot EVA-02 to execute a flying kick, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Increase maximum Vengeance stacks from <shuzhi>10</> to <shuzhi>15</>. After all stacks are consumed, additionally trigger an enormous Spear of Longinus. If the current weapon's element is <shuzhi>physical</> or <shuzhi>flame</>, deal the weapon's elemental damage equal to <shuzhi>4000%</> of ATK to nearby targets.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

While the Wanderer has an <shuzhi>A.T. Field</> active, attacks can ignore a certain percentage of the damage reduction from a target's shield. This percentage is equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of the current <shuzhi>A.T. Field's</> <shuzhi>durability percentage</> plus <shuzhi>30%</> (unavailable in Apex League). When <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is active, increase the Wanderer's shatter at a rate equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of the <shuzhi>A.T. Field's</> <shuzhi>durability percentage</> (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
For every <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Vengeance</> consumed, regenerate <shuzhi>9%</> of <shuzhi>A.T. Field's</> maximum durability.

Increase the physical damage boost granted while <shuzhi>A.T. Field</> is active to <shuzhi>36%</> and the flame damage boost to <shuzhi>24%</>.
When <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is activated, while <shuzhi>A.T. Field</> is active, nearby teammates ignore<shuzhi>15%</> of their targets' shield's damage reduction. Also, reduce nearby targets' all resistance by <shuzhi>12%</>. This effect cannot be stacked.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Reverent Spear: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Spear of Longinus</> is equipped, any weapon's discharge skill will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>58.58%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>0.78%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>29.29%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>107.4%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in combat, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is 1 frost/volt weapon of any kind equipped, Reverent Spear damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Reverent Spear damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Glimmering Spear of Longinus
fashions.desc: The roots of the Tree of Life emit its unique power.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Glimmering Spear of Longinus.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK, while the four-set bonus provides an all-elemental damage boost and a final damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

AyanamiRei_thunder.name: Salvation
AyanamiRei_thunder.desc: The prototype bow specially built for Rei Ayanami by the Mirroria Department of Science and Technology. Refer to the appearance and color of EVA-00. Able to fire energy arrows.
AyanamiRei_thunder.lottery_desc: The prototype bow specially built for Rei Ayanami by the Mirroria Department of Science and Technology. Refer to the appearance and color of EVA-00. Able to fire energy arrows.

element.name: Force Impact
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack applies Force Impact on the enemy for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their frost and volt damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). Force Impact replaces the target's grievous status, and targets with Force Impact cannot become grievous. Frost attacks will freeze targets with Force Impact for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and volt attacks will remove the buffs on targets with Force Impact. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Rapid Bow
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
After the fifth attack, when a flashing light appears, tap to trigger the sixth attack. Sixth Attack: Fire a powerful energy arrow and release Homing Arrows that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> to targets and apply a slowing magnetic field at the location of the first target hit for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Enemies within the area have their movement and attack speed reduced by <shuzhi>35%</>.

attacks.name: Aerial Assault
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
After the fifth attack, when a flashing light appears, tap to trigger the sixth attack. Sixth Attack: Fire a powerful energy arrow and release <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Homing Arrows</> that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> to targets and apply a slowing magnetic field at the location of the first target hit. Enemies within the area have their movement and attack speed reduced by <shuzhi>40%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds.

attacks.name: Backjump Arrow
attacks.desc:
When using normal attack on the ground or in mid-air, while using the first to fifth normal attacks, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Backjump Arrow.
Fire a shot ahead while jumping backward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target hit.
If special energy is greater than <shuzhi>70</> at that time, trigger <shuzhi>Energy Consumption</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost ATK by <shuzhi>5%</>.
While <shuzhi>Salvation</> is in the main slot, consume <shuzhi>5</> special energy every 0.5 seconds. Increase <shuzhi>Salvation's</> damage dealt by 30%. Continuously tap or tap and hold normal attack to trigger <shuzhi>Dodging Rapidfire</>.
While <shuzhi>Salvation</> is in the off-hand slot, consume <shuzhi>3.3</> special energy every 0.5 seconds. Increase Homing Arrow's damage by <shuzhi>50%</> and increase its detonation radius.
The maximum amount of special energy is <shuzhi>100</>. When this amount is reached, switching <shuzhi>Salvation</> from the main slot to the off-hand slot will immediately cause the Wanderer to enter Energy Consumption.

attacks.name: Dodging Rapidfire
attacks.desc:
While in <shuzhi>Energy Consumption</>, use normal attack to attack 3 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

attacks.name: Precision Shot
attacks.desc: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. For every <shuzhi>0.1</> seconds spent charging, the damage increases by <shuzhi>100%</>, reaching maximum damage after <shuzhi>2.3</> seconds of charging.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Triple Shot
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Triple Shot, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the first target hit.

attacks.name: Charged Shots
attacks.desc: After dodging, tap normal attack at the appropriate time to trigger Charged Shots, firing out powerful energy arrows that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets. At the same time, fire Homing Arrows. The Wanderer receives 1 Blocking Barrier for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, which blocks damage that does not exceed <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP. The Wanderer can only have up to 3 Blocking Barriers simultaneously.

attacks.name: Mecha Strike
attacks.desc: Summon a mecha to pummel enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this time, the Wanderer gains hyperbody and receives <shuzhi>35</> special energy. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

attacks.name: Defense Field
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Summon a mecha and use its shield to smash the ground, with the resulting shockwave dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Also, gain <shuzhi>30</> special energy. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: When <shuzhi>Salvation</> is in the off-hand slot, increase <shuzhi>Homing Arrow's</> detonation damage by <shuzhi>100%</>.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
Increase the volt damage dealt to targets with <shuzhi>Homing Arrow: Overloaded</> by <shuzhi>10%</> and frost damage by <shuzhi>10%</>. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
After using <shuzhi>Mecha Strike</>, gain an additional <shuzhi>25</> special energy.
After entering <shuzhi>Energy Consumption</>, increase the Wanderer's volt damage by <shuzhi>16%</> and frost damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Volt and Frost</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped volt/frost base ATK, the highest equipped volt/frost ATK percentage, and the highest equipped volt/frost damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a volt and frost weapon.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flash: Detachment</>: After using <shuzhi>Mecha Strike</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>109.4%</> of volt ATK plus <shuzhi>15.6%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>56.3%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>210.9%</> of crit to targets hit every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Detachment damage will not stack and Flash damage counts as skill damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> physical or flame weapon is equipped, Flash damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Flash damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Homing Arrow</>: When using any weapon to deal damage, fire <shuzhi>1</> Homing Arrow toward the targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>18000%</> of ATK to the first target hit. At the same time, receive <shuzhi>4</> special energy. The Homing Arrow will remain on the target and apply Overload for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. When the number of Homing Arrows on a target reaches <shuzhi>3</>, the arrows will detonate, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>52000%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Homing Arrow can trigger up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

fashions.name: Rei's Echo
fashions.desc: The Department of Science and Technology's modified version of Salvation based on Rei Ayanami's feedback.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance Rei's Echo.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases volt and frost damage, and the four-set bonus increases final damage and attack.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

brush_fire.name: Pine Comet
brush_fire.desc: "No violence please! Real academics wouldn't hit anyone with stationery!" Rong Jin
brush_fire.lottery_desc: "No violence please! Real academics wouldn't hit anyone with stationery!" Rong Jin

element.name: Flame
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for <shuzhi>8</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK every second. While ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

skills.name: Brush to Paper
skills.desc: Brush to Paper

attacks.name: Brush to Paper
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 7 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

attacks.name: Flying Words
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 7 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

attacks.name: Freewriting
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to the fourth attack to trigger Freewriting.
Perform a spinning attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and knocking them back.
After triggering Freewriting, tap normal attack to trigger Elegant Strokes.
Perform an arcing displacement, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Elegant Strokes, tap normal attack to trigger Falling Paper.
After triggering Falling Paper, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Elegant Strokes.

attacks.name: Falling Paper
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap normal attack after triggering Elegant Strokes, or tap and hold normal attack when using the fifth to the seventh normal attack to trigger Falling Paper.
Kick the target into the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them. Proceed to unleash a flaming bird to attack nearby targets, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Falling Paper, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Elegant Strokes.

attacks.name: Finishing Touch
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to sixth normal attacks to trigger Finishing Touch.
Erupt flames, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Fragmented Texts
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Fragmented Texts.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to surrounding targets upon reaching the ground and suspending them.

attacks.name: Small Seal
attacks.desc:
When dealing damage to the locked-on target using normal attacks, there is a <shuzhi>50%</> chance to gather Small Seal.
<shuzhi>Flame</>: Gather flame power, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Can be triggered no more than 1 time every <shuzhi>12</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Burst</>: Detonate flames, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets. Can be triggered no more than 1 time every <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Attract</>: Draw in nearby targets with intense flames, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>. Can be triggered no more than 1 time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

attacks.name: Sparrow Feather
attacks.desc:
When the Wanderer has a <shuzhi>Sparrow Feather</>:
Any attack using <shuzhi>Pine Comet</> will launch a <shuzhi>Sparrow Feather</> toward the locked-on target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Can be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>1</> second.
When <shuzhi>Pine Comet</> is in the off-hand slot, attacking with any other weapons can also launch 1 <shuzhi>Sparrow Feather</> to the locked-on target, which can be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>2</> seconds.
The initial number of <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</> is <shuzhi>30</>, and a maximum of <shuzhi>60</> can be stored at a time.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Gain <shuzhi>15</> <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</>.

attacks.name: Inkstone Droplet
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Inkstone Droplet.
Splash ink, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Inflict a <shuzhi>65%</> delay for <shuzhi>2</> seconds on nearby targets (ineffective against bosses in team play), and form a line of flame to inflict a <shuzhi>50%</> slow effect on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> per second (this effect cannot be stacked when multiple flame lines/rings overlap). Lasts for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

attacks.name: Writing Artisan
attacks.desc:
When Inkstone Droplet is triggered, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Writing Artisan.
Splash ink, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. 
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Inflict a <shuzhi>65%</> delay for <shuzhi>2</> seconds on nearby targets (ineffective against bosses in team play), and form a ring of flame to inflict a <shuzhi>50%</> slow effect on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> per second (this effect cannot be stacked when multiple flame lines/rings overlap). Lasts for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

attacks.name: In All Directions
attacks.desc:
Transform into multiple ink doppelgangers and become invincible for a short duration, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. The ink then converges, drawing in nearby targets and releasing an ink attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
In All Directions gathers <shuzhi>Calligraphy Characters</> on the field and uses the flaming bird transformation, dealing damage equal to (the number of summons plus Calligraphy Characters on the field, up to <shuzhi>8</>) times <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. The Wanderer then enters the <shuzhi>Pinnacle</> state, ignoring <shuzhi>{12}%</> of the target's flame resistance for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
The <shuzhi>Pinnacle</> state provides different effects based on the type and quantity of the <shuzhi>Calligraphy Characters</> gathered by In All Directions:
Gather <shuzhi>1</> Discharge character "" for a <shuzhi>{5}%</> discharge damage increase. Gather <shuzhi>2</> Discharge characters "" for a <shuzhi>{6}%</> shatter increase.
Gather <shuzhi>1</> Skill character "" for a <shuzhi>{7}%</> skill damage increase. Gather <shuzhi>2</> Skill characters "" to reduce the cooldown of In All Directions by <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
Gather <shuzhi>1</> Dodge character "" for a <shuzhi>{8}%</> dodge attack damage increase. Gather <shuzhi>2</> Dodge characters "" to gain <shuzhi>{9}</> dodge attempts.
Gather <shuzhi>1</> Attack character "" for a <shuzhi>{10}%</> normal attack damage increase. Gather <shuzhi>2</> Attack characters "" to gain a <shuzhi>{11}%</> damage reduction during normal attacks.
Every <shuzhi>1</> Calligraphy Character gathered grants hyperbody for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>16</> seconds.

<shuzhi>Passive: Calligraphy Characters</>
Using any weapon discharge/skill/dodge/normal attack will drop corresponding <shuzhi>Calligraphy Characters</>.
<shuzhi>Discharge</>: Drop <shuzhi>1</> Discharge character "" whenever using <shuzhi>1</> discharge skill, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>2</> Discharge characters "" can exist on the field at a time.
<shuzhi>Skill</>: Drop <shuzhi>1</> Skill character "" whenever using <shuzhi>1</> skill, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>2</> Skill characters "" can exist on the field at a time.
<shuzhi>Dodge</>: Drop <shuzhi>1</> Dodge character "" whenever dodging for <shuzhi>2</> times, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>2</> Dodge characters "" can exist on the field at a time.
<shuzhi>Attack</>: Drop <shuzhi>1</> Attack character "" whenever using <shuzhi>4</> normal attacks, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>2</> Attack characters "" can exist on the field at a time.

attacks.name: A Spark of Genius
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and perform a forward sweep, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and knocking them back. During the period, damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

<shuzhi>Passive: Sparroburn</>
When using any flame weapon's discharge skill, apply <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Sparroburn</> to the locked-on target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK per second for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>2</> times.

advancements.desc: When a <shuzhi>Sparrow Feather</> hits a target, it triggers a spreading effect, dealing an additional area damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of the total burn and incendiary damage. It also spreads the affected target's <shuzhi>Sparroburn</> to nearby targets, refreshing the <shuzhi>Sparroburn</> duration. The spread effect can be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When the Wanderer's HP is below <shuzhi>50%</> of Max HP, every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, consume <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Sparrow Feather</> and recover <shuzhi>1.5%</> of Max HP (increases to <shuzhi>3%</> of Max HP in solo play) until the Wanderer's HP is full or all <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</> are consumed. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When receiving lethal damage, prevent lethal damage 1 time and gain damage immunity for a short duration, and instantly gain <shuzhi>60</> <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</> and <shuzhi>1000</> weapon charge. Can be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>60</> seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase flame damage by an additional <shuzhi>14%</> when you are under <shuzhi>Pinnacle</> state.

passives: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Fiery Explosion: On-Field</>: When landing any hit with <shuzhi>Pine Comet</>, it deals damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>105%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>1.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>55%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>200%</> of crit. This effect can be triggered once every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. The Fiery Explosion damage is counted as normal attack damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/frost/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Fiery Explosion damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Fiery Explosion damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Cinnabar
fashions.desc: As the afterglow emblem encircles the pen, hold it to get overwhelmed by the inspiration from the poem...
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Cinnabar.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a damage boost and accelerates the accumulation of Sparrow Feather, while the four-set bonus further amplifies the damage boost effect when paired with Pine Comet.
The two-set bonus increases crit and crit damage. The four-set bonus increases the flame team's main slot and off-hand slot damage output.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.

Tkatana_Fire.name: Hellfire
Tkatana_Fire.desc: You commit evil deeds, sow bad seeds, and reap the consequencesnaturally, you should be devoured by karmic fire... Haha, pretty cool, right? Oh, I hit you because... I didn't sleep well last night. Yeah, yeah, a crazy person like me should burn in karmic fire... but not today.
Tkatana_Fire.lottery_desc: You commit evil deeds, sow bad seeds, and reap the consequencesnaturally, you should be devoured by karmic fire... Haha, pretty cool, right? Oh, I hit you because... I didn't sleep well last night. Yeah, yeah, a crazy person like me should burn in karmic fire... but not today.

element.name: Armor Dissolve
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack inflicts Armor Dissolve on the target for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their flame and physical damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). This effect will replace the grievous status on the target, and targets with this effect cannot become grievous. Physical attacks will stun targets under the dissolve effect for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and flame attacks will decrease the targets' speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Burning Sacrifice
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Heavenly Fire
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

attacks.name: Scorch the Land
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to spin ahead a short distance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and entering Anticipation state:
While in Anticipation state, release normal attack to trigger Rising Slash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and suspending targets midair as the Wanderer leaps into the air. After triggering Rising Slash, tap normal attack again to trigger <shuzhi>Heavenly Fire</>.
After <shuzhi>1.2</> seconds in Anticipation state, continue holding normal attack to trigger Turbulence, each slash consuming endurance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets, spreading <shuzhi>25%</> of Turbulence's damage among targets when multiple are hit (damage is not spread if over <shuzhi>5</> targets). During Turbulence, release normal attack to trigger Cross Slash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Executioner's Judgement
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Executioner's Judgement.
Quickly land on the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Phantom Under the Blade
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Phantom Under the Blade, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
Hold normal attack instead of tapping it to also trigger <shuzhi>Scorch the Land</> after Phantom Under the Blade.

attacks.name: Walking Through Fire
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack right after dodging backward to trigger Walking Through Fire, shooting forward 2 sword auras that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
After triggering Walking Through Fire, tap normal attack to trigger the third attack of <shuzhi>Burning Sacrifice</>.

attacks.name: Fanning the Flames
attacks.desc:
Tap dodge twice to quickly dash forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
When in the <shuzhi>Role Play</> state, Fanning the Flames is replaced with Up to the Skies: Quickly leap high into the air and draw in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspending the targets in air, while all <shuzhi>Afterimages</> also trigger <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</> once. After triggering Up to the Skies, tap normal attack to trigger Falling Star Impact: Quickly land on the ground and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets, while all <shuzhi>Afterimages</> also trigger <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</> once.

attacks.name: Unstoppable Momentum
attacks.desc: (DMG from the skill's effect and debuff triggered counts as normal attack damage.) While on the ground, hold dodge to start charging and release to trigger Unstoppable Momentum, dashing forward and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead. When using Unstoppable Momentum, every <shuzhi>Afterimage</> on the field will unleash an additional Unstoppable Momentum attack toward the Wanderer, after which the <shuzhi>Afterimages</> will quickly disappear. If the target is killed, duration of the Afterimage is reset and it can affect the next Unstoppable Momentum.

attacks.name: Dream Within a Dream
attacks.desc:
Enter Flame Soul state, increasing final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. The Wanderer moves back, throws their weapon, and summons flame phantom slashes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. After the phantoms combine, the Wanderer dashes forward and attacks with the flame phantoms, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and launching them into the air. This has a cooldown of <shuzhi>25</> seconds. The Wanderer also enters Role Play state for <shuzhi>21</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Role Play</>: In this state, the Wanderer gains hyperbody; when normal attack or dodge attack (excluding attacks that trigger <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</>) hits a target, the Wanderer generates an Afterimage that can perform a coordinate attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of the current attack's damage. Afterimages last for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, with up to <shuzhi>5</> able to exist on the field at any given time. Afterimages count as summons.

attacks.name: Deserved Death
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and quickly charge an attack with three swords. After charging, perform a flurry of slashes in front, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all nearby targets and reducing the healing received of hit targets by <shuzhi>60%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Increase coordinated attack damage of <shuzhi>Role Play</> to <shuzhi>100%</> of the damage dealt by the attack.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

For every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Afterimage</> on the field, increase the damage of <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</> by <shuzhi>10%</>. If there are <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Afterimages</> on the field, increase the damage of <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</> to <shuzhi>100%</>.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

For every <shuzhi>Afterimage</> consumed by triggering <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</>, provide the Wanderer with a shield equal to <shuzhi>6%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, up to <shuzhi>60%</>.
Increase final damage boost provided by <shuzhi>Flame Soul</> to <shuzhi>33%</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Blaze: On-Field</>: When hitting any target with <shuzhi>Hellfire</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Blaze damage counts as normal attack damage. If any <shuzhi>1</> frost or volt weapon is equipped, Blaze damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, Blaze damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Daylight Flame
fashions.desc: How do you survive a long, dark night with no light until dawn?
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Daylight Flame.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK, while the four-set bonus provides an all-elemental damage boost and a final damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

Whip_physic.name: Mobius
Whip_physic.desc: The whip favored by the new Executor, Umi. Umi's favorite part of it is that she doesn't get tripped up by it, usually.
Whip_physic.lottery_desc: The whip favored by the new Executor, Umi. Umi's favorite part of it is that she doesn't get tripped up by it, usually.

element.name: Grievous
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for <shuzhi>7</> seconds, increasing their damage received by <shuzhi>20%</> and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. When in <yellow_lbl_14_1>team play</>, physical damage dealt to grievous targets is increased by an additional <shuzhi>20%</>.

attacks.name: Basic Technique
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use Mobius to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target down.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and drag and drop the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.
Increase shatter by an additional <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Air Combo
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Out of the Blue
attacks.desc: While using Basic Technique on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Out of the Blue directly based on the currently locked-on target. Smaller locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Larger locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and draw in nearby targets. This skill's shatter is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Stage Rotation
attacks.desc:
