Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
Plummet from the skies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and launching the target.

attacks.name: Close-up Magic
attacks.desc: Tap and hold normal attack on the ground to charge Anticipation, and release the button to trigger Close-up Magic based on the currently locked-on target. Smaller locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Larger locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and draw in nearby targets. This skill's shatter is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Grand Illusion
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Grand Illusion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. This skill's shatter is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

skills.name: It's Magic Time
skills.desc:
Dealing damage with any weapon in the main slot will accrue <shuzhi>warmup points</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.06</> seconds. Physical weapons accrue <shuzhi>1</> point with each hit, and non-physical weapons accrue <shuzhi>0.5</> points with each hit. The number of <shuzhi>warmup points</> you have are displayed in the <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</>, up to <shuzhi>100</> points. When entering battle, immediately gain <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>warmup points</>.
Skills can be cast once there are <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>warmup points</> in the <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</>. Pull together enemies in a certain area and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Become temporarily invincible (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss) and reduce the speed of targets within the hit area (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss). At the same time, activate <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> to continuously consume <shuzhi>warmup points</> for <shuzhi>18</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. This cooldown is not affected by effects (including the clearance, reset, or change of the cooldown time) that are not from Mobius. During this time, the skill button is replaced with a Cut Card button.
During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, automatically get either a <shuzhi>Spade</> or <shuzhi>Heart</> <shuzhi>Poker Card</> every 2 seconds. The type of <shuzhi>Poker Card</> that is about to be obtained can be switched in advance with the Cut Card button. When there are <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Poker Cards</>, the corresponding <shuzhi>Card Magic</> will be automatically used. Cooldown: <shuzhi>3.8</> seconds.
During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, you gain hyperbody and are considered as having a shield. Your <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> will also no longer be automatically replenished. Increase the physical damage of Mobius's attacks (normal attack and dodge attack) by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>.
Different <shuzhi>Poker Card</> combinations will activate different <shuzhi>Card Magic</> effects.
Heart + Spade  <ComLblGreen>Psychic Puppet</>
Heart + Heart  <ComLblGreen>Contradiction Corrosion</>
Spade + Spade  <ComLblGreen>Card Sweep</>
<shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends when switching to another weapon in any way or upon being defeated.
Gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>20</> seconds when Magic Trick ends. If it ends naturally, it deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>1,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

attacks.name: It's Magic Time
attacks.desc:
Dealing damage with any weapon in the main slot will accrue <shuzhi>warmup points</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.06</> seconds. Physical weapons accrue <shuzhi>1</> point with each hit, and non-physical weapons accrue <shuzhi>0.5</> points with each hit. The number of <shuzhi>warmup points</> you have are displayed in the <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</>, up to <shuzhi>100</> points. When entering battle, immediately gain <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>warmup points</>.
Skills can be cast once there are <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>warmup points</> in the <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</>. Pull together enemies in a certain area and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Become temporarily invincible (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss) and reduce the speed of targets within the hit area (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss). At the same time, activate <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> to continuously consume <shuzhi>warmup points</> for <shuzhi>18</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. This cooldown is not affected by effects (including the clearance, reset, or change of the cooldown time) that are not from Mobius. During this time, the skill button is replaced with a Cut Card button.
During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, automatically get either a <shuzhi>Spade</> or <shuzhi>Heart</> <shuzhi>Poker Card</> every 2 seconds. The type of <shuzhi>Poker Card</> that is about to be obtained can be switched in advance with the Cut Card button. When there are <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Poker Cards</>, the corresponding <shuzhi>Card Magic</> will be automatically used. Cooldown: <shuzhi>3.8</> seconds.
During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, you gain hyperbody and are considered as having a shield. Your <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> will also no longer be automatically replenished. Increase the physical damage of Mobius's attacks (normal attack and dodge attack) by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>.
Different <shuzhi>Poker Card</> combinations will activate different <shuzhi>Card Magic</> effects.
Heart + Spade  <ComLblGreen>Psychic Puppet</>
Heart + Heart  <ComLblGreen>Contradiction Corrosion</>
Spade + Spade  <ComLblGreen>Card Sweep</>
<shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends when switching to another weapon in any way or upon being defeated.
Gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>20</> seconds when Magic Trick ends. If it ends naturally, it deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>1,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Psychic Puppet
attacks.desc: Pull out a colony of bats from your hat and enhance yourself. During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, physical damage dealt by Mobius is increased by <shuzhi>7.5%</>, and only <shuzhi>60%</> of the damage taken will be tallied. The remaining <shuzhi>40%</> will slowly be deducted from your HP over <shuzhi>10</> seconds after <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends. The delayed tally effect only applies when Fortitude Resonance is not active.

attacks.name: Contradiction Corrosion
attacks.desc: Immediately recover <shuzhi>10%</> of Max HP and plant a Corrosion Flower on up to <shuzhi>7</> targets within a certain range, which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK every second for<shuzhi>3</> seconds.

attacks.name: Card Sweep
attacks.desc: Summon a large number of flying cards, forming a hurricane that swarms to the target location, attacking the target up to <shuzhi>12</> times and dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

skills.name: Sleight of Hand
skills.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and cast Sleight of Hand and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss). Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. After swinging the whip, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target.

attacks.name: Sleight of Hand
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and cast Sleight of Hand and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss). Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. After swinging the whip, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target.

advancements.desc: When switching to Mobius, immediately gain <shuzhi>30</> warmup points. Cooldown: <shuzhi>17</> seconds. Upon entering Magic Trick, deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>840%</> of ATK to nearby targets and reduce their physical resistance by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When ending Magic Trick early, deal wide-area damage over <shuzhi>13</> seconds. The current cooldown of Mobius's skill is reduced, and physical damage is increased by <shuzhi>25%</> for a period of time (this effect does not apply to Mobius). If Magic Trick has more than <shuzhi>13</> seconds remaining, gain an additional <shuzhi>200</> weapon charge. The more time remaining when Magic Trick ends, the higher the area damage, the greater the skill cooldown reduction, and the longer the physical damage boost lasts. The area damage dealt is capped at <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK (the maximum damage is dealt when the remaining time is more than <shuzhi>13</> seconds). The maximum cooldown reduction is <shuzhi>13</> seconds, and the physical damage boost can last up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Gain the Psychic Puppet effect upon entering Magic Trick, increasing Mobius's physical damage boost to <shuzhi>15%</>. During Magic Trick, recover <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP and <shuzhi>10</> weapon charge every second.

During Magic Trick, Mobius has an additional whip that is automatically swung whenever the Wanderer uses Mobius to deal normal attacks or dodge attacks, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of Mobius's ATK (this damage is not counted as dealing normal attacks).

passives: <shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

fashions.name: Gloom
fashions.desc: There are many secrets surrounding the source of the Millet Castle's heir's magical powers.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Gloom.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus and the four-set bonus benefit the effect conditions of Mobius, increasing damage output.
The three-set bonus gives a damage boost to grievous targets, benefitting Mobius while it's in the main slot.

feise_fire.name: Endless Bloom
feise_fire.desc: Some flowers conceal a lethal intent.
feise_fire.lottery_desc: Some flowers conceal a lethal intent.

element.name: Flame
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for <shuzhi>8</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK every second. While ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.desc: Maneuver

attacks.name: Maneuver
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target down.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and draw in the target.

attacks.name: Shifting Clouds
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

attacks.name: Golden Autumn
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Golden Autumn.
Draw in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspending them.

attacks.name: Resounding Pendants
attacks.desc:
While using on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the fourth to sixth normal attacks to trigger Resounding Pendants.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the targets back.

attacks.name: Lotus Aspara
attacks.desc:
When on the ground or while airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Lotus Aspara.
Soar ahead continuously in the air while consuming endurance. Use the directional controls to adjust the direction during Lotus Aspara.

attacks.name: Falling Flowers
attacks.desc:
During <shuzhi>Shifting Clouds</>, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Falling Flowers.
Descend from above. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and launch them.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Scatter
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flower Scatter, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

During <shuzhi>Mirage Fantasy</> created by <shuzhi>Whirling</>, after any weapon's dodge attack lands a hit for the first time, trigger Flower Graft, creating a Fei Se's Phantasia and Lotus Petals.
<shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</>: Upon creation, Fei Se's Phantasia copies <shuzhi>25%</> of the target's Max ATK and converts it to the Wanderer's <shuzhi>base flame ATK</> (not lower than <shuzhi>3,300</> and not exceeding <shuzhi>3,450</>; this flame ATK will not be reflected on the Wanderer's stats and is unavailable in Apex League) until Fei Se's Phantasia disappears. This is calculated independently for each Fei Se's Phantasia. There can be only <shuzhi>1</> Fei Se's Phantasia at a time.
<shuzhi>Lotus Petal</>: Upon creation, the Lotus Petal count is equal to the number of summons created by the Wanderer's weapons other than Endless Bloom. After creation, the Lotus Petal count does not change with the number of summons. Lotus Petals are considered as summons.

attacks.name: Flutter
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Flutter, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Whirling
attacks.desc:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and create a Mirage Fantasy, which lasts up to <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
When Whirling is in cooldown, gain the new skill, Lissom. Lissom can be used after the Mirage has been active for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
After the Mirage disappears, immediately refresh Whirling's cooldown. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

During the Mirage:
Every second, deal Soulwear damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to targets in the Mirage. Soulwear damage counts as normal attack damage.
Every <shuzhi>5</> seconds, inflict Blazing Heart on targets in the Mirage, dealing burn damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK, lasting for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. For every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</> or <shuzhi>Lotus Petal</> created by the Wanderer in the Mirage, Blazing Heart's damage is additionally increased by <shuzhi>6%</>.

attacks.name: Lissom
attacks.desc:
When Whirling is in cooldown, gain the new skill, Lissom. Lissom can be used after the Mirage has been active for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Clear all <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasias</> and <shuzhi>Lotus Petals</> in the Mirage created by the Wanderer. For every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</> or <shuzhi>Lotus Petal</> cleared, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Then, shatter the Mirage Fantasy, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Unparalleled Jade Pool
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: <shuzhi>Blazing Heart's</> damage's base multiplier is increased to <shuzhi>60%</> of ATK. While in the combat state, if the Wanderer inflicts multiple burn effects, <shuzhi>Blazing Heart's</> damage's base multiplier is additionally increased to that of the highest multiplier effect.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
The maximum number of <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</> is increased to <shuzhi>2</>. After <shuzhi>Whirling</> lands a hit, additionally create <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</>.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

For every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</> or <shuzhi>Lotus Petal</> in the <shuzhi>Mirage</>, <shuzhi>Blazing Heart's</> damage is additionally increased by <shuzhi>12%</>.
<shuzhi>Lotus Aspara's</> endurance consumption is reduced by <shuzhi>75%</>.

<shuzhi>Soulwear</> damage's base multiplier is increased to <shuzhi>270%</> of ATK, shatter is doubled, and after landing a hit, there is a <shuzhi>15%</> chance to inflict a <shuzhi>65%</> delay for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (ineffective against bosses in team play and unavailable in Apex League).

passives: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Fiery Explosion: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Endless Bloom</> is equipped, upon landing a hit with any weapon's discharge skill, deal initial damage equal to <shuzhi>37.5%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>0.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>18.75%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>68.75%</> of crit to nearby targets. While in combat, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Fiery Explosion: Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> frost/volt/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Fiery Explosion damage is increased to <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Fiery Explosion damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases all attack, and the four-set bonus increases all damage and final damage, effectively boosting flame characters' damage output.
The two-set bonus increases crit and crit damage. The four-set bonus increases the flame team's main slot and off-hand slot damage output.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.

fenrir_thunder.name: Gleipnir
fenrir_thunder.desc: A special device that converts sound waves into attack. When the shackles are shattered, the currents of death become sharp claws that tear everything apart.
fenrir_thunder.lottery_desc: A special device that converts sound waves into attack. When the shackles are shattered, the currents of death become sharp claws that tear everything apart.

element.name: Volt
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly paralyze</> targets for <shuzhi>1</> second and electrify them for <shuzhi>6</> seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. Electrified targets can't receive any buffs for the next <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

attacks.name: Woof
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, attack 7 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

attacks.name: Unshackle
attacks.desc:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 7 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

attacks.name: Wolfbite
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack during the second to the fourth normal attack to trigger Wolfbite.
Charge forward quickly, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back.
After triggering Wolfbite, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Upswipe.
Swipe upward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspending the target.

attacks.name: Menacing Hunt
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack during the fifth or the sixth normal attack to trigger Menacing Hunt.
Descend from above, gaining temporary invincibility and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspending the target.

attacks.name: Thick and Fast
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a jetpack to trigger Thick and Fast.
Descend from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> upon landing and suspending surrounding targets.
After triggering Thick and Fast, tap and hold normal attack again to trigger Roar.
Let out a terrifying Roar in all directions and gain temporary invincibility, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and knocking them back.

attacks.name: Trailing Note
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to the seventh Unshackle to trigger Trailing Note.
Roam through the air multiple times and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to surrounding targets.

attacks.name: Reverberation
attacks.desc:
Each time a target is hit by a normal attack, there is a <shuzhi>50%</> chance to place <shuzhi>1</> musical note on the target that lasts for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> notes.
<shuzhi>Wolfbite</>, <shuzhi>Menacing Hunt</>, and <shuzhi>Thick and Fast</> have a <shuzhi>100%</> chance to place <shuzhi>1</> musical note on the target on hit.
Musical notes can only be placed once every <shuzhi>1</> second.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: <shuzhi>Trailing Note</> and <shuzhi>Melody</> will detonate all the musical notes on the target on hit, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK times the number of musical notes detonated. Damage is doubled if <shuzhi>3</> or more notes are detonated.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: After detonating <shuzhi>2</> or more musical notes, cause the target to become intoxicated, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>1%</> of Wanderer's Max HP every second for <shuzhi>16</> seconds.
Damage from musical note detonation and intoxication is considered as dodge attack damage.

attacks.name: Melody
attacks.desc: Attack with claws, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to surrounding targets and knocking them down.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Place a musical note on the target.

attacks.name: Su-Paw-Star
attacks.desc:
Summon a consciousness that is separate from the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> on hit. Create a Songworld at the Wanderer's current location that lasts <shuzhi>30</> seconds, in which damage taken by the Wanderer is reduced by <shuzhi>8%</> while ignoring <shuzhi>20%</> of the target's defense.
The consciousness has HP equal to <shuzhi>30</> times the Wanderer's Max HP. It can only receive non-passive damage from <shuzhi>Gleipnir</>, and <shuzhi>100%</> of the damage is transferred to the target's main body (<shuzhi>1%</> for enemy Wanderers), while restoring HP equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of ATK to the Wanderer. While the consciousness is active, the Wanderer takes <shuzhi>12%</> less damage from the target's main body. The consciousness will exist for up to <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
After the consciousness returns to the target's main body, deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Recalling the consciousness: The consciousness returns to its main body when it's defeated, when its duration runs out, when a new consciousness is summoned, or when it strays too far from the body.
Su-Paw-Star cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

skills.name: Awoooo!
skills.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

attacks.name: Awoooo!
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, then rush to the target and attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area and placing <shuzhi>3</> musical notes on them. Briefly become invincible while the skill is active (unavailable in The Critical Abyss and Apex League).

advancements.desc:
When <shuzhi>Su-Paw-Star</> summons a consciousness and is on cooldown, gain the <shuzhi>Aural Fever</> skill. Rush to the target and attack multiple times, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>720%</> of ATK. Each hit landed slows the enemy for a brief period and restores HP equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK. The last hit places <shuzhi>2</> musical notes on the target. Aural Fever cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>3</> or more notes are detonated and the cooldown of Aural Fever is greater than <shuzhi>5</> seconds, clear the cooldown of Aural Fever. This effect can only trigger 1 time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

While Songworld is active:
For every <shuzhi>45%</> of Max HP lost or when using the skill <shuzhi>Aural Fever</>, trigger a <shuzhi>Songworld Quake</> which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>650%</> of ATK to targets in the Songworld.
For every <shuzhi>99%</> of Max HP lost, gain <shuzhi>1</> escape death for <shuzhi>45</> seconds (block a lethal effect and become immune to damage for a short time), stacking up to <shuzhi>1</> time.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Increase the damage multiplier of musical notes' detonation to <shuzhi>40%</>, and the DoT caused by intoxication to <shuzhi>1.5%</> of Max HP every second.
While Songworld is active, <shuzhi>Songworld Quake</> is triggered automatically if it doesn't trigger for <shuzhi>12</> seconds while in combat.
Increase crit rate by <shuzhi>18%</> while wielding <shuzhi>Gleipnir</>. The crit rate increase lasts another <shuzhi>5</> seconds after switching to other weapons.

passives: <shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
<shuzhi>Elemental Balancing</>: Increase all ATK by <shuzhi>15%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>3</> weapons of different elements. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

fashions.name: Zero Decibel
fashions.desc: In a cold and quiet world, even the slightest sound pierces through the silence.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Zero Decibel.

recommended_matrices.reason: Provide crit damage to match Gleipnir's R6 crit rate increase, and come with good off-hand slot damage boost.
When in a volt group, use Tian Lang's matrix to get powerful off-hand slot damage boost.
When paired with Shadoweave, use Lin's matrix to get off-hand slot damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

umbrella_fire.name: Vermilion Bird
umbrella_fire.desc: A parasol weapon used exclusively by Zhuque with various hidden mechanisms. Vermilion Bird's large parasol body can not only become a powerful tool to destroy enemies using energy, but also something to block the sight of others and hide the holder's demeanor...
umbrella_fire.lottery_desc: A parasol weapon used exclusively by Zhuque with various hidden mechanisms. Vermilion Bird's large parasol body can not only become a powerful tool to destroy enemies using energy, but also something to block the sight of others and hide the holder's demeanor...

element.name: Flame
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for <shuzhi>8</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK every second. While ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Dancing Flames
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back significantly. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target down.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back.

attacks.name: Soaring Strike
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Blazing Wings
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack during the second to the fifth normal attack to trigger Blazing Wings.
Dash forward quickly and suspend self, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them.

attacks.name: Molten Heart
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Molten Heart. Then, continue to consume endurance and gain hyperbody.
Control Vermilion Bird and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and command the parasols to spin rapidly.
Release normal attack to fall. While falling, each attack that lands on the target deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, and <shuzhi>knocks down</> the target.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: When the parasols are spinning rapidly, the feathers consumed every second by Flame Vortex is multiplied by <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</>, and the damage, charge, and shatter effects from Flame Vortex are also multiplied by <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</>.
<shuzhi>Feathers</>: Gain <shuzhi>1</> automatically every second, and <shuzhi>1</> for every time damage is dealt. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Feathers can be stored up to <shuzhi>30</>.
<shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</> = <shuzhi>1</> plus the number of parasols.

attacks.name: Summon Parasol
attacks.desc:
While not in combat, tap and hold normal attack on the ground to spawn a parasol at the designated location for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, or until combat starts.
While not in combat, use the skill to move to where the parasol is, and use double-jump to glide. Cooldown: <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Devastating Glide
attacks.desc:
Fly toward the parasols in the same order that they spawned, and return to the original position. The flying trail lasts 5 seconds, and targets near the trail are slowed by <shuzhi>50%</>. While gliding, become immune to damage (unavailable in Apex League). Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.
Every time the Wanderer passes through a parasol, deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and make the parasol spin rapidly for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Parasol
attacks.desc:
When a weapon's normal attack or a dodge attack hits, <shuzhi>1</> parasol spawns near the target for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Up to <shuzhi>3</> parasols can be active at the same time.
<shuzhi>Fiery Crash</>: While using Devastating Glide, for each parasol passed through, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>64.8%</> of ATK multiplied by Polyfeather Parasol.
<shuzhi>Corrosion</>: Targets near the parasols take <shuzhi>6%</> more flame damage and <shuzhi>8%</> more damage from charged attacks.
<shuzhi>Radiant Flames</>: Parasols burn nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>105%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Flame Vortex</>: Active parasols consume <shuzhi>1</> feather every second and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> (damage and feather cost from multiple parasols don't stack).

attacks.name: Vermilion Domain
attacks.desc:
While using Devastating Glide, pass through 3 parasols before returning to the original position to gain Vermilion Domain, which grants hyperbody and a <shuzhi>40%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>8</> seconds.
While diving, Vermilion Domain deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area every second and increases the Wanderer's speed by <shuzhi>30%</>.

attacks.name: Fortitude
attacks.desc:
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Successfully using any weapon skill will taunt nearby targets for <shuzhi>2.5</> seconds.
When using Devastating Glide, the Vermilion Domain expands, granting <shuzhi>20%</> damage reduction to nearby teammates.
When using Molten Heart, Vermilion Domain's timer is stopped.

skills.name: Phoenix Sweep
skills.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, during which damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive</>: A successful hit increases flame damage by <shuzhi>1.2% of Polyfeather Parasol</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

attacks.name: Phoenix Sweep
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, during which damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive</>: A successful hit increases flame damage by <shuzhi>1.2% of Polyfeather Parasol</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

advancements.desc:
<shuzhi>Vermilion Strength</>: When equipping Vermilion Bird, the <red>ammo costs</>, damage, charge, and shatter effects of other weapons are multiplied by <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</>.
<shuzhi>Glowing Fire</>: When nearby targets trigger burn tally or take damage from Fiery Crash, <shuzhi>30%</> of the damage is transferred to the <shuzhi>3</> highest HP percentage units near the target (including the target itself).
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Passive 1: When using any weapon discharge attack or shatter, all parasols in the vicinity trigger <shuzhi>1</> Fiery Crash at <shuzhi>30%</> effectiveness. Reduce the ATK of enemies near the parasols by <shuzhi>15%</>. When in combat, spawn <shuzhi>3</> parasols near the target immediately after dealing damage for the first time.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Fiery Crash and the transferred damage ignore <shuzhi>60%</> of the target's flame resistance.
Flame damage dealt by Corrosion is increased by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Increase the damage dealt by Dancing Flames and Soaring Strike by <shuzhi>50%</>.
 When calculating the effects of spinning parasols, Phoenix Sweep, and Fiery Crash add <shuzhi>2</> to Polyfeather Paraso.

passives: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

fashions.name: Akaba
fashions.desc: Vermilion Bird changes its appearance after sensing Zhuque's intent.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Akaba.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases flame ATK and flame damage. The four-set bonus benefits the flame team.
The two-set bonus increases crit and crit damage. The four-set bonus increases the flame team's main slot and off-hand slot damage output.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.

GreyFox_ice.name: The Witch's Key
GreyFox_ice.desc: An Omnium weapon modeled after an item in Witch of Time.
GreyFox_ice.lottery_desc: An Omnium weapon modeled after an item in Witch of Time.

element.name: Force Impact
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack applies Force Impact on the enemy for <shuzhi>45</> seconds, increasing their frost and volt damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (and an additional <shuzhi>15%</> in team play). Force Impact replaces the target's grievous status, and targets with Force Impact cannot become grievous. Frost attacks will freeze targets with Force Impact for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and volt attacks will remove the buffs on targets with Force Impact. This effect can only trigger <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds on the same target.

attacks.name: Magic Unleashed
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 4 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> to the target and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Each hit of <shuzhi>Magic Unleashed</> adds 1 <red>Temporal Fallacy</> stack to the target, decreasing all attack of the target by <shuzhi>3%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>4</> times (this decrease will not be reflected on the Wanderer's stats).

attacks.name: Aerial Waltz
attacks.desc:
While the Wanderer is airborne, use normal attack to launch 4 consecutive attacks, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> to the target and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Each hit of <shuzhi>Aerial Waltz</> adds 1 <red>Temporal Fallacy</> stack to the target, decreasing all attack of the target by <shuzhi>3%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>4</> times (this decrease will not be reflected on the Wanderer's stats).

attacks.name: Fated Wheel
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the third to fourth normal attacks to trigger <shuzhi>Fated Wheel</>.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and knock the targets back.
After <shuzhi>Fated Wheel</> hits, enhances <red>Temporal Fallacy</> to decrease all attack of the target by <shuzhi>5%</> (this decrease is not reflected on the Wanderer's stats) and also inflict a <shuzhi>10%</> Slow effect for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

attacks.name: Glacial Surge
attacks.desc:
Under the <red>Witch of Time</> state, while on the ground, use normal attack to launch 4 consecutive attacks, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and draw in the target, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> to the target and launch the target, gaining <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.

attacks.name: Frozen Comet
attacks.desc:
Under the <red>Witch of Time</> state, use normal attack to launch 4 consecutive attacks, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and draw in the target, gaining <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> to the target and launch the target, gaining <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.

attacks.name: Stagnant Stream
attacks.desc:
When under the <red>Witch of Time</> state and with <shuzhi>12</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks, tap and hold normal attack or hold during normal attack on the ground to consume all <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks and trigger Stagnant Stream, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active:
Nearby teammates recover all HP lost in the past <shuzhi>3.5</> seconds and additional HP equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK. Also remove debuffs and control effects (including Graying Bite effect) from the Wanderer and nearby teammates.

attacks.name: Divebomb
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Divebomb.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. After landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Mystic Repulsion
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Retribution's Light
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Airborne Fantasy
attacks.desc: Hold dodge to enter Airborne Fantasy, increasing speed and continuously consuming endurance. Upon ending Airborne Fantasy, deal up to damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

attacks.name: Magic Transmutation
attacks.desc:
Consume all <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
Enter the <red>Witch of Time</> state, in which some normal attack modes change and the Wanderer increases frost damage by <shuzhi>1%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds for each <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack consumed. While in this state, using <shuzhi>Stagnant Stream</> grants a new skill, <shuzhi>Sub-Zero Beam</> (only can be obtained and used <shuzhi>1</> time in each <red>Witch of Time</> state, and switching weapons during this state will prevent obtaining or using it). Cooldown of <shuzhi>30</> seconds. (This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.)

attacks.name: Sub-Zero Beam
attacks.desc: Can be used while in the <red>Witch of Time</> state, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and freezing them for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Also recover HP equal to <shuzhi>400%</> of ATK for nearby teammates and gain <shuzhi>12</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks.

attacks.name: Spacetime Spark
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, gain <shuzhi>12</> Power Scale stacks, and gain Hyperbody for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active:
Remove debuffs and control effects (including Graying Bite) from the Wanderer and nearby teammates.

advancements.desc:
Under the <shuzhi>Witch of Time</> state and when <shuzhi>The Witch's Key</> is in the main slot, gain an additional <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Power Scale</> every <shuzhi>1</> seconds.
After using <shuzhi>Magic Transmutation</>, apply an additional <shuzhi>Reverse Tide</> effect to the hit target for <shuzhi>12</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>1</> time. While Reverse Tide is active, the Wanderer recovers HP equal to the number of nearby targets affected by Reverse Tide times <shuzhi>80%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>1</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Under the <shuzhi>Witch of Time</> state, deal <shuzhi>775%</> of ATK as DMG to nearby targets every <shuzhi>1</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active: Upon using <shuzhi>Magic Transmutation</> at full <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks, increase final damage of the Wanderer and nearby teammates by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds (this effect does not stack); in addition, targets affected by <shuzhi>Reverse Tide</> will have their crit resistance reduced by <shuzhi>2%</> every <shuzhi>2</> seconds for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, up to <shuzhi>5</> stacks.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Increase healing by <shuzhi>15%</>. For every <shuzhi>12</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks consumed, gain <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Exemption Privilege</>: When taking lethal damage, consume <shuzhi>1</> stack to prevent the lethal effect and recover <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP, stacking up to <shuzhi>4</> times (unavailable in Apex League).
When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active: <shuzhi>Exemption Privilege</> can be additionally granted to nearby teammates.

Upon entering the <shuzhi>Witch of Time</> state, the frost elemental damage boost increases to <shuzhi>2.5%</> for every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack consumed.
When <shuzhi>Reverse Tide</> ends, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of the total damage taken during this period to the target (does not exceed the Wanderer's ATK times <shuzhi>1000</> in solo mode and the Wanderer's ATK times <shuzhi>15000</> in team mode). Damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

passives: <shuzhi>Fusion of Frost and Volt</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped frost/volt base ATK, the highest equipped frost/volt ATK percentage, and the highest equipped frost/volt damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a frost and volt weapon.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence. <shuzhi>Chrono Coil: Release</>: After using <shuzhi>Magic Transmutation</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>19.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>70%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>264%</> of crit to targets hit every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Release damage does not stack and Chrono Coil damage is counted as skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> flame/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Chrono Coil damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</> times.In addition, Chrono Coil damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Mana Reserve</>: When <shuzhi>The Witch's Key</> is in the main slot, can gain <shuzhi>Power Scale</> to advance the clock progress of <shuzhi>The Witch's Key</>, enhancing magic effects or releasing more powerful magic. <shuzhi>Power Scale</> can stack up to <shuzhi>12</> times, lasting for <shuzhi>60</> seconds, and will be removed <shuzhi>15</> seconds after exiting battle.

fashions.name: Key of Twilight
fashions.desc: Limited edition item from Witch of Time, available while supplies last.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Key of Twilight.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides an all attack boost, while the four-set bonus provides crit damage and final damage boosts, along with an excellent off-hand damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
If there are no better matrices, use this one for now.

BlackStar_SuperPower.name: Star of Oblivion

element.name: Altered Damage
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Additionally, inflict damage equal to <shuzhi>25%</> of all damage received by the target during the duration of the mark, up to a total of <shuzhi>560%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Only 1 mark can exist on a target at a time.

attacks.name: Void Shredder
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
When a Pursuit Prey target is present, use normal attack to trigger Pursuit, diving near the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>. On hit, grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Frenzy, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered. Pursuit can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>4.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Reckoning of Shadow
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
When a Pursuit Prey target is present, use normal attack to trigger Pursuit, diving near the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>. On hit, grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Frenzy, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered. Pursuit can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>4.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Chase of Nought
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack or hold during the first to third normal attack on the ground to backflip and trigger Star of Oblivion, hitting up to <shuzhi>2</> times. Each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target and fires bullets that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, marking locked-on targets with <shuzhi>Pursuit Prey</>.
When <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered, Chase of Nought inflicts <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on hit targets.
When Frenzy reaches <shuzhi>3</> stacks, Chase of Nought is replaced with Dimensional Seal. Tap and hold normal attack to teleport in front of the locked-on target, capturing its afterimage into a Black Hole (immune to damage from target during Dimensional Seal), and triggering an explosion that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets in a wide area.

attacks.name: Descent of Stillness
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to use Descent of Stillness.
Plunges toward the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Echo of Infinity
attacks.desc:
When <shuzhi>Boundary Zone</> is used, Void Shredder is replaced with Echo of Infinity. While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
When a Pursuit Prey target is present, use Normal Attack to trigger Pursuit, diving near the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>. On hit, grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Frenzy, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered. Pursuit can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>4.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Silent End
attacks.desc:
When <shuzhi>Boundary Zone</> is used, Reckoning of Shadow is replaced with Silent End. While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, inflicting <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.
When a Pursuit Prey target is present, use Normal Attack to trigger Pursuit, diving near the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>. On hit, grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Frenzy, inflicting <shuzhi>2</> stacks of Entropic Surge on the hit target when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered. Pursuit can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>4.5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Shattering Leap
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Shattering Leap, dashing forward to strike targets and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, which inflicts <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is active.

attacks.name: Echo of Emptiness
attacks.desc: When <shuzhi>Boundary Zone</> is used, Shattering Leap is replaced with Echo of Emptiness. Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to launch missiles, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to hit targets, marking locked-on targets with <shuzhi>Pursuit Prey</>, and inflicting <shuzhi>1</> stack of Entropic Surge on hit targets when <shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</> is triggered.

attacks.name: Starfall Cleave
attacks.desc:
Tap skill to leap forward, summoning Star of Oblivion Blades that pierce the ground. The initial strike deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, followed by a dark explosion dealing <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to enemies in range. Grants <shuzhi>Dark Star</> with effects based on <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion's</> current stat:
<shuzhi>Dark Star: Retrograde</>: With flame-physical stat, <shuzhi>Starfall Cleave</> ignites targets, dealing<shuzhi>35%</> flame damage per second for <shuzhi>20</> seconds while boosting flame damage by <shuzhi>17%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Hits grant <shuzhi>1</> Chaos stack (max <shuzhi>1</> per second). At <shuzhi>6</> stacks, resets and launches <shuzhi>6</> homing projectiles at random targets, each dealing<shuzhi>420%</> of ATK damage and restoring <shuzhi>2%</> Max HP. Multiple hits on locked targets inflict <shuzhi>100%</> Slow for <shuzhi>1</> second, decaying over duration. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).
<shuzhi>Dark Star: Frozen</>: With frost-volt stat, boosts <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion's</> final damage by <shuzhi>55%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Restores <shuzhi>10%</> Max HP after each Pursuit. When <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</> is in the off-hand slot, deals <shuzhi>450%</> frost damage per second to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).
<shuzhi>Dark Star: Chaos</>: With physical -flame stat, boosts <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion's</> final damage by <shuzhi>21%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. On hit, inflicts Entropic Surge to the target. Upon reaching <shuzhi>10</> stacks, resets all stacks and triggers an explosion that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>525%</> of ATK to nearby targets. When targets marked with Entropic Surge die, their stacks spread to nearby enemies. When using <shuzhi>Obliteration Blade </>, removes all Entropic Surge marks within range and triggers an explosion. When <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</> is in the off-hand slot, deals damage equal to <shuzhi>490%</> of ATK per second and inflicts <shuzhi>1</> Entropic Surge to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>21</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).
<shuzhi>Dark Star: Pulse</>: With volt-frost stat, increases <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion's</> volt damage by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Gain <shuzhi>10</> Charge stacks. Hits consume <shuzhi>1</> stack (max <shuzhi>1</> per second) to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>280%</> of ATK to nearby targets. At 0 stack, deals an additional damage equal to <shuzhi>700%</> of ATK and restores <shuzhi>25%</> Max HP per target hit. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds (this is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).

attacks.name: Void Pursuit
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold skill to create a Boundary Zone after a brief charge, slowing all enemies within. While the Boundary Zone is active, switching to <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</> allows using <shuzhi>Void Annihilation</> without charge cost.
Launches missiles dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, marking hit targets for Pursuit while gaining the <shuzhi>Dark Star</> effect matching <shuzhi>Starfall Cleave's</> element. With altered element, Void Pursuit triggers <shuzhi>Dark Star: Rebirth</>: 
<shuzhi>Dark Star: Rebirth</>: While the Boundary Zone is active, stores all damage dealt. When the Boundary Zone is terminated by <shuzhi>Obliteration Blade</> or <shuzhi>Void Annihilation</>, unleash <shuzhi>100%</> of stored damage to all targets in range (capped at ATK  <shuzhi>2,000</> in solo mode, ATK  <shuzhi>5,000</> in team mode. Only affected by titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects).

attacks.name: Obliteration Blade
attacks.desc: After <shuzhi>10</> seconds in Boundary Zone or completing the final strike of <shuzhi>Echo of Infinity</>, the skill is replaced with Obliteration Blade. Summon Voidpiercer to dash forward, placing a Singularity in her wake. After a brief charge, pierces through the Singularity, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies in her path. The Singularity immobilizes enemies within range, expanding to its maximum range before collapsing in a slashing attack that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, ending the Boundary Zone.

attacks.name: Divine Arrival
attacks.desc: With <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>, Wanderers can view the survival status of all world bosses on the map. When equipped with <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>, tap on previously defeated world bosses on the map to trigger Divine Arrival, transmitting above the boss to strike. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Transmission via Divine Arrival remains available during boss respawn. Can be triggered up to <shuzhi>1</> time every minute.

attacks.name: Void Annihilation
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, transform into Voidpiercer, and unleash a gigantic Black Hole, inflicting a <shuzhi>100%</> Slowing effect on targets in the area. Compress and unleash the Black Hole from hands, triggering an explosion, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. While the Boundary Zone is active, using Void Annihilation will terminate the Boundary Zone effect. During Void Annihilation, use skills to disengage from discharge with Voidpiercer completing the discharge, gaining damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc: Normal Attack: Pursuit's damage doubles, inflicting a brief <shuzhi>70%</> Slow effect on hit.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

During <shuzhi>Dark Star</>, the Wanderer will ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of the target's resistance (each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed <shuzhi>50%</>). Upon entering the combat state, switching to <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</> for the first time allows using <shuzhi>Void Annihilation</> without charge cost.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

When the <shuzhi>Dark Star</> is triggered, the Wanderer obtains a shield equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of Max HP. This shield can stack with other shields, but the total shield value cannot exceed <shuzhi>100%</> of Max HP. Any excess will be converted to equivalent healing.
Increase final damage by <shuzhi>16%</>, all elemental damage boosted by <shuzhi>16%</>. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

passives: Elemental Tuning: When equipped with <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>, if the elements of the other two weapons match, <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>'s element adopts the same element. Otherwise, it shifts to the altered element.
<shuzhi>Chaotic Wave</>: Three altered weapons reduce the hit enemies' final damage by 15% for 5 seconds.

<shuzhi>Eternal Shadow: Unload</>: After using <shuzhi>Starfall Cleave</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of altered ATK plus <shuzhi>19.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>70%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>264%</> of crit to targets hit every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Unload damage cannot be stacked. Eternal Shadow damage counts as skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> physical/flame/frost/volt weapon of any kind equipped, Eternal Shadow damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Eternal Shadow damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Mass and Flame</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped physical/flame ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a physical and flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Eternal Shadow: On-Field</>: When hitting any target with <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>256%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>3.6%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>133%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>4.9%</> of crit to nearby targets. Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Eternal Shadow damage counts as normal attack damage. In addition, Eternal Shadow damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Flame and Mass</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped physical/flame base ATK, the highest equipped flame/physical ATK percentage, and the highest equipped physical/flame, and the weapon is considered both a physical and a flame weapon.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot (Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.)

<shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot (Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.)

<shuzhi>Eternal Shadow: Unload</>: After using the <shuzhi>skill</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of flame ATK plus <shuzhi>19.5%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>70%</> the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>264%</> of crit every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Detachment damage cannot be stacked. Eternal Shadow damage counts as skill damage. In addition, Eternal Shadow damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Frost and Volt</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped volt/frost base ATK, the highest equipped volt/frost ATK percentage, and the highest equipped volt/frost damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a volt and frost weapon.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

Can be triggered up to 1 time every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Eternal Shadow damage counts as normal attack damage. In addition, Eternal Shadow damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

<shuzhi>Fusion of Volt and Frost</>: When the weapon deals damage, damage is calculated using the highest equipped volt/frost base ATK, the highest equipped volt/frost ATK percentage, and the highest equipped volt/frost damage boost, and the weapon is considered both a volt and frost weapon.

<shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Eternal Shadow: Unload</>: After using <shuzhi>Starfall Cleave</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of volt ATK plus <shuzhi>19.5%</> of Max HP plus <shuzhi>70%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>264%</> of crit to hit targets every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple detachment damage cannot be stacked. Eternal Shadow damage counts as skill damage. In addition, Eternal Shadow damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

Elemental Tuning: When equipped with <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>, if the elements of the other two weapons match, <shuzhi>Star of Oblivion</>'s element adopts the same element. Otherwise, it shifts to the altered element.
<shuzhi>Chaotic Wave</>: Three altered weapons reduce the hit enemies' final damage by 15% for 5 seconds.

<shuzhi>Eternal Shadow: Unload</>: After using <shuzhi>Starfall Cleave</>, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>137%</> of altered ATK plus <shuzhi>19.5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>70%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>264%</> of crit to targets hit every second for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Multiple Unload damage cannot be stacked. Eternal Shadow damage counts as skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> physical/flame/frost/volt weapon of any kind equipped, Eternal Shadow damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</> times. In addition, Eternal Shadow damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Violet Star
fashions.desc: With your strength infused, the stars take on a new brilliance.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Violet Star.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus provides a physical and flame ATK, while the four-set bonus provides an all-elemental damage boost and a final damage boost.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
