Yoyo_ice.name: Precious One
Yoyo_ice.desc: A rare collectible weapon fused with unique trendy refits. May the wielder walk with courage into the desolate darkness, even if like a moth to the flame.
Yoyo_ice.lottery_desc: A rare collectible weapon fused with unique trendy refits. May the wielder walk with courage into the desolate darkness, even if like a moth to the flame.

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Withering Cold
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Thaw
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Piercing Cold
attacks.desc: While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Piercing Cold, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

attacks.name: Sharp Chill
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Sharp Chill.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Snowy Flurry
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Snowy Flurry, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Winter Solstice
attacks.desc: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Winter Solstice, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Desolate Day
attacks.desc:
Deal damage to nearby targets up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and create 2 regulation Speedy Yo-yos. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds. Reduce the speed of targets within range of Desolate Day by <shuzhi>50%</> (does not affect Wanderers or bosses).
Each Speedy Yo-yo passes through the center of the trajectory about 4 times in each motion cycle, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets within the trajectory, for <shuzhi>70</> seconds. The motion cycle lasts for 4 seconds when the weapon is 0 stars. During this period, using Desolate Day will refresh the position and duration of the Speedy Yo-yo. Cooldown: <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
While Desolate Day is in use, reduce damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.

attacks.name: Return to Loneliness
attacks.desc:
Use Capped Knowledge to obtain up to <shuzhi>2</> uses of the new skill Return to Loneliness. This skill can only be used while Desolate Day is in cooldown. Deal skill damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. While the skill is in use, reduce damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any incoming or outgoing healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.
While Fortitude Resonance is active: Use Return to Loneliness and taunt nearby targets to gain <shuzhi>1</> stack of blocking shield, up to <shuzhi>3</> stacks, for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. <shuzhi>Blocking points</> are equal to the <shuzhi>sum of the Wanderer's 5 resistance types</>. When the blocking shield is used up or overflows, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>200% of blocking points</> to the main target.
While Benediction Resonance is active: Using Return to Loneliness against targets with greater than <shuzhi>95%</> HP will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>8%</> of their respective Max HP (does not affect Wanderers). This cannot be affected by damage boost or reduction effects.

attacks.name: Capped Knowledge
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and launching the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc:
When any weapon skill is used, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger <shuzhi>harmony</>, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>25%</> of the Wanderer's lost HP. The damage dealt shall be no less than <shuzhi>120%</> of the Wanderer's Max ATK, and no more than <shuzhi>800%</> of the Wanderer's Max ATK. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
When any weapon discharge is used, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger <shuzhi>tuning</>, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP. The damage dealt shall be no more than <shuzhi>400%</> of the Wanderer's Max ATK. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

When using Desolate Day, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger <shuzhi>9</> seconds of <shuzhi>swiftness</>: Speedy Yo-yo's speed is increased by <shuzhi>80%</>, damage is increased by <shuzhi>160%</>, and damage caused by passing through the target is converted to small-area damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
Increases the damage of Speedy Yo-yo and Return to Loneliness by <shuzhi>50%</>.
Increase final damage by <shuzhi>6%</> while Speedy Yo-yo is active.

passives: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
<shuzhi>Elementalist</>: Increase final damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</> for every <shuzhi>1</> type of weapon element equipped. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus and four-set bonus greatly increase the damage boost of a team equipped with Precious One or different types of weapons.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The three-set bonus increases the charging speed of a frost team and makes them switch weapons quickly.

yulan_ice.name: Unity
yulan_ice.desc: Unity, in other words, consolidation. It's the weapon Ji Yu handpicked for Yu Lan, which possesses the latest tech from Domain 9. Please don't be surprised if you witness some miraculous sights after using it with the timestamp.
yulan_ice.lottery_desc: Unity, in other words, consolidation. It's the weapon Ji Yu handpicked for Yu Lan, which possesses the latest tech from Domain 9. Please don't be surprised if you witness some miraculous sights after using it with the timestamp.

element.name: Ice Shell
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and leave them frostbitten for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.

attacks.name: Battering Fist
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and continuously knock the target back.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and launch the target.

Battering Fist can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.
After using any dodge attack while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, use normal attack to quickly trigger the Fourth Attack.
After the Fifth Attack lands a hit while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) and additionally inflict <shuzhi>Chilblain</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. This effect can only be triggered on the same target 1 time every <shuzhi>8</> seconds.

attacks.name: Floating Fist
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

Floating Fist can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Forest-Piercing Swallow
attacks.desc:
Forest-Piercing Swallow can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Then, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the targets back.

After using <shuzhi>Cloud-Soaring Kite</>, using normal attack can also trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.

attacks.name: Sky-Dancing Snake
attacks.desc:
Sky-Dancing Snake can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the fourth to fifth normal attacks to trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspend them.

After using <shuzhi>Forest-Piercing Swallow</>, tapping and holding normal attack can also trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.

attacks.name: Frost High & Low
attacks.desc:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to sixth normal attacks to trigger Frost High & Low.
Toss your weapon in the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Frost High & Low can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Cloud-Soaring Kite
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Cloud-Soaring Kite.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground and knock them down.

Cloud-Soaring Kite can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Total Rewind
attacks.desc:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Total Rewind.
Continuously draw in nearby targets while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody.

Total Rewind can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.
After dodging while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

attacks.name: Impossible Feat
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Impossible Feat, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Impossible Feat can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Sweeping Clouds
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Sweeping Clouds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Sweeping Clouds can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Offense & Defense
attacks.desc:
<shuzhi>Unity</> has 2 forms: <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> and <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</>. Activate up to <shuzhi>1</> of them via the Skills - Settings page. They cannot be switched while in the combat state.

<shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form: While in the combat state, <shuzhi>Unity's</> dodge attack / normal attack multiplier is additionally increased by <shuzhi>40%</>. After using any weapon's dodge attack or normal attack <shuzhi>3</> times, receive <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> (up to <shuzhi>10</>). Only <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> can be obtained every <shuzhi>2</> seconds. While not in the combat state, all <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> will be cleared.
<shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form: After <shuzhi>Observe & React</> lands a hit, enter the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state and receive <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</> every <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>15</>) for <shuzhi>60</> seconds. While not in the combat state, all <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</> will be cleared.
<shuzhi>Passive: Chill</>
When <shuzhi>Unity</> is equipped, ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of targets' Frost Resistance. This effect also works in the off-hand slot.

attacks.name: Fire in the Hole
attacks.desc:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
When using Fire in the Hole, <shuzhi>Unity</> will consume up to <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>. When it consumes <shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>, Fire in the Hole will deal <shuzhi>1.1</>/<shuzhi>1.4</>/<shuzhi>1.8</>/<shuzhi>2.3</>/<shuzhi>3</> times of its original damage respectively.
After using Fire in the Hole, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After using Fire in the Hole, restore <shuzhi>2</> dodge attempts.

Fire in the Hole can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
When <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> reaches <shuzhi>5</>, reset Fire in the Hole's cooldown.

attacks.name: Clashing of Arms
attacks.desc:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
While in the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state, when using any weapon skill, <shuzhi>Unity</> will consume up to <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>. When it consumes <shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, deal additional damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>169%</>/<shuzhi>368%</>/<shuzhi>619%</>/<shuzhi>938%</>/<shuzhi>1,350%</> of ATK, and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> every second for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
After using any frost weapon skill, gain <shuzhi>2</> seconds of hyperbody.

Clashing of Arms can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

attacks.name: Snow-Treading Tiger
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Snow-Treading Tiger can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.

attacks.name: Observe & React
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
After Observe & React lands a hit, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After Observe & React lands a hit, enter the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
After using <shuzhi>Unity</> to use a discharge skill, receive <shuzhi>1,000</> weapon charge. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Observe & React can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

advancements.desc:
While in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, after consuming <shuzhi>3</> or more <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>, <shuzhi>Unity</> restores <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>. Subsequently, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by <shuzhi>25%</>, and <shuzhi>Unity's</> dodge attack/normal attack damage is increased by <shuzhi>250%</> for <shuzhi>150</> seconds.
While in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form, after consuming <shuzhi>3</> or more <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, <shuzhi>Unity</> restores <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>. Subsequently, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>75</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

In the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, if <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> is not obtained within <shuzhi>25</> seconds, the next acquisition of <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> will grant <shuzhi>2</> counts.
In any form, when <shuzhi>Unity</> consumes <shuzhi>3</> or more <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> or <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, restore <shuzhi>50%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP. In solo play, the HP recovery is increased to <shuzhi>100%</>. This effect can only trigger 1 time every <shuzhi>8</> seconds in <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form. In <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, there are no limitations.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

After <shuzhi>Unity</> consumes <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> or <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, when receiving lethal damage, prevent lethal damage 1 time and recover <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP (Unavailable in Apex League). In solo play, the HP recovery is increased to <shuzhi>200%</>. Both effects can only trigger 1 time every <shuzhi>300</> seconds.

While in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, <shuzhi>Unity's</> dodge attack / normal attack damage is further increased by <shuzhi>350%</>. After consuming <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>150</> seconds.
While in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form, after <shuzhi>Unity</> consumes <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by <shuzhi>75%</> for <shuzhi>150</> seconds.

passives: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

<shuzhi>Icecrush: Swift Cut</>: When <shuzhi>Unity</> is equipped, upon landing a hit with any weapon's discharge skill, deal initial damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>150%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>2%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>75%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>275%</> of crit. While in combat state, after every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, the next Swift Cut damage will be increased by an additional <shuzhi>1</> time, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>30</> times. When multiple Swift Cut damages exist, the highest initial value is used for calculation. Swift Cut damage is counted as discharge skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/physical/flame weapon of any kind equipped, Icecrush damage is increased <shuzhi>6.5</> times. In addition, Icecrush damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases the off-hand DPS and damage boosting abilities of a frost team. The four-set bonus further amplifies the damage boost effect when paired with Unity.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The three-set bonus increases the charging speed of a frost team and makes them switch weapons quickly.

Zeke_physic.name: Onyx Tortoise
Zeke_physic.desc: An imposing and sharp greatsword that ordinary people can barely muster the strength to pick up. Its destructive power is juxtaposed by the wide blade and the sense of security it brings.
Zeke_physic.lottery_desc: An imposing and sharp greatsword that ordinary people can barely muster the strength to pick up. Its destructive power is juxtaposed by the wide blade and the sense of security it brings.

element.name: Grievous
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for <shuzhi>7</> seconds, increasing their damage received by <shuzhi>20%</> and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. When in <yellow_lbl_14_1>team play</>, physical damage dealt to grievous targets is increased by an additional <shuzhi>20%</>.

attacks.name: Resistor
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
While the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> is active, after Resistor's fifth attack lands its final hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and draw in enemies to the Wanderer.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

attacks.name: Flying Stone
attacks.desc:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

attacks.name: Othershore Soul
attacks.desc:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Othershore Soul.
Toss your weapon ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: Collapsing Mountain
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Collapsing Mountain.
Continuously move forward while attacking and consuming endurance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

attacks.name: In Continuity
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger In Continuity.
Dive down from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

attacks.name: Open Clouds
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Open Clouds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
While the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> is active, after Open Clouds lands a hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.

attacks.name: Cutting Sand
attacks.desc:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Cutting Sand, unleashing a sword aura, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
While the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> is active, after Cutting Sand lands a hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.

attacks.name: Lookout
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Lookout (unavailable in Apex League).
After the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> summoned by <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</> is completed, use Lookout to enter <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds and gain <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Dark Slashes</>.
After the first successful normal or dodge attack from <shuzhi>Onyx Tortoise</> lands a hit, trigger <shuzhi>Dark Slash</>. If the target is an ordinary or elite enemy and their current HP doesn't exceed the Wanderer's Max ATK by more than <shuzhi>20,000</> times, the target will be immediately executed. Otherwise, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>1,500%</> of ATK.
<shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> ends when its duration is over, the <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> count is exhausted, or upon switching weapons. <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>200</> seconds.

attacks.name: Absolute Ravine
attacks.desc:
Split a crack in the ground ahead, gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League), and draw in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Increase the Wanderer's physical and flame damage by <shuzhi>26%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, and then summon the Xuanwu Totem. The Xuanwu Totem is removed while in the non-combat state.
The Xuanwu Totem summons dark souls from the four formation cores every <shuzhi>0.6</> seconds, each time dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK to targets along the way. When Absolute Ravine is in cooldown, gain the new skill <shuzhi>Mirror Reflection</>: Strike back the nearby dark souls and activate their corresponding formation cores. After any formation core is activated, the Xuanwu Totem will be complete, and the <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> can be entered.

While the Xuanwu Totem is active, use <shuzhi>Onyx Tortoise</> to gain hyperbody, and snake bites can be applied in the following ways:
After <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</> lands a hit, apply 1 snake bite to the target with the highest HP.
After <shuzhi>Resistor's</> fifth attack lands its final hit, apply 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
After <shuzhi>Open Clouds</> lands a hit, apply 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
After <shuzhi>Cutting Sand</> lands a hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
Snake bite deals devouring damage equal to <shuzhi>150%</> of ATK to the target, restores <shuzhi>12%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and makes the target a Serpent Chain member.

Serpent Chain can cause <shuzhi>30%</> of the actual damage dealt by the Wanderer's main slot weapon to the locked-on Serpent Chain member and <shuzhi>grievous</> to be conducted to all Serpent Chain members (including the locked-on target themselves). There can be up to <shuzhi>4</> Serpent Chain members.
Conduction damage's element type follows the original damage and cannot be conducted again. The total conduction damage within <shuzhi>30</> seconds should not exceed <shuzhi>2,400</> times of the Wanderer's maximum ATK (unlimited in team play). <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> damage cannot be conducted.
After using <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</>, the Wanderer can also trigger <shuzhi>Mighty Wind</>: Serpent Chain members deal damage equal to the number of times devouring damage has been dealt multiplied by <shuzhi>25%</> of ATK to nearby targets (including the locked-on target themselves), then reset the devouring damage count.

attacks.name: Way Home
attacks.desc: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon Xuanwu, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.desc:
Every time <shuzhi>grievous</> is applied, deal <shuzhi>devouring</> damage equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of ATK to the target. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
Every time the weapon's <shuzhi>ignite</> trait is applied to a <shuzhi>non-grievous target</>, the target becomes <shuzhi>grievous</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.
After triggering <shuzhi>Mighty Wind</>, turn targets hit into members of the <shuzhi>Serpent Chain</>.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.
After using <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</>, reduce the Wanderer's damage taken by <shuzhi>10%</> (<shuzhi>20%</> in solo play) for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
When there is <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Serpent Chain</> member, increase <shuzhi>conduction</> damage's conduction rate to <shuzhi>50%</>.

passives: <shuzhi>Physical Resonance</>: Increase physical ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and physical resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

<shuzhi>Shield Break: Detachment</>: After using <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</>, every second, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>70%</> of physical ATK plus <shuzhi>1%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP plus <shuzhi>36%</> of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus <shuzhi>135%</> of crit for <shuzhi>30</> seconds to targets hit. Multiple Detachment damage will not stack and shield break damage will be counted as skill damage. If there is <shuzhi>1</> volt/flame/frost weapon equipped, shield break damage is multiplied by <shuzhi>1.3</>. In addition, shield break damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

fashions.name: Fading Shadows
fashions.desc: To protect his only family.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Fading Shadows.

recommended_matrices.reason: Two-set bonus: Increase physical ATK and flame ATK. Four-set bonus: Increase damage boost of physical and flame weapons.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
Increase damage dealt to grievous targets. Useful for Ming Jing's combat style.

queen_superpower.name: Moonstar Bracelet
queen_superpower.desc: A strange nanoweapon that generates blades that cut through metal like butter. In the past, it used to take the form of a bracelet that wrapped around its owner's wrist while in standby mode, and that is where its owner's descriptions of it come from.
queen_superpower.lottery_desc: A strange nanoweapon that generates blades that cut through metal like butter. In the past, it used to take the form of a bracelet that wrapped around its owner's wrist while in standby mode, and that is where its owner's descriptions of it come from.

element.name: Altered Damage
element.desc: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Additionally, inflict damage equal to <shuzhi>25%</> of all damage received by the target during the duration of the mark, up to a total of <shuzhi>560%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Only 1 mark can exist on a target at a time.

attacks.name: Frost Lash
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 7 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

attacks.name: Dancing Drop
attacks.desc:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to launch 7 consecutive attacks in mid-air and consume endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to<shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

attacks.name: Converging Ripples
attacks.desc:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack between the second and sixth normal attack to trigger Converging Ripples.
The Wanderer will become airborne and fire several water bombs ahead while continuously consuming endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking the targets back.

attacks.name: Moonrain
attacks.desc:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonrain.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets upon reaching the ground, and suspend them.

attacks.name: Torrential Convergence
attacks.desc:
While in mid-air, tap and hold normal attack between the second and sixth normal attack to trigger Torrential Convergence.
Fire several water bombs ahead while continuously consuming endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking the targets back.

attacks.name: Division
attacks.desc:
While <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active:
Tap and hold normal attack while on the ground to select a teammate, then release to link the Wanderer to that teammate. When their link is in effect, the pair cannot make a link or be linked again. The link ends when one of the two is defeated/the selected ally has made another link/it exceeds the range.
The linked ally's healing received from the link starter's Moonstar Bracelet is increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.
When the linked ally activates <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</>, an extra <shuzhi>50%</> of resistance is transmitted to the linked ally.
When the linked ally activates <shuzhi>Balance Resonance</>/<shuzhi>Attack Resonance</>, an extra <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK is transmitted to the linked ally (no more than <shuzhi>20,000</>).
When the linked ally activates <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</>, the outgoing healing effect of the pair is additionally increased by <shuzhi>30%</>.

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.desc:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Recover HP equal to <shuzhi>150%</> of ATK for the Wanderer and nearby allies when dodging, and remove <shuzhi>8</> points of Graying Bite from the Wanderer. While <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active, gain an additional <shuzhi>50</> weapon charge.

attacks.name: Reversal Wave
attacks.desc: Roam ahead several times, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area.

attacks.name: Dashing Wave
attacks.desc: Unleash a water jet, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area and suspending them.

attacks.name: Crashing Falls
attacks.desc:
Tidal Eruption: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets in the area. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive: Scatter</>
Gain Scatter Technique after equipping <shuzhi>Moonstar Bracelet</>. Up to <shuzhi>2</> out of <shuzhi>6</> Scatter Techniques can be activated via Skills - Settings.
Controls: Tap the special skill button to use the Scatter Technique.
When a Scatter Technique is attached to Crashing Falls, using Crashing Falls will automatically trigger the Scatter Technique, and the skill cooldown will be replaced by the Scatter Technique cooldown.

attacks.name: Hydro Focus
attacks.desc:
Surging Tides: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, increasing all elemental damage by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>14</> seconds.

attacks.name: Vortex
attacks.desc:
Summon multiple waterspouts, pulling nearby targets together and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A large waterspout is formed shortly after, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.
Damage dealt by <shuzhi>Vortex</> counts as skill and discharge damage.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

attacks.name: Torrential Force
attacks.desc:
Bath in Torrents: Gain <shuzhi>60</> weapon charge every second. Increase skill damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>35</> seconds.
Using <shuzhi>Torrential Force</> counts as using the current weapon's discharge skill (without the effect).
<shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> hits reset <shuzhi>Torrential Force's</> cooldown.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

attacks.name: Maelstrom
attacks.desc:
Encompassing Waves: Gain a final damage boost that increases over time, up to <shuzhi>26%</> (maxes out in <shuzhi>10</> seconds). This effect does not stack with repeated uses of <shuzhi>Maelstrom</> and is lost upon switching weapons.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

attacks.name: Aqua Shackles
attacks.desc:
Execute Aqua Prison on the target for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. The target is unable to move or use skills for the duration of Aqua Prison, and their resistance is reduced by <shuzhi>8%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds (doesn't work against Wanderers).
The resistance-reducing effect of <shuzhi>Aqua Shackles</> is doubled while diving.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

attacks.name: Wellspring
attacks.desc:
Arcane Vitality: Gain a (<shuzhi>Max HP</>/<shuzhi>100,000</>)% all elemental damage boost, up to <shuzhi>9%</>. Gain another <shuzhi>7%</> increase to all elemental damage for <shuzhi>20</> seconds when your Max HP is over <shuzhi>1,600,000</>.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

attacks.name: Shimmering Radiance
attacks.desc:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Moonstar's Breath, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Recover the Wanderer's HP equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK and remove <shuzhi>16</> points of Graying Bite. Remove delay and gain delay immunity for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

<shuzhi>Passive: Moonstar</>
While <shuzhi>Attack</>/<shuzhi>Balance</> Resonance is active, when <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> lands a hit, increase the Wanderer's ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
While <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is active, every time the Wanderer uses <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</>, increase their resistance by <shuzhi>4%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> times. When the Wanderer's HP is lower than <shuzhi>30%</>, gain an extra <shuzhi>40%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, which can be triggered once every <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
While <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active, <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance's</> HP recovery heals all teammates instead and when it is used, creates <shuzhi>1</> stack of Moonshield that negates damage <shuzhi>1</> time for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. This effect does not stack, and every use of <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> increases the healing effect of the next use by <shuzhi>20%</>, up to <shuzhi>40%</>. This effect lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancements.desc:
Using any weapon or discharge skill grants <shuzhi>1</> elemental crystal, up to <shuzhi>5</> crystals. Elemental crystals are lost at a rate of <shuzhi>1</> crystal every <shuzhi>6</> seconds.
Elemental crystals provide a final damage boost equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of [(<shuzhi>crystal count</> plus <shuzhi>1</>)/<shuzhi>2</>] and an increased healing effect equal to <shuzhi>6%</> of [(<shuzhi>crystal count</> plus <shuzhi>1</>)/<shuzhi>2</>].
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

While Benediction Resonance is not active, when the target's HP is below (<shuzhi>crystal count</> plus <shuzhi>2</>)<shuzhi>%</>, using <shuzhi>Moonstar Bracelet</> can instantly execute the target (doesn't work against Wanderers).
While Benediction Resonance is active, when the target's HP is below (<shuzhi>crystal count</> times <shuzhi>2</> plus <shuzhi>2</>)<shuzhi>%</>, using <shuzhi>Moonstar Bracelet</> can instantly execute the target (doesn't work against Wanderers).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Obtain <shuzhi>1</> elemental crystal every time Scatter Technique is used. Elemental crystals are lost at a rate of <shuzhi>1</> crystal every <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
When receiving lethal damage, consume <shuzhi>3</> elemental crystals to prevent death 1 time and gain damage immunity for a short time. Can be activated <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
Increase final damage by <shuzhi>8%</> of [(<shuzhi>crystal count </>plus <shuzhi>3</>)/<shuzhi>2</>].

passives: <shuzhi>Altered Resonance</>: Increase ATK by <shuzhi>20%</> and altered resistance by <shuzhi>30%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more altered weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Altered Resonance or Altered Reaction effects, with Altered Resonance taking precedence.

fashions.name: Astraluna
fashions.desc: The power of the stars and the moon gathers, condenses, and discharges here.
fashions.use_desc: Unlocks the weapon appearance: Astraluna.

recommended_matrices.reason: The two-set bonus increases all attack and damage output. The four-set bonus further increases the damage dealt by the Wanderer or teammates from using Scatter Technique.
The two-set bonus increases main slot damage. The four-set provides universal off-hand slot abilities.
